tika-s0103t:225_3: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Paṭivirūḷhato hi taṃ pakkanti. Yasmiṃ ṭhāne sāyaṃ pakko sāli gahito,
tika-s0103t:225_4: tadeva ṭhānaṃ dutiyadivase pāto pakkena sālinā paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti āha “sāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:225_5: gahitaṭṭhānaṃ pāto pakkaṃ hotī”tiādi. Alāyitanti lāyitaṭṭhānampi tesaṃ kammappaccayā
tika-s0103t:225_6: alāyitameva hutvā anūnaṃ paripuṇṇameva paññāyati, na kevalaṃ paññāyanameva, atha
tika-s0103t:227_0: 126. “Manussakāle”ti idaṃ pubbe manussabhūtānaṃyeva tattha idāni nikantivasena uppatti
tika-s0103t:227_1: hotīti katvā vuttaṃ, devatānampi purimajātiyaṃ itthibhāve ṭhitānaṃ tattha virāgādipurisattappaccaye
tika-s0103t:227_2: asati tadā itthiliṅgameva pātubhavati. Purisattapaccayeti “attanopi anissaratā, sabbakālaṃ
tika-s0103t:227_3: parāyattavuttitā, rajassalatā vañcatā, gabbhadhāraṇaṃ, paṭhamāya pakatiyā nihīnapakatitā,
tika-s0103t:227_5: itthibhāve ‘alaṃ itthibhāvena, na hi itthibhāve ṭhatvā cakkavattisiriṃ, na sakkamārabrahmasiriyo
tika-s0103t:227_6: paccanubhavituṃ, na paccekabodhiṃ, na sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ sakkā’ti evaṃ itthibhāvavirajjanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:227_8: uttamaṃ, ettha ṭhatvā sakkā etā sampattiyo sampāpuṇitu’nti evaṃ purisattabhāve sambhāvanāpubbakaṃ
tika-s0103t:227_10: dhamme. Pūretvā vaḍḍhetvā. Paccakkhaṃ bhūtaṃ, sadisañca diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikañca
tika-s0103t:227_11: suvipulaṃ anatthaṃ acintetvā purisassa kāmesu micchācaraṇaṃ kevalaṃ itthiyaṃ āsāpatti
tika-s0103t:227_12: phalenevāti āsāāpatti itthibhāvāvahāpi hotiyeva. Tanninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena tannikantiyā
tika-s0103t:227_13: nimittabhāvāpattitoti vuttaṃ “puriso itthattabhāvaṃ labhanto kāmesumicchācāraṃ nissāya
tika-s0103t:227_14: labhatī”ti. Tadāti yathāvutte paṭhamakappikakāle. Pakatiyāti sabhāvena. Mātugāmassāti
tika-s0103t:227_15: purimattabhāve mātugāmabhūtassa. Purisassāti etthāpi “pakatiyā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:227_16: Upanijjhāyatanti upecca nijjhāyantānaṃ. Yathā aññamaññasmiṃ sārāgo uppajjati, evaṃ
tika-s0103t:230_0: 127. Gomayapiṇḍamattampi nālatthāti sammadeva vivāhakammaṃ nālatthāti adhippāyena
tika-s0103t:230_1: vadanti. Pātabyatanti tasmiṃ asaddhamme kilesakāmena pivitabbataṃ kiñci pivitabbavatthuṃ
tika-s0103t:230_2: pivantā viya ativiya tosetvā paribhuñjitabbataṃ āpajjiṃsu, pātabyatanti vā paribhuñjanakataṃ
tika-s0103t:230_3: āpajjiṃsu upagacchiṃsu. Paribhogattho hi ayaṃ pā-saddo, kattusādhano ca tabya-saddo,
tika-s0103t:231_0: Sannidhikārakanti sannidhikāraṃ, ka-kāro padavaḍḍhanamattanti āha “sannidhiṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:231_1: Apadānanti avakhaṇḍanaṃ. Ekekasmiṃ ṭhāneti yattha yattha vahitaṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ekekasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:233: 128. Sīmaṃ ṭhapeyyāmāti “ayaṃ bhūmibhāgo asukassa, ayaṃ bhūmibhāgo asukassā”ti evaṃ paricchedaṃ kareyyāma. Taṃ aggaṃ katvāti taṃ ādiṃ katvā.
tika-s0103t:235: 130. Pakāsetabbanti dosavasena pakāsetabbaṃ. Khipitabbanti khepaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tenāha “hāretabba”nti, sattanikāyato nīharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:237_0: 131. Akkharanti niruttiṃ. Sā hi mahājanena sammatoti niddhāretvā vattabbato nirutti,
tika-s0103t:237_1: tasmiṃyeva nirūḷhabhāvato, aññattha asañcaraṇato akkharanti ca vuccati, tathā saṅkhātabbato
tika-s0103t:237_2: saṅkhā, samaññāyatīti samaññā, paññāpanato paññatti, voharaṇato vohāro. Uppannoti
tika-s0103t:237_3: pavatto. Na kevalaṃ akkharamevāti na kevalaṃ samaññākaraṇameva. Khettasāminoti taṃ
tika-s0103t:237_4: taṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ pariggahetvā ṭhitasattā. Tīhi saṅkhehīti tividhakiriyābhisaṅkhatehi
tika-s0103t:237_5: tīhi saṅkhehi khattiyādīhi tīhi vaṇṇehi pariggahitehi. “Khattiyānuyantabrāhmaṇagahapatikanegamajānapadehi
tika-s0103t:237_6: tīhi gahapatīhi pariggahitehī”ti ca vadanti. Agganti ñātenāti aggaṃ kulanti ñātena.
tika-s0103t:237_7: Khattiyakulañhi loke sabbaseṭṭhaṃ. Yathāha “khattiyo seṭṭho janetasmiṃ, ye gottapaṭisārino”ti,
tika-s0103t:237_8: abhedopacārena pana akkharassa khattiyasaddassapi seṭṭhatāti pāḷiyaṃ “aggaññena akkharenā”ti
tika-s0103t:237_9: vuttaṃ. Idāni abhedopacārena vinā eva atthaṃ dassetuṃ “agge vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:239_0: 132. Yena anārambhabhāvena bāhitākusalā “brāhmaṇā”ti vuttā, tameva tāva dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t:239_2: vacanavipallāsena niddesoti āha “te ete”ti. Abhisaṅkharontāti cittamantabhāvena aññamaññaṃ
tika-s0103t:239_3: abhivisiṭṭhe karontā, brāhmaṇākappabhāvena saṅkharontā ca. Vācentāti paresaṃ kathentā,
tika-s0103t:239_4: ye tathā ganthe kātuṃ na jānanti. Acchantīti āsanti, upavisantīti attho. Tenāha “vasantī”ti.
tika-s0103t:239_5: Acchentīti kālaṃ khepenti. Hīnasammataṃ jhānabhāvanānuyogaṃ chaḍḍetvā ganthe pasutatādīpanato.
tika-s0103t:239_6: Seṭṭhasammataṃ jātaṃ “vedadharā sottiyā subrāhmaṇāti evaṃ seṭṭhasammataṃ jātaṃ.
tika-s0103t:240: 133. Methunadhammaṃ samādiyitvāti jāyāpatikabhāvena dvayaṃ dvayaṃ nivāsaṃ ajjhupagantvā. Vāṇijakammādiketi ādi-saddena kasikammādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0103t:241_1: ca. Suddanti ettha su-iti sīghatthe nipāto. Dā-iti garahaṇattheti āha “suddaṃ suddaṃ
tika-s0103t:242_0: 135. Ahūti kālavipallāsavasena vuttanti dassento “hoti kho”ti āha. Imināti “imehi
tika-s0103t:242_1: kho, vāseṭṭha, catūhi maṇḍalehi samaṇamaṇḍalassa abhinibbatti hotī”ti iminā vacanena.
tika-s0103t:242_2: Imaṃ dassetīti samaṇamaṇḍalaṃ nāma…pe… suddhiṃ pāpuṇantīti imaṃ atthajātaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:242_3: Yadi imehi…pe… abhinibbatti hoti, evaṃ sante imāneva cattāri maṇḍalāni padhānāni,
tika-s0103t:242_4: samaṇamaṇḍalaṃ appadhānaṃ tato abhinibbattattāti? Nayidamevanti dassetuṃ “imānī”tiādi
tika-s0103t:242_5: vuttaṃ. Samaṇamaṇḍalaṃ anuvattanti guṇehi visiṭṭhabhāvato. Guṇo hi viññūnaṃ anuvattanahetu,
tika-s0103t:242_6: na kolaputtiyaṃ, vaṇṇapokkharatā, vākkaraṇamattaṃ vā. Tenāha “dhammeneva anuvattanti,
tika-s0103t:242_7: no adhammenā”ti. So dhammo ca lokuttarova adhippeto, yena saṃsārato visujjhati, tasmā
tika-s0103t:242_8: samaṇamaṇḍalanti ca sāsanikameva samaṇagaṇaṃ vadatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “samaṇamaṇḍalañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:244_2: devayāno, yena yanti puttino visokā”tiādinā pavattitassa micchādiṭṭhisahagatakammassa.
tika-s0103t:244_3: Samādānaṃ tassa tathā pavattanaṃ, tassā vā diṭṭhiyā upagamanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:245_0: 137. Dvayakārīti kusalākusaladvayassa kattā. Tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekajjhaṃ nappavattati,
tika-s0103t:245_1: tasmā āha “kālenā”tiādi. Ekakkhaṇe ubhayavipākadānaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi ekasmiṃ khaṇe
tika-s0103t:245_2: cittadvayūpasañhitāya sattasantatiyā abhāvato. Yathā pana dvayakārino sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃveditā
tika-s0103t:245_3: sambhavati, taṃ dassetuṃ “yena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃbhūtoti vikalāvayavo. Dvepihi
tika-s0103t:245_4: kusalākusalakammāni katūpacitāni sabhāvato balavantāneva honti, tasmā maraṇakāle
tika-s0103t:245_5: upaṭṭhahanti. Tesu akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hoti paccayalābhato. Nikantiādayo hi paccayavisesā
tika-s0103t:245_6: akusalasseva sabhāgā, na kusalassa, tasmā katūpacitabhāvena samānabalesupi kusalākusalesu
tika-s0103t:245_7: paccayalābhena vipaccituṃ laddhokāsatāya kusalato akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hotīti, tathābhūtampi
tika-s0103t:245_8: taṃ yathā vipākadāne laddhokāsassa kusalassāpi avasaro hoti, tathā laddhapaccayaṃ
tika-s0103t:245_9: paṭisandhidānābhimukhaṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ
tika-s0103t:245_10: nibbattāpetīti. “Akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hotī”ti ettha “akusalaṃ ce balavataraṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:245_11: taṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā”ti vuttanayeneva atthaṃ vatvā tesu kusalaṃ ce balavataraṃ
tika-s0103t:245_12: hoti, tañca akusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā manussayoniyaṃ nibbattāpeti, akusalaṃ pavattivedanīyaṃ
tika-s0103t:245_13: hoti, atha naṃ taṃ kāṇampi karoti khujjampi pīṭhasappimpi kucchirogādīhi vā upaddutaṃ.
tika-s0103t:245_14: Evaṃ so pavattiyaṃ nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhavatīti idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī
tika-s0103t:245_15: hotī”ti. Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo – vuttakāle vā kārena samānabalesu kusalākusalakammesu
tika-s0103t:245_16: upaṭṭhahantesu maraṇassa āsannavelāyaṃ yadi balavatarāni kusalajavanāni javanti,
tika-s0103t:245_17: yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ akusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā kusalaṃ vuttanayena paṭisandhiṃ deti. Atha balavatarāni
tika-s0103t:245_18: akusalajavanāni javanti, yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ kusalaṃ paṭibāhitvā akusalaṃ vuttanayeneva
tika-s0103t:245_19: paṭisandhiṃ deti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Ubhinnaṃ kammānaṃ samānabalavabhāvato, paccayantarasāpekkhato
tika-s0103t:247_0: 138. Bodhi vuccati maggasammādiṭṭhi, cattāri ariyasaccāni bujjhatīti katvā, sabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:247_1: taṃsabhāvato ca tassā pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā, sativīriyādayo dhammā, tesaṃ
tika-s0103t:247_3: anukkamena pavattaṃ bhāvanaṃ patvā. Tenāha “paṭipajjitvā”ti. Saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
tika-s0103t:247_4: vasena khīṇāsavassa seṭṭhabhāvaṃ lokassa pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ sakkā, na itarāya
tika-s0103t:247_5: sabbaso apaññattibhāvūpagamane tassa adassanatoti vuttaṃ “parinibbātīti kilesaparinibbānena
tika-s0103t:249_1: bhāsitvā. Suttantaṃ vinivattetvāti pubbe lokiyadhammasandassanavasena pavattaṃ aggaññasuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:249_2: “sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanamanvāyā”tiādinā tato vinivattetvā nīharitvā
tika-s0103t:249_3: tena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā. Āvajjantāti samannāharantā. Anumajjantāti pubbenāparaṃ atthato vicarantāti.
tika-s0103t:255_0: 141. Pāvārenti sañchādenti sarīraṃ etenāti pāvāro, vatthaṃ. Pāvaraṇaṃ vā pāvāro,
tika-s0103t:255_1: “vatthaṃ dussa”nti pariyāyasaddā eteti dussameva pāvāro, so etassa bahuvidho anekakoṭippabhedo
tika-s0103t:255_2: bhaṇḍabhūto atthīti dussapāvāriko. So kira pubbe daharakāle dussapāvārabhaṇḍameva
tika-s0103t:255_3: bahuṃ pariggahetvā vāṇijjaṃ akāsi, tena naṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhitampi “pāvāriko” tveva
tika-s0103t:255_4: sañjānanti. Bhagavatīti iti-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
tika-s0103t:255_5: therena vuttavacanaṃ sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. “Kasmā evaṃ avocā”ti tathāvacane kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:255_6: pucchitvā “somanassapavedanattha”nti kasmā payojanaṃ vissajjitaṃ, tayidaṃ ambaṃ puṭṭhassa
tika-s0103t:255_7: labujaṃ byākaraṇasadisanti? Nayidamevaṃ cintetabbaṃ. Yā hissa therassa tadā bhagavati
tika-s0103t:255_8: somanassuppatti, sā niddhāritarūpā kāraṇabhāvena coditā, tasmā evaṃ avocāti, sā eva
tika-s0103t:255_9: ca yasmā niddhāritarūpā pavedanavasena bhagavato sammukhā tathāvacanaṃ payojeti,
tika-s0103t:256: Tatrāti tasmiṃ somanassapavedane. Vihāre nivāsaparivattanavasena sunivatthanivāsano. Ābhujitvāti ābandhitvā.
tika-s0103t:257_0: Samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “aho santo vatāyaṃ ariyavihāro”ti samāpattisukhapaccavekkhaṇamukhena
tika-s0103t:257_1: attano guṇe anussarituṃ āraddho, ārabhitvā ca nesaṃ taṃ taṃ sāmaññavisesavibhāgavasena
tika-s0103t:257_2: anussari. Tathā hi “samādhī”ti sāmaññato gahitasseva “paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādinā visesavibhāgo,
tika-s0103t:257_4: “Lokiyābhiññāsu dibbacakkhuñāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ therassa itarehi sātisayanti dassetu”nti
tika-s0103t:257_6: lakkhaṇahāravasena vā itaresaṃ pettha gahitatā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:258_3: niruttiyaṃ pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā. Paṭibhānappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthāna
tika-s0103t:258_4: karaṇasamatthaṃ paṭibhāne pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-s0103t:258_5: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge, taṃ saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Sāvakavisaye
tika-s0103t:258_6: paramukkaṃsagataṃ ñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya sabbañeyyadhammesu.
tika-s0103t:258_7: Tassāpi hi visuṃ parikammaṃ nāma natthi, sāvakapāramiyā pana sammadeva paripūritattā
tika-s0103t:259_0: Bhagavato sīlaṃ nissāya guṇe anussaritumāraddhoti yojanā. Yasmā guṇānaṃ bahubhāvato
tika-s0103t:259_1: nesaṃ ekajjhaṃ āpāthāgamanaṃ natthi, sati ca tasmiṃ anirūpitarūpeneva anussaraṇena
tika-s0103t:259_2: bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā thero savisaye ṭhatvā te anupadaṃ sarūpato anussari, anussaranto
tika-s0103t:259_3: ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ sīlaṃ anussari, taṃ dassento “bhagavato sīlaṃ nissāyā”ti āha, sīlaṃ
tika-s0103t:259_4: ārabbhāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Yasmā cettha thero ekekavasena bhagavato
tika-s0103t:259_5: guṇe anussaritvā tato paraṃ catukkapañcakādivasena anussari, tasmā “cattāro iddhipāde”ti
tika-s0103t:259_6: vatvā tato paraṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvanāsāmaññena indriyesu vattabbesu tāni aggahetvā “cattāro
tika-s0103t:259_7: magge”tiādi vuttaṃ. Catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ mahāsīhanādasutte āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:260_0: Padhāniyaṅgādayo saṅgīti dasuttarasuttesu āgamissanti. Cha sāraṇīya dhammā parinibbānasutte
tika-s0103t:260_1: āgatā eva. Sukhaṃ supanādayo ekādasa mettānisaṃsā. “Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā
tika-s0103t:260_2: saṃ. ni. 5.1081, mahāva. 15, paṭi. ma. 2.30) catūsu ariyasaccesu tiparivattavasena
tika-s0103t:260_3: āgatā dvādasa dhammacakkākārā. Maggaphalesu pavattāni aṭṭha ñāṇāni, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni
tika-s0103t:260_4: cāti cuddasa buddhañāṇāni. Pañcadasa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammā meghiyasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:260_5: gahetabbā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati ānāpānassatisutte, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā evaṃ veditabbā –
tika-s0103t:261_0: Atītaṃse buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, anāgataṃse, paccuppannaṃse buddhassa
tika-s0103t:261_1: bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ. Imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0103t:261_2: sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ, sabbaṃ manokammaṃ
tika-s0103t:261_3: ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti. Imehi chahi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0103t:261_4: natthi chandassa hāni, natthi dhammadesanāya hāni, natthi vīriyassa hāni, natthi
tika-s0103t:261_5: samādhissa hāni, natthi paññāya hāni, natthi vimuttiyā hāni. Imehi dvādasahi dhammehi
tika-s0103t:261_6: samannāgatassa buddhassa bhagavato natthi davā, natthi ravā, natthi apphuṭṭhaṃ, natthi
tika-s0103t:262_0: Tattha “natthi davāti khiḍḍādhippāyena kiriyā natthi. Natthi ravāti sahasā kiriyā
tika-s0103t:262_1: natthī”ti vadanti. Sahasā pana kiriyā davā, “aññaṃ karissāmī”ti aññassa karaṇaṃ ravā.
tika-s0103t:262_2: Natthi apphuṭanti ñāṇena aphusitaṃ natthi. Natthi vegāyitattanti turitakiriyā natthi.
tika-s0103t:262_3: Natthi abyāvaṭamanoti niratthakacittasamudācāro natthi. Natthi appaṭisaṅkhānupekkhāti
tika-s0103t:262_4: aññāṇupekkhā natthi. Keci pana “natthi dhammadesanāya hānī”ti apaṭhitvā “natthi chandassa
tika-s0103t:262_5: hāni, natthi vīriyassa hāni, natthi satiyā [sattiyā ] hānī”ti paṭhanti.
tika-s0103t:263: Jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ catusaccayojanāvasena pavattāni catucattālīsa ñāṇāniyeva sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ñāṇavatthūni. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0103t:264_0: “Yato kho bhikkhave ariyasāvako evaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ pajānāti, evaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayaṃ
tika-s0103t:264_1: pajānāti, evaṃ jarāmaraṇanirodhaṃ pajānāti, evaṃ jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:265: Jarāmaraṇasamudayoti cettha jāti adhippetā. Sesapadesu bhavādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:267_0: “Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ñāṇaṃ, “asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇa”nti ñāṇaṃ, atītampi
tika-s0103t:267_1: addhānaṃ “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ñāṇaṃ, “asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇa”nti ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:267_2: anāgatampi addhānaṃ “jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”nti ñāṇaṃ, “asati jātiyā natthi jarāmaraṇa”nti
tika-s0103t:267_3: ñāṇaṃ. “Yampi idaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, tampi khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ
tika-s0103t:267_4: nirodhadhamma”nti ñāṇanti evaṃ jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ
tika-s0103t:267_5: satta satta katvā sattasattati ñāṇavatthūni veditabbāni. Tattha yampīti chabbidhampi
tika-s0103t:267_6: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vipassanārammaṇabhāvena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti
tika-s0103t:267_7: chapi ñāṇāni saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ. “Khayadhamma”ntiādinā pana pakārena pavattañāṇassa
tika-s0103t:267_8: dassanaṃ, vipassanādassanato vipassanā paṭivipassanādassanamattamevāti na taṃ “aṅga”nti
tika-s0103t:267_9: vadanti, pāḷiyaṃ pana sabbattha ñāṇavasena aṅgānaṃ vuttattā “nirodhadhammanti ñāṇa”nti
tika-s0103t:267_10: iti-saddena pakāsetvā vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ ñāṇanti ayamattho dissati. Na
tika-s0103t:267_11: hi yampi idaṃ dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, tampi ñāṇanti sambandho hoti ñāṇaggahaṇena etasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:267_13: cāti. Catuvīsati…pe… vajirañāṇanti ettha keci tāva āhu “bhagavā devasikaṃ dvādasakoṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ
tika-s0103t:267_15: samāpajjati, tāsaṃ purecaraṃ, sahavacarañca ñāṇaṃ paṭipakkhehi abhejjataṃ, mahattañca
tika-s0103t:268: ‘Tathāgataṃ, bhikkhave, arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ dve vitakkā bahulaṃ samudācaranti – khemo ca vitakko, paviveko ca vitakko’ti.
tika-s0103t:269_0: Khemavitakko hi bhagavato mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ pūretvā ṭhito, pavivekavitakko arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ.
tika-s0103t:269_1: Buddhānañhi bhavaṅgaparivāso lahuko, matthakappatto samāpattīsu vasībhāvo, tasmā
tika-s0103t:269_3: catasso arūpasamāpattiyo appamaññāsamāpattiyā saddhiṃ dasa, nirodhasamāpatti, arahattaphalasamāpatti
tika-s0103t:269_4: cāti dvādasetā samāpattiyo bhagavā paccekaṃ divase divase koṭisatasahassakkhattuṃ
tika-s0103t:270_0: Apare pana “yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhidivase pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppādamukhena
tika-s0103t:270_1: paṭilomanayena jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ ārabhantena
tika-s0103t:270_2: yathā nāma puriso suviduggaṃ mahāgahanaṃ mahāvanaṃ chindanto antarantarā nisānasilāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:270_3: pharasuṃ sunisitaṃ karoti, evameva nisānasilāsadisiyo samāpattiyo antarantarā samāpajjitvā
tika-s0103t:270_4: ñāṇassa tikkhavisadasūrabhāvaṃ sampādetuṃ anulomapaṭilomato paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgavasena
tika-s0103t:270_5: sammasanto divase divase lakkhakoṭilakkhakoṭiphalasamāpattiyo samāpajjati, taṃ sandhāya
tika-s0103t:270_6: vuttaṃ ‘catuvīsati…pe… mahāvajirañāṇaṃ nissāyā’ti”. Nanu bhagavato samāpattisamāpajjane
tika-s0103t:270_7: parikamme payojanaṃ natthīti? Nayidaṃ ekantikaṃ. Tathā hi vedanāpaṭippaṇāmanādīsu
tika-s0103t:270_8: savisesaṃ parikammapubbaṅgamena samāpattiyo samāpajji. Apare pana “lokiyasamāpattisamāpajjane
tika-s0103t:270_9: parikammena payojanaṃ natthi. Lokuttarasamāpattisamāpajjane tajjaṃ parikammaṃ icchitabbamevā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0103t:271_0: “Aparamparā”ti padaṃ yesaṃ desanāya atthi, te aparampariyāva. Kusalapaññattiyanti
tika-s0103t:271_1: kusaladhammānaṃ paññāpane. Anuttaroti uttamo. Upanissaye ṭhatvāti ñāṇūpanissaye ṭhatvā
tika-s0103t:271_2: yādiso pubbūpanissayo pubbayogo, tattha patiṭṭhāya. Mahantato saddahati paṭipakkhavigamena
tika-s0103t:271_3: ñāṇassa viya saddhāyapi tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito. Avasesaarahantehīti pakatisāvakehi.
tika-s0103t:271_4: Asīti mahātherā paramatthadīpaniyaṃ theragāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ nāmato uddhaṭā. Cattāro
tika-s0103t:271_6: sāriputtatthero paññāya visiṭṭhabhāvato. Sāriputtattheratopi eko paccekabuddho tikkhavisadañāṇo
tika-s0103t:271_7: abhinīhāramahantatāya sambhatañāṇasambhārattā. Satipi paccekabodhiyā avisesesu bahūsu
tika-s0103t:271_8: ekajjhaṃ sannipatitesu pubbayogavasena lokiye visaye siyā kassaci ñāṇassa visiṭṭhatāti
tika-s0103t:271_9: dassetuṃ “sace panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Sabbaññubuddhova buddhaguṇe mahantato saddahatī”ti
tika-s0103t:271_10: idaṃ heṭṭhā āgatadesanāsotavasena vuttaṃ. Buddhā hi buddhaguṇe mahattaṃ paccakkhatova
tika-s0103t:272_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “seyyathāpi nāmā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Gambhīro
tika-s0103t:272_1: uttānoti gambhīro vā uttāno vāti jānanatthaṃ. “Evamevā”tiādi yathādassitāya upamāya
tika-s0103t:272_2: upameyyena saṃsandanaṃ. Buddhaguṇesu appamattavisayampi lokiyamahājanassa ñāṇaṃ apavattitarūpeneva
tika-s0103t:272_3: pavattati anavattitasabhāvattāti vuttaṃ “ekabyāma…pe… veditabbā”ti. Tattha ñātaudakaṃ
tika-s0103t:272_4: viyāti pamāṇato ñātaudakaṃ viya. Ariyānaṃ pana tattha attano visaye pavattanakañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:272_5: pavattitarūpeneva pavattati attano paṭivedhānurūpaṃ, abhinīhārānurūpañca avattitasabhāvattāti
tika-s0103t:272_7: ñāṇaṃ sātisayaṃ, mahānubhāvañca hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ sotāpannañāṇassa dasabyāmaudakaṃ
tika-s0103t:272_8: opammabhāvena dassetvā tato paresaṃ dasuttaradiguṇadasaguṇaasītiguṇavisiṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ
tika-s0103t:272_9: opammaṃ katvā dassitaṃ. Nanu evaṃ sante buddhaguṇā parimitaparicchinnā, therena ca
tika-s0103t:272_10: te paricchijja ñātāti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjatīti dassento “tattha yathā so puriso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:272_11: Tattha so purisoti so caturāsītibyāmasahassappamāṇena yottena caturāsītibyāmasahassaṭṭhāne
tika-s0103t:272_12: mahāsamudde udakaṃ minitvā ṭhito puriso. So hi therassa upamābhāvena gahito. Dhammanvayenāti
tika-s0103t:272_13: anumānañāṇena. Tañhi siddhaṃ dhammaṃ anugantvā pavattanato “dhammanvayo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0103t:272_14: tathā anvayavasena atthassa bujjhanato anvayabuddhi, anumeyyaṃ anuminotīti anumānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:272_15: nidassane diṭṭhanayena anumeyyaṃ gaṇhātīti “nayaggāho”ti ca vuccati. Tenāha “dhammanvayenā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:272_16: Svāyaṃ dhammanvayo na yassa kassaci hoti, atha kho tathārūpassa aggasāvakassevāti
tika-s0103t:272_17: āha “sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā”ti. Yadi thero buddhaguṇe ekadesato paccakkhe katvā
tika-s0103t:272_18: tadaññe nayaggāhena gaṇhi, nanu evaṃ sante buddhaguṇā parimitaparicchinnā āpannāti?
tika-s0103t:273_0: “Saddahatī”ti vatvā puna tamevatthaṃ vibhāvento “therena hi…pe… bahutarā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:273_1: Kathaṃ panāyamattho evaṃ daṭṭhabboti evaṃ adhippāyabhedakaṃ upamāya saññāpetuṃ “yathā
tika-s0103t:273_2: kathaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ “upamāyamidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānantī”ti
tika-s0103t:273_3: ito nava ito navāti ito majjhaṭṭhānato yāva dakkhiṇatīrā nava ito majjhaṭṭhānato
tika-s0103t:273_4: yāva uttaratīrā nava. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ “buddhopī”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0103t:274: Yamakayugaḷamahānadīmahogho viyāti dvinnaṃ ekato samāgatattā yugaḷabhūtānaṃ mahānadīnaṃ mahogho viya.
tika-s0103t:275_0: Anucchavikaṃ katvāti yoyaṃ mama pasādo buddhaguṇe ārabbha ogāḷho hutvā uppanno, taṃ
tika-s0103t:275_1: anucchavikaṃ anurūpaṃ katvā. Paṭiggahetuṃ sampaṭicchituṃ añño koci na sakkhissati
tika-s0103t:275_2: yāthāvato anavabujjhanato. Paṭiggahetuṃ sakkoti tassa hetuto, paccayato, sabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:275_3: kiccato, phalato sammadeva paṭivijjhanato. Pūrattanti puṇṇabhāvo. Paggharaṇakāleti
tika-s0103t:275_4: vikiraṇakāle, patanakāleti attho. “Pasanno”ti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti
tika-s0103t:275_5: “uppannasaddho”ti imināpi saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha “evaṃ saddahāmīti
tika-s0103t:275_6: attho”ti. Abhiññāyatīti abhiñño, adhiko abhiñño bhiyyobhiñño, so eva atisayavacanicchāvasena
tika-s0103t:275_7: “bhiyyobhiññataro”ti vuttoti āha “bhiyyataro abhiññāto”ti. Dutiyavikappe pana abhijānātīti
tika-s0103t:275_8: abhiññā, abhivisiṭṭhā paññā, bhiyyo abhiññā etassāti bhiyyobhiñño, so eva atisayavacanicchāvasena
tika-s0103t:275_9: bhiyyobhiññataro, svāyamassa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha “bhiyyatarābhiñño
tika-s0103t:275_10: vā”ti. Sambujjhati etāyāti sambodhi, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇañca. Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
tika-s0103t:275_11: aggamaggañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sambodhi nāma. Tattha
tika-s0103t:275_12: padhānavasena tadatthadassane paṭhamavikappo, padaṭṭhānavasena dutiyavikappo. Kasmā
tika-s0103t:275_13: panettha arahattamaggañāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ, nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni
tika-s0103t:275_14: savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni. Savāsanappahānañhi ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti?
tika-s0103t:275_15: Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha “arahattamaggañāṇe
tika-s0103t:275_16: vā”ti. Aggamaggavasena cettha ariyānaṃ bodhittayapāripūrīti dassetuṃ “arahattamaggeneva
tika-s0103t:275_17: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nippadesāti anavasesā. Gahitā hontīti arahattamaggena gahitena adhigatena
tika-s0103t:275_18: gahitā adhigatā honti. Sabbanti tehi adhigantabbaṃ. Tenāti sambodhinā sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānena
tika-s0103t:276_0: 142. Khādanīyānaṃ uḷāratā sātarasānubhāvenāti āha “madhure āgacchatī”ti. Pasaṃsāya
tika-s0103t:276_1: uḷāratā visiṭṭhabhāvenāti āha “seṭṭhe”ti, obhāsassa uḷāratā mahantabhāvenāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:276_2: “vipule”ti. Usabhassa ayanti āsabhī, idha pana āsabhī viyāti āsabhī. Tenāha “usabhassa
tika-s0103t:276_3: vācāsadisī”ti. Yena pana guṇenassā taṃsadisatā, taṃ dassetuṃ “acalā asampavedhī”ti
tika-s0103t:276_4: vuttaṃ. Yato kutoci anussavanaṃ anussavo. Vijjāṭṭhānesu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ
tika-s0103t:276_5: taṃ tamatthaṃ viññāpentī paveṇī ācariyaparamparā. Kevalaṃ attano matiyā “itikira
tika-s0103t:276_6: evaṃkirā”ti parikappanā itikira. Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato sayaṃ sampadānabhāvena
tika-s0103t:276_7: gahaṇaṃ piṭakasampadānaṃ. Yathāsutānaṃ atthānaṃ ākārassa parivitakkanaṃ ākāraparivitakko.
tika-s0103t:276_9: vinā takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ takko. Anumānavidhiṃ nissāya nayaggāho. Yasmā buddhavisaye
tika-s0103t:276_10: ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā, therassa ca so avisayo, tasmā “paccakkhato
tika-s0103t:276_11: ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viyā”ti vuttaṃ. Sīhanādo viyāti sīhanādo, taṃsadisatā cassa
tika-s0103t:276_12: seṭṭhabhāvena, so cettha evaṃ veditabboti dassento “sīhanādo”tiādimāha. Neva dandhāyantenāti
tika-s0103t:277_0: Anuyogadāpanatthanti anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato
tika-s0103t:277_1: tattha anuyogaṃ sodheti nāma. Anuyuñjanto ca naṃ sodhāpeti nāma. Dātunti sodhetuṃ.
tika-s0103t:277_2: Keci “dānattha”nti atthaṃ vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhanādaṃ nadati, so eva
tika-s0103t:277_3: tattha anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati. Nighaṃsananti vimaddanaṃ. Dhamamānanti tāpayamānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:277_4: tāpanañcettha gaggariyā dhamāpanasīsena vadati. Sabbe teti sabbe te atīte niruddhe
tika-s0103t:277_5: sammāsambuddhe, tenetaṃ dasseti – ye te ahesuṃ atītaṃ addhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato
tika-s0103t:277_6: oraṃ sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya
tika-s0103t:277_7: buddhānaṃ lokiyacittacāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. Ye pana te abbhatītā tato parato chinnavaṭumā
tika-s0103t:277_8: chinnapapañcā pariyādiṇṇavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ sabbesampi
tika-s0103t:278_0: Anāgatabuddhānaṃ panāti pana-saddo visesatthajotano, tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:278_1: bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati, anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu
tika-s0103t:278_2: kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti. Tenāha “anāgatāpī”tiādi. “Cittena paricchinditvā viditā”ti
tika-s0103t:278_3: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo,
tika-s0103t:278_4: na tato paranti? Nayidaṃ cetopariyañāṇakiccavasena vuttaṃ, atha kho pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsañāṇavasena
tika-s0103t:279_0: Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā, setughātato
tika-s0103t:279_1: ca. Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi, na vibhajja byākāsīti āha
tika-s0103t:279_2: “thero kirā”tiādi. Pāraṃ pariyantaṃ minotīti pāramī, sā eva ñāṇanti pāramiñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:279_3: sāvakānaṃ pāramiñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ. Sāvakānaṃ ukkaṃsapariyantagate jānane
tika-s0103t:279_4: nāyaṃ anuyogo, atha kho sabbaññutaññāṇe sabbaññutāya jānane. Keci pana “sāvakapāramiñāṇeti
tika-s0103t:279_5: sāvakapāramiñāṇavisaye”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Tathā sesapadesupi. Sīla..pe… samatthanti
tika-s0103t:280_0: 143. Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayapiṭṭhikaṃ ahutvā “idamida”nti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ
tika-s0103t:280_1: dhāreti nicchinotīti dhammo, paccakkhañāṇanti āha “dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassā”ti.
tika-s0103t:280_2: Anuetīti anvayoti āha “anuyogaṃ anugantvā”ti. Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā
tika-s0103t:280_3: anumānañāṇassa pavatti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumānanti veditabbo. Vidite vedakampi
tika-s0103t:280_4: ñāṇaṃ atthato viditameva hotīti “anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito”ti vuttaṃ. Viditoti
tika-s0103t:280_5: viddho paṭiladdho, adhigatoti attho. Appamāṇoti aparimāṇo mahāvisayattā. Tenāha “apariyanto”ti.
tika-s0103t:280_6: Tenāti apariyantattā, tena vā apariyantena ñāṇena, eteneva thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ
tika-s0103t:280_7: ñātukāmo hoti, tattha tatthassa asaṅgamappaṭihaṭaanumānañāṇaṃ pavattatīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:280_8: Tenāha “so iminā”tiādi. Tattha imināti iminā kāraṇena. Pākārassa thirabhāvaṃ uddhamuddhaṃ
tika-s0103t:280_9: āpetīti uddhāpaṃ, pākāramūlaṃ. Ādi-saddena pākāradvārabandhaparikhādīnaṃ saṅgaho
tika-s0103t:280_10: veditabbo. Paccante bhavaṃ paccantimaṃ. Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero attānaṃ
tika-s0103t:280_11: dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Yassā paññāya
tika-s0103t:280_12: vasena puriso “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti āha “paṇḍiccena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0103t:280_13: Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo veyyattiyaṃ. Medhati sammosaṃ hiṃsati
tika-s0103t:280_14: vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti medhāvī. Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti
tika-s0103t:280_15: ṭhānuppattikā, ṭhānaso uppajjanakapaññā. Anupariyāyanti etenāti anupariyāyo, so eva
tika-s0103t:280_16: pathoti anupariyāyapatho, parito pākārassa anusaṃyāyanamaggo. Pākārabhāgā sandhātabbā
tika-s0103t:280_17: etthāti pākārasandhi, pākārassa phullitappadeso. So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi
tika-s0103t:280_18: iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti. Chinnaṭṭhānanti
tika-s0103t:281_0: Kiliṭṭhanti malīnaṃ. Upatāpentīti kilesapariḷāhena santāpenti. Vibādhentīti pīḷenti.
tika-s0103t:281_1: Uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha “anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ
tika-s0103t:281_2: na dentī”ti. Tasmāti paccayūpaghātena uppajjituṃ appadānato. Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0103t:281_3: suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittāti catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā.
tika-s0103t:281_4: Yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvāti aviparītasabhāvena yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti, evaṃ bhāvetvā.
tika-s0103t:282_0: Purimanaye satipaṭṭhānāni, bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:282_1: vuttaṃ. Missakāti samathavipassanāmaggavasena missakā. “Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittā”tiādito
tika-s0103t:282_2: vuttattā satipaṭṭhāne vipassanāti gahetvā “satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvā”ti
tika-s0103t:282_3: vuttattā, maggapariyāpannānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nippariyāyabojjhaṅgabhāvato, tesu ca sabbaso
tika-s0103t:282_4: adhigatesu lokanāthena sabbaññutaññāṇampi adhigatameva hotīti “bojjhaṅge maggo, sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti
tika-s0103t:282_5: gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā”ti mahāsivatthero āha, na panevaṃ gahitaṃ porāṇehīti
tika-s0103t:283_0: Tatthāti tesu paccantanagarādīsu. Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ tadatthikehi upagantabbato,
tika-s0103t:283_1: upagatānañca parissayarahitasukhādhigamanaṭṭhānato. Pākāro viya sīlaṃ tadupagatānaṃ
tika-s0103t:283_2: parito ārakkhabhāvato. Pariyāyapatho viya hirī sīlapākārassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0103t:283_3: “pariyāyapathoti kho bhikkhu hiriyā etaṃ adhivacana”nti. Dvāraṃ viya ariyamaggo nibbānanagarappavesanaañjasabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:283_4: Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati nibbānanagarapaviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato.
tika-s0103t:284_1: idaṃ yasmā thero paribbājako hutvā tato pubbeva nibbānapariyesanaṃ caramāno te te
tika-s0103t:284_2: pāsaṇḍino upasaṅkamitvā nibbānaṃ pucchi, te nāssa cittaṃ ārādhesuṃ, taṃ sandhāya
tika-s0103t:284_3: vuttaṃ. Te pana pāsaṇḍā heṭṭhā vuttā eva. Tatthevāti tassayeva bhāgineyyassa desiyamānāya
tika-s0103t:284_4: desanāya. Parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ
tika-s0103t:284_5: akāsi adhigacchi. Uttaruttaranti heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa uttaraṇato atikkamanato
tika-s0103t:284_6: uttaruttaraṃ, tato eva padhānabhāvaṃ pāpitatāya paṇītapaṇītaṃ. Uttaruttaranti vā
tika-s0103t:284_7: uparūpari. Paṇītapaṇītanti paṇītataraṃ, paṇītatamañcāti attho. Kaṇhanti kāḷakaṃ saṃkilesadhammaṃ.
tika-s0103t:284_8: Sukkanti odātaṃ vodānadhammaṃ. Savipakkhaṃ katvāti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvadassanavasena
tika-s0103t:284_9: yathākkamaṃ ubhayaṃ savipakkhaṃ katvā. “Ayaṃ kaṇhadhammo, imassa ayaṃ pahāyako”ti
tika-s0103t:284_10: evaṃ kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā desanāvasena nīharitvā sukkaṃ, “ayaṃ sukkadhammo, iminā ayaṃ
tika-s0103t:284_11: pahātabbo”ti evaṃ sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhaṃ. Saussāhanti phaluppādanasamatthatāvasena
tika-s0103t:285_0: Tasmiṃ desite dhammeti tasmiṃ vuttanayena bhagavā tumhehi desite dhamme ekaccaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0103t:285_1: nāma sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā. Taṃjānane hi vutte catusaccadhammajānanaṃ
tika-s0103t:285_3: Vipakkho pana parato āgamissati. Etthāti “dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ agama”nti etasmiṃ pade.
tika-s0103t:285_4: Therasallāpoti therānaṃ sallāpasadiso vinicchayavādo. Kāḷavallavāsīti kāḷavallavihāravāsī.
tika-s0103t:285_5: Idānīti etarahi “idāhaṃ bhante”tiādivacanakāle. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti “dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0103t:285_6: agama”nti imasmiṃ padese, imasmiṃ vā niṭṭhānakāraṇabhūte yoniso parivitakkane. “Imasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:285_7: pana ṭhāne buddhaguṇesu niṭṭhaṅgato”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu sāvakapāramiñāṇasamadhigatakāle
tika-s0103t:285_8: eva thero buddhaguṇesu niṭṭhaṅgatoti? Saccametaṃ, idāni pana taṃ pākaṭaṃ jātanti
tika-s0103t:285_9: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbanti “catusaccadhammesū”tiādi sumattherena vuttaṃ sabbaṃ. Arahatte
tika-s0103t:285_10: niṭṭhaṅgatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva anuyogaparihārā veditabbā. Yadipi dhammasenāpati
tika-s0103t:285_11: “sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ mayā samadhigata”nti ito pubbepi jānātiyeva, idāni pana asaṅkhyeyyāparimeyyabhede
tika-s0103t:285_12: buddhaguṇe nayaggāhavasena pariggahetvā kiccasiddhiyā tasmiṃ ñāṇe niṭṭhaṅgato ahosīti
tika-s0103t:286_0: Buddhaguṇā pana nayato āgatā, te nayaggāhato yāthāvato jānanto sāvakapāramiñāṇe tathājānanavasena
tika-s0103t:286_1: niṭṭhaṅgatattā sāvakapāramiñāṇameva tassa aparāparuppattivasena, tena tena bhāvetabbakiccabahutāvasena
tika-s0103t:286_2: ca “dhammesū”ti puthuvacanena vuttaṃ. Anantāparimeyyānaṃ anaññavisayānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t:286_3: nayato pariggaṇhanena therassa sātisayo bhagavati pasādo uppajjatīti āha “bhiyyosomattāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:286_4: “Suṭṭhu akkhāto”ti vatvā taṃ evassa suṭṭhu akkhātataṃ dassetuṃ “niyyāniko maggo”ti
tika-s0103t:286_5: vuttaṃ. Svākkhātatā hi dhammassa yadatthaṃ desito, tadatthasādhanena veditabbā. Phalatthāya
tika-s0103t:286_7: pavattatīti attho. Vaṭṭacārakato niyyātīti vā niyyāniko, niyyānasīloti vā. Rāgadosamohanimmadanasamatthoti
tika-s0103t:286_8: idhāpi “pasannosmi bhagavatīti dassetī”ti ānetvā sambandho. Vaṅkādīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0103t:286_9: jimhakuṭile, aññe ca paṭipattidose saṅgaṇhāti. Bhagavā tumhākaṃ buddhasubuddhatā
tika-s0103t:286_10: viya dhammasudhammatā, saṅghasuppaṭipatti ca dhammesu niṭṭhaṅgamanena sāvakapāramiñāṇe
tika-s0103t:286_11: niṭṭhaṅgatattā mayhaṃ suṭṭhu vibhūtā supākaṭā jātāti dassento thero “svākkhāto bhagavatā
tika-s0103t:288_0: 145. Anuttarabhāvoti seṭṭhabhāvo. Anuttaro bhagavā yena guṇena, so anuttarabhāvo,
tika-s0103t:288_1: taṃ anuttariyaṃ. Yasmā tassāpi guṇassa kiñci uttaritaraṃ natthi eva, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:288_2: “sā tumhākaṃ desanā anuttarāti vadatī”ti. Kusalesu dhammesūti kusaladhammanimittaṃ.
tika-s0103t:288_3: Nimittatthe hi etaṃ bhummaṃ, tasmā kusaladhammadesanāhetupi bhagavāva anuttaroti
tika-s0103t:288_4: attho. Bhūmiṃ dassentoti visayaṃ dassento. Kusaladhammadesanāya hi kusalā dhammā
tika-s0103t:288_5: visayo. Vuttapadeti “kusalesu dhammesū”ti evaṃ vuttavākye, evaṃ vā vuttadhammakoṭṭhāse.
tika-s0103t:288_6: “Pañcadhā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu chekaṭṭhenapi kusalaṃ icchitabbaṃ “kusalo tvaṃ rathassa
tika-s0103t:288_7: aṅgapaccaṅgāna”ntiādīsūti ? Saccametaṃ, so pana chekaṭṭho kosallasambhūtaṭṭheneva
tika-s0103t:288_8: saṅgahitoti visuṃ na gahito. “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmaya”nti jātake
tika-s0103t:288_9: āgatattā “jātakapariyāyaṃ patvā ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Taṃ kiṃ
tika-s0103t:288_10: maññatha, gahapatayo, ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vā sāvajjā vā anavajjā vā”tiādīsu
tika-s0103t:288_12: patvā anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Abhidhamme “kosalla”nti paññā āgatāti yonisomanasikārahetukassa
tika-s0103t:288_14: upacitattā”ti vatvā iṭṭhavipākaniddisanato sukhavipākaṭṭho ca abhidhammanayasiddhoti
tika-s0103t:288_15: āha “abhidhamma…pe… vipākaṭṭhenā”ti. Bāhitikasutte bhagavato kāyasamācārādike vaṇṇentena
tika-s0103t:288_16: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “yo kho mahārāja kāyasamācāro anavajjo”ti kusalo kāyasamācāro
tika-s0103t:288_17: rañño pasenadissa vutto. Na hi bhagavato sukhavipākakammaṃ atthīti sabbasāvajjarahitā
tika-s0103t:288_18: kāyasamācārādayo “kusalā”ti vuttā, idha pana “kusalesu dhammesū”ti bodhipakkhiyadhammā
tika-s0103t:288_19: “kusalā”ti vuttā, te ca samathavipassanā maggasampayuttā ekantena sukhavipākā evāti
tika-s0103t:288_20: avajjarahitatāmattaṃ upādāya anavajjattho kusala-saddoti āha “imasmiṃ pana…pe… daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-s0103t:288_21: Evañca katvā “phalasatipaṭṭhānaṃ pana idha anadhippeta”nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ
tika-s0103t:289_2: cassa catubbidhatā. Ijjhanaṭṭhenāti nippajjanasabhāvena. Chandādayo eva iddhipādesu
tika-s0103t:289_3: visiṭṭhasabhāvā, itare avisiṭṭhā, tesampi viseso chandādikatoti āha “chandādivasena nānāsabhāvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:290_4: attano sabhāvena. Hetuṭṭhenāti nibbānassa sampāpakahetubhāvena. Dassanādināti dassanābhiniropanapariggahasamuṭṭhāpanavodāpanapaggahupaṭṭhānasamādhānasaṅkhātena attano sabhāvena.
tika-s0103t:291_0: Sāsanassa pariyosānadassanatthanti sāsanaṃ nāma nippariyāyato sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā.
tika-s0103t:291_1: Tattha ye samathavipassanāsahagatā, te sāsanassa ādi, maggapariyāpannā majjhe, phalabhūtā
tika-s0103t:292_0: Puna etadānuttariyaṃ bhanteti yathāraddhāya desanāya nigamanaṃ. Vuttasseva atthassa
tika-s0103t:292_1: puna vacanañhi nigamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ desananti taṃ kusalesu dhammesu desanāppakāraṃ,
tika-s0103t:292_2: desanāvidhiṃ, desetabbañca, sakalaṃ vā sampuṇṇaṃ anavasesaṃ abhijānāti abhivisiṭṭhena
tika-s0103t:292_3: ñāṇena jānāti, asesaṃ abhijānanato eva uttari upari abhiññeyyaṃ natthi. Itoti bhagavatā
tika-s0103t:292_4: abhiññātato. Añño paramatthavasena dhammo vā paññattivasena puggalo vā ayaṃ nāma
tika-s0103t:292_5: yaṃ bhagavā na jānātīti idaṃ natthi na upalabbhati sabbasseva sammadeva tumhehi abhiññātattā.
tika-s0103t:292_6: Kusalesu dhammesu abhijānane, desanāyañca bhagavato uttaritaro natthi.
tika-s0103t:294_0: 146. Āyatanapaññāpanāsūti cakkhādīnaṃ, rūpādīnañca āyatanānaṃ sambodhanesu, tesaṃ
tika-s0103t:294_1: ajjhattikabāhiravibhāgato, sabhāgavibhāgato, samudayato, atthaṅgamato, āhārato, ādīnavato,
tika-s0103t:296_0: 147. Gabbhokkamanesūti gabbhabhāvena mātukucchiyaṃ avakkamanesu anuppavesesu, gabbhe
tika-s0103t:296_1: vā mātukucchismiṃ avakkamanesu. Pavisatīti paccayavasena tattha nibbattento pavisanto
tika-s0103t:296_2: viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Ṭhātīti santānaṭṭhitiyā pavattati, tathābhūto ca tattha
tika-s0103t:296_3: vasanto viya hotīti āha “vasatī”ti. Pakatilokiyamanussānaṃ paṭhamā gabbhāvakkantīti
tika-s0103t:296_4: pacuramanussānaṃ gabbhāvakkanti desanāvasena idha paṭhamā. “Dutiyā gabbhāvakkantī”tiādīsupi
tika-s0103t:298: Khipituṃ na sakkontīti tathā vātānaṃ anuppajjanameva vadati. Sesanti puna “etadānuttariya”tiādi pāṭhappadesaṃ vadati.
tika-s0103t:300_0: 148. Parassa cittaṃ ādisati etehīti ādesanāni, yathāupaṭṭhitanimittādīni, tāni eva
tika-s0103t:300_1: aññamaññassa asaṃkiṇṇarūpena ṭhitattā ādesanavidhā, ādesanābhāgā, tāsu ādesanavidhāsu.
tika-s0103t:300_2: Tenāha “ādesanakoṭṭhāsesū”ti. Āgatanimittenāti yassa ādisati, tassa, attano ca upagatanimittena,
tika-s0103t:300_4: vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “evampi te mano”tiādinā parassa cittādisanameva āgataṃ, taṃ
tika-s0103t:300_5: nidassanamattaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi “idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti vuttasseva
tika-s0103t:300_6: atthassa vibhāvanavasena vatthu āgataṃ. Gatanimittaṃ nāma gamananimittaṃ. Ṭhitanimittaṃ
tika-s0103t:300_7: nāma attano samīpe ṭhānanimittaṃ, parassa gamanavasena, ṭhānavasena ca gahetabbanimittaṃ.
tika-s0103t:300_8: Manussānaṃ paracittavidūnaṃ, itaresampi vā savanavasena parassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ
tika-s0103t:300_9: saddaṃ sutvā. Yakkhapisācādīnanti hiṅkārayakkhānañceva kaṇṇapisācādipisācānaṃ, kumbhaṇḍanāgādīnañca.
tika-s0103t:301_0: Vitakkavipphāravasenāti vipphārikabhāvena pavattavitakkassa vasena. Uppannanti tato
tika-s0103t:301_1: samuṭṭhitaṃ. Vippalapantānanti kassaci atthassa abodhanato virūpaṃ, vividhaṃ vā palapantānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:301_3: pana “idaṃ vakkhāmi, evaṃ vakkhāmīti vitakkayato vitakkavipphārasaddo nāma uppajjatī”ti
tika-s0103t:301_4: āgatattā jāgarantānaṃ pakatiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ avippalapantānaṃ vitakkavipphārasaddo kadāci
tika-s0103t:301_5: uppajjatīti viññāyati, yo loke “mantajappo”ti vuccati. Yassa mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ asotaviññeyyatā
tika-s0103t:301_7: sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatīti sutte vutta”nti ānandācariyo avoca. Vuttalakkhaṇo
tika-s0103t:301_8: eva pana nātisukhumo attano, accāsannappadese ṭhitassa ca maṃsasotassāpi āpāthaṃ
tika-s0103t:301_9: gacchatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Tassāti tassa puggalassa. Tassa vasenāti tassa vitakkassa
tika-s0103t:301_10: vasena. Evaṃ ayampi ādesanavidhā cetopariyañāṇavaseneva āgatāti veditabbā. Keci pana
tika-s0103t:301_11: “tassa vasenāti tassa saddassa vasenā”ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ. Na hi saddaggahaṇena
tika-s0103t:301_12: taṃsamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ gayhati, saddaggahaṇānusārenapi tadatthasseva gahaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:301_13: na cittassa. Eteneva yadeke “yaṃ vitakkayatoti yamatthaṃ vitakkayato”ti vatvā “tassa
tika-s0103t:301_14: vasenāti tassa atthassa vasenā”ti vaṇṇenti, tampi paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-s0103t:302_0: Manasā saṅkharīyantīti manosaṅkhārā, vedanāsaññā. Paṇihitāti purimaparibandhavinayena
tika-s0103t:302_1: padhānabhāvena nihitā ṭhapitā. Tenāha “cittasaṅkhārā suṭṭhapitā”ti. Vitakkassa vitakkanaṃ
tika-s0103t:302_3: āneti. Āgamanenāti jhānassa āgamanaṭṭhānavasena. Pubbabhāgenāti maggassa sabbapubbabhāgena
tika-s0103t:302_4: vipassanārambhena. Ubhayaṃ petaṃ yo sayaṃ jhānalābhī, adhigatamaggo ca aññaṃ tadatthāya
tika-s0103t:302_5: paṭipajjantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ iminā nīhārena paṭipajjanto addhā jhānaṃ labhissati, maggaṃ
tika-s0103t:302_6: adhigamissatī”ti abhiññāya vinā anumānavasena jānāti, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:302_7: “āgamanena jānāti nāmā”tiādi. Anantarāti vuṭṭhitakālaṃ sandhāyāha. Tadā hi pavattavitakkapajānaneneva
tika-s0103t:303_0: Kiṃ panidaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ parassa cittaṃ paricchijja jānantaṃ iddhicittabhāvato
tika-s0103t:303_1: avisesato sabbesampi cittaṃ jānātīti? Noti dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha. Na ariyānanti
tika-s0103t:303_2: yena cittena te ariyā nāma jātā, taṃ lokuttaracittaṃ na jānāti appaṭividdhabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:303_3: Yathā hi puthujjano sabbesampi ariyānaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ na jānāti appaṭividdhattā,
tika-s0103t:303_4: evaṃ ariyopi heṭṭhimo uparimassa lokuttaracittaṃ na jānāti appaṭividdhattā eva. Yathā
tika-s0103t:303_5: pana uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjati, kiṃ evaṃ so tassa lokuttaracittaṃ
tika-s0103t:303_6: na jānātīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “uparimo pana heṭṭhimassa jānātī”ti, paṭividdhattāti
tika-s0103t:303_7: adhippāyo. “Uparimo heṭṭhimaṃ na samāpajjatī”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “tesañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:303_8: Tesanti ariyānaṃ. Heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpatti bhūmantarappattiyā paṭippassaddhikappā.
tika-s0103t:303_9: Tenāha “tatrupapattiyeva hotī”ti, na uparibhūmipatti. Nimittādivasena ñātassa kadāci
tika-s0103t:303_10: byabhicāropi siyā, na pana abhiññāñāṇena ñātassāti āha “ceto…pe… natthī”ti. “Taṃ
tika-s0103t:305_0: 149. Brahmajāleti brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ. Uttarapadalopena hesa niddeso. Ātappanti
tika-s0103t:305_1: vīriyaṃ ātappati kosajjaṃ sabbampi saṃkilesapakkhanti. Kusalavīriyasseva hettha gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:305_2: appamādādipadantarasannidhānato. Padahitabbatoti padahanato, bhāvanaṃ uddissa vāyamanatoti
tika-s0103t:305_3: attho. Anuyuñjitabbatoti anuyuñjanato. Īdisānaṃ padānaṃ bahulaṃkattuvisayatāya icchitabbattā
tika-s0103t:305_4: ātappapadassa viya itaresampi kattusādhanatā daṭṭhabbā. Paṭipattiyaṃ nappamajjati
tika-s0103t:305_5: etenāti appamādo, satiavippavāso. Sammā manasi karoti etenāti sammāmanasikāro, tathāpavatto
tika-s0103t:305_6: kusalacittuppādo. Bhāvanānuyogameva tathā vadati. Desanākkamena paṭhamā, dassanasamāpatti
tika-s0103t:305_7: nāma karajakāye paṭikkūlākārassa sammadeva dassanavasena pavattasamāpattibhāvato.
tika-s0103t:306_0: Atikkamma chavimaṃsalohitaṃ aṭṭhiṃ paccavekkhatīti tāni apaccavekkhitvā aṭṭhimeva
tika-s0103t:306_2: dibbacakkhuadhiṭṭhānā paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti. Yo hi bhikkhu ālokakasiṇe catutthajjhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:306_3: nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇo hutvā saviññāṇake kāye aṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0103t:306_4: pariggahetvā tattha paṭikkūlamanasikāravasena paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbatteti, tassāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:306_5: paṭhamajjhānasamāpatti dutiyā dassanasamāpatti. Tena vuttaṃ “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”tiādi. Yo
tika-s0103t:306_6: panettha pāḷiyaṃ dvattiṃsākāramanasikāro vutto, so maggasodhanavasena vutto. Tattha
tika-s0103t:306_7: vā kataparicayassa sukheneva vuttanayā aṭṭhipaccavekkhaṇā samijjhatīti. Tenevettha
tika-s0103t:306_8: “imaṃ cevā”ti “atikkamma cā”ti ca-saddo samuccayattho vutto. Taṃ jhānanti yathāvuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:306_9: paṭhamajjhānaṃ. Ayanti ayaṃ sakadāgāmiphalasamāpatti. Sātisayaṃ catusaccadassanāgamanato
tika-s0103t:306_10: pariyāyena vinā mukhyā dutiyā dassanasamāpatti. Yāva tatiyamaggā vattatīti āha “khīṇāsavassa
tika-s0103t:307_0: Pāḷiyaṃ purisassa cāti ca-saddo byatireke, tena yathāvuttasamāpattidvayato vuccamānaṃyeva
tika-s0103t:307_1: imassa visesaṃ joteti. Avicchedena pavattiyā sotasadisatāya viññāṇameva viññāṇasotaṃ,
tika-s0103t:307_2: tadetaṃ viññāṇaṃ purimato anantarapaccayaṃ labhitvā pacchimassa anantarapaccayo hutvā
tika-s0103t:307_3: pavattatīti ayaṃ assa sotāgatatāya sotasadisatā, tasmā pajānitabbabhāvena vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:307_4: ekameva cettha viññāṇaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “viññāṇasotanti viññāṇamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:307_5: Dvīhipi bhāgehīti orabhāgaparabhāgehi. Idhaloko hissa orabhāgo, paraloko parabhāgo
tika-s0103t:307_6: dvinnampi vasenetaṃ sambandhanti. Tenāha “idhaloke patiṭṭhita”ntiādi. Viññāṇassa
tika-s0103t:307_7: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantassa kāmaṃ natthi kassaci patiṭṭhitatā, taṇhāvasena pana taṃ
tika-s0103t:308_0: “Kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0103t:308_1: tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷhaṃ. Yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ viññāṇaṃ viruḷhaṃ…pe… atthi tattha āyatiṃ
tika-s0103t:309_0: Kammanti kusalākusalakammaṃ, upayogavacanametaṃ. Kammato upagacchantanti kammabhāvena
tika-s0103t:309_1: upagacchantaṃ, viññāṇanti adhippāyo. Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañhi yena kammunā sahagataṃ,
tika-s0103t:309_2: aññadatthu tabbhāvameva upagataṃ hutvā pavattati. Idhaloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma idha
tika-s0103t:309_3: katūpacitakammabhāvūpagamanato. Kammabhavaṃ ākaḍḍhantanti kammaviññāṇaṃ attanā sampayuttakammaṃ
tika-s0103t:309_4: javāpetvā paṭisandhinibbattanena tadabhimukhaṃ ākaḍḍhantaṃ. Teneva paṭisandhinibbattanasāmatthiyena
tika-s0103t:309_5: paraloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma attano phalassa tattha patiṭṭhāpanena. Keci pana “abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:309_6: parato vipākaṃ dātuṃ asamatthaṃ idhaloke patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma, dātuṃ samatthaṃ pana paraloke
tika-s0103t:309_7: patiṭṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ “ubhayato abbocchinna”nti vuttattā.
tika-s0103t:309_8: Yañca tehi “paraloke patiṭṭhita”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ idhalokepi patiṭṭhitameva. Na hi
tika-s0103t:309_9: tassa idhaloke patiṭṭhitabhāvena vinā paraloke patiṭṭhitabhāvo sambhavati. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
tika-s0103t:309_10: cetopariyañāṇanti sekkhānaṃ, puthujjanānañca cetaso paricchindanakañāṇaṃ. Kathitaṃ
tika-s0103t:310: Catutthāya dassanasamāpattiyā tatiyadassanasamāpattiyaṃ vuttappaṭikkhepena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:311_0: Purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pubbe samathavasena atthassa vuttattā idāni vipassanāvasena
tika-s0103t:311_1: dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Niccalameva pubbe vuttassa atthassa apanetabbato. Atthantaratthatāya
tika-s0103t:311_2: dassiyamānāya padaṃ calitaṃ nāma hoti. Aparo nayoti ettha paṭhamajjhānassa paṭhamadassanasamāpattibhāve
tika-s0103t:311_3: apubbaṃ natthi. Dutiyajjhānaṃ dutiyāti ettha pana “aṭṭhikavaṇṇakasiṇavasena paṭiladdhadutiyajjhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:311_4: dutiyā dassanasamāpattī”ti vadanti, tatiyajjhānampi tatheva paṭiladdhaṃ. Dassanasamāpattibhāvo
tika-s0103t:311_5: pana yo bhikkhu ālokakasiṇe catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuko
tika-s0103t:311_6: hutvā saviññāṇake aṭṭhiṃ pariggahetvā tattha vaṇṇakasiṇavasena heṭṭhimāni tīṇi jhānāni
tika-s0103t:311_7: nibbatteti, tassa. Tatiyajjhānaṃ tatiyā dassanasamāpatti adhiṭṭhānabhūtassa dibbacakkhuñāṇassa
tika-s0103t:311_8: vasena. Catutthajjhānaṃ catutthāti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ
tika-s0103t:311_9: katvā adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇassa taṃ catutthajjhānaṃ catutthā dassanasamāpatti. Idhāpi
tika-s0103t:311_10: sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ cetaso paricchindanena tatiyā dassanasamāpatti, arahato cittassa
tika-s0103t:311_11: paricchindanena catutthā dassanasamāpatti veditabbā. Evañhesā atthavaṇṇanā pāḷiyā
tika-s0103t:311_13: paṭhamā dassanasamāpatti. Aṭṭhiārammaṇadutiyajjhānapādako dutiyamaggo dutiyā dassanasamāpatti.
tika-s0103t:313_0: 150. Puggalapaṇṇattīsūti puggalānaṃ paññāpanesu. Guṇavisesavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato
tika-s0103t:313_1: ṭhapanesu. Lokavohāravasenāti lokasammutivasena. Lokavohāro hesa, yadidaṃ “satto
tika-s0103t:313_2: puggalo”tiādi. Rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto. Tassa tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato
tika-s0103t:313_3: galanato, maraṇavasena patanato ca puggalo. Santatiyā nayanato naro. Attabhāvassa
tika-s0103t:313_4: posanato poso. Evaṃ paññāpetabbāsu voharitabbāsu. “Sabbametaṃ puggalo”ti imissā sādhāraṇapaññattiyā
tika-s0103t:313_5: vibhāvanavasena vuttaṃ, na idhādhippetaasādhāraṇapaññattiyā, tasmā lokapaññattīsūti
tika-s0103t:313_6: sattalokagatapaññattīsu. Anuttaro hoti anaññasādhāraṇattā tassa paññāpanassa.
tika-s0103t:314_0: Dvīhi bhāgehīti kāraṇe, nissakke cetaṃ puthuvacanaṃ, āvuttiādivasena cāyamattho veditabboti
tika-s0103t:314_3: rūpakāyato ca vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitattheravādo,
tika-s0103t:314_5: ekavāraṃ vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti evaṃ pavatto tipiṭakacūḷābhayattheravādo
tika-s0103t:314_6: cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇampi theravādānaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vimuttoti kilesehi
tika-s0103t:314_7: vimutto, kilesavikkhambhanasamucchedanehi vā kāyadvayato vimuttoti attho. Arūpasamāpattīnanti
tika-s0103t:314_8: niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Arahattappattaanāgāminoti bhūtapubbagatiyā vuttaṃ. Na hi
tika-s0103t:314_9: arahattappatto anāgāmī nāma hoti. Pāḷīti puggalapaññattipāḷi. Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena
tika-s0103t:314_10: phusitvāti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā. Paññāya cassa disvā
tika-s0103t:314_11: āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ, maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni
tika-s0103t:314_12: passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. Disvāti dassanahetu. Na hi āsave paññāya
tika-s0103t:314_13: passanti, dassanakāraṇā pana parikkhīṇā “disvā parikkhīṇā”ti vuttā dassanāyattaparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0103t:314_14: Evañhi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyābhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:315_0: Paññāya visesato muttoti paññāvimutto anavasesato āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā. Aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavaseneva,
tika-s0103t:315_2: na hotīti siddhaṃ hoti. Arūpāvacarajjhānesu hi ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva
tika-s0103t:316_0: Phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikarotīti phuṭṭhānaṃ anto phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ
tika-s0103t:316_1: anantaro kāloti adhippāyo, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva
tika-s0103t:316_2: sacchikātabbaṃ, sacchikato sacchikaraṇūpāyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “so jhānaphassa”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:316_3: Ekacce āsavāti heṭṭhimamaggattayavajjhā āsavā. Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato, nāmakāyekadesato
tika-s0103t:316_4: ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito
tika-s0103t:316_5: viya hoti, na pana kāyena sacchikato. Nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu
tika-s0103t:316_6: khepitesu tena sacchikato hoti, tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathālocitaṃ nāmakāyena
tika-s0103t:316_7: sacchikarotīti kāyasakkhīti vuccati, na tu vimuttoti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā.
tika-s0103t:317_0: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti attho.
tika-s0103t:317_1: “Diṭṭhattā patto”tipi pāṭho, tena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa
tika-s0103t:317_2: pattataṃ dīpeti. Tenāha “dukkhā saṅkhārā”tiādi. Paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggamaggā
tika-s0103t:317_3: diṭṭhippattoti āha “esopi kāyasakkhī viya chabbidho hotī”ti. Idaṃ dukkhanti “idaṃ
tika-s0103t:317_4: dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito uddhaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Yasmā idaṃ
tika-s0103t:317_5: yāthāvasarasato pajānāti, pajānanto ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhe “dukkhasacca”nti
tika-s0103t:317_6: pajānāti. Taṇhaṃ pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ ito samudeti, tasmā “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0103t:317_7: pajānāti. Yasmā idaṃ dukkhañca samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti vūpasamanti
tika-s0103t:317_8: appavattiṃ gacchanti, tasmā taṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Ariyo
tika-s0103t:317_9: pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati, tena taṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī
tika-s0103t:317_10: paṭipadā”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. Ettāvatā nānakkhaṇe saccavavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0103t:317_11: Idāni taṃ ekakkhaṇe dassetuṃ “tathāgatappaveditā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tathāgatappaveditāti
tika-s0103t:317_12: tathāgatena bodhimaṇḍe paṭividdhā viditā pākaṭā katā. Dhammāti catusaccadhammā. Vodiṭṭhā
tika-s0103t:317_13: hontīti sudiṭṭhā honti. Vocaritāti sucaritā, tesu tena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitāti attho.
tika-s0103t:318_0: Saddhāya vimuttoti saddahanavasena vimutto, etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena
tika-s0103t:318_1: vimuttabhāvaṃ dasseti. Saddhāvimuttoti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho. Vuttanayenevāti
tika-s0103t:318_2: kāyasakkhimhi vuttanayeneva. No ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassāti yathā diṭṭhippattassa
tika-s0103t:318_3: āsavā parikkhīṇā, na evaṃ saddhāya vimuttassāti attho. Kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesappahāne
tika-s0103t:318_4: nānattaṃ atthīti? Natthi. Atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti? Āgamanīyanānattena.
tika-s0103t:318_5: Diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena, akilamanto ca sakkoti
tika-s0103t:318_6: vikkhambhetuṃ, saddhāvimutto dukkhena kilamanto vikkhambheti, tasmā diṭṭhippattaṃ
tika-s0103t:319_0: Ārammaṇaṃ yāthāvato dhāreti avadhāretīti dhammo, paññā. Paññāpubbaṅgamanti paññāpadhānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:319_1: Paññaṃ vāhetīti paññāvāhī, paññaṃ sātisayaṃ pavattetīti attho. Paññā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ
tika-s0103t:319_2: vāheti, nibbānābhimukhaṃ gametīti attho. Saddhānusāriniddesepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:320: Tasmāti visuddhimagge vuttattā, tato eva visuddhimagge, taṃ saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayenettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:322: 151. Padahanavasenāti bhāvanānuyogavasena. Satta bojjhaṅgā padhānāti vuttā vivekanissitādibhāvena padahitabbato bhāvetabbato.
tika-s0103t:324_0: 152. Dukkhena kasirena samādhiṃ uppādentassāti pubbabhāge āgamanakāle kicchena dukkhena
tika-s0103t:324_1: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamantassa kilese vikkhambhetvā lokuttarasamādhiṃ uppādentassa.
tika-s0103t:324_2: Dandhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhijānantassāti vikkhambhitesu kilesesu vipassanāparivāse ciraṃ
tika-s0103t:324_3: vasitvā taṃ lokuttarasamādhisaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ dandhaṃ saṇikaṃ abhijānantassa paṭivijjhantassa,
tika-s0103t:324_4: sacchikarontassa pāpuṇantassāti attho. Ayaṃ vuccatīti yā esā evaṃ uppajjati, ayaṃ
tika-s0103t:324_5: kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāya dukkhattā, vipassanāparivāsapaññāya ca dandhattā maggakāle
tika-s0103t:324_6: ekacittakkhaṇe uppannāpi paññā āgamanavasena “dukkhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā nāmā”ti
tika-s0103t:324_7: vuccati. Upari tīsu padesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:326_0: 153. Bhassasamācāreti vacīsamācāre. Ṭhitoti yathāraddhaṃ taṃ avicchedavasena kathento.
tika-s0103t:326_2: pavattena musāvādena upasaṃhitaṃ. Vibhūti vuccati visuṃbhāvo, tattha niyuttanti vebhūtikaṃ,
tika-s0103t:326_3: tadeva vebhūtiyaṃ, pesuññaṃ. Tenāha “bhedakaravāca”nti. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇato sārambhato
tika-s0103t:326_4: jātāti sārambhajā. Tassā pavattiākāradassanatthaṃ “tvaṃ dussīlo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahiddhākathā
tika-s0103t:326_5: amanāpā, manāpāpi parassa cittavighātāvahattā karaṇuttariyapakkhiyamevāti dassento
tika-s0103t:326_7: hutvāti attano jayaṃ purakkhatvā. Yaṃ kiñci na bhāsatīti yojanā. “Mantā”ti vuccati
tika-s0103t:326_8: paññā, mantanaṃ jānananti katvā. “Mantā”ti idaṃ “mantetvā”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadanti
tika-s0103t:326_9: āha “upaparikkhitvā”ti. Yuttakathamevāti attano, suṇantassa ca yuttarūpameva kathaṃ.
tika-s0103t:326_11: citte ṭhapetabbaṃ, vimuttāyatanabhāvena manasi kātabbanti attho. Sabbaṅgasampannāpi
tika-s0103t:326_12: vācā akāle bhāsitā abhājane bhāsitā viya na atthāvahāti āha “yuttapattakālenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:326_13: Ayañca caturaṅgasamannāgatā subhāsitavācā saccasambodhāvahāditāya sattānaṃ mahiddhikā
tika-s0103t:327_0: Sīlācāreti sīle ca ācāre ca parisuddhasīle ceva parisuddhamanosamācāre ca. Ṭhitoti
tika-s0103t:327_1: patiṭṭhahanto. Saccaṃ etassa atthīti saccoti āha “saccakatho”ti. Esa nayo saddhoti
tika-s0103t:327_2: etthāpi. Tenāha “saddhāsampanno”ti. “Nanu ca heṭṭhā saccaṃ kathitamevā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ?
tika-s0103t:327_3: Heṭṭhā hi vacīsamācāraṃ kathentena saccaṃ kathitaṃ, paṭipakkhapaṭikkhepavasena idha
tika-s0103t:327_4: sīlaṃ kathentena taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ saccaṃ sarūpeneva kathitaṃ. “Puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
tika-s0103t:327_5: kathāya ārabbhantarañcetaṃ, tathāpi saccaṃ vatvā anantarameva saccassa kathanaṃ punaruttaṃ
tika-s0103t:327_6: hotīti parassa codanāvasaro mā hotū”ti tattha parihāraṃ dātukāmo “idha kasmā puna
tika-s0103t:327_7: vutta”nti āha. Heṭṭhā vācāsaccaṃ kathitaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ subhāsitavācaṃ dassentena.
tika-s0103t:327_8: Antamaso…pe… dassetuṃ idha vuttaṃ “evaṃ sīlaṃ suparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
tika-s0103t:327_9: “evaṃ parittakaṃ kho, rāhula, tesaṃ sāmaññaṃ, yesaṃ natthi sampajānamusāvāde lajjā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:328_0: Guttā satikavāṭena pidahitā dvārā etenāti guttadvāroti āha “chasu indriyesū”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:328_2: Samanti avisamaṃ. Samacāritā hi kāyavisamādīni pahāya kāyasamādipūraṇaṃ. Nisajjāyāti
tika-s0103t:328_3: ettha iti-saddo ādiattho, tena “āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti evamādiṃ
tika-s0103t:328_4: saṅgaṇhāti. Bhāvanāya cittaparisodhanañhi jāgariyānuyogo, na niddāvinodanamattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:328_5: Nittandīti vigatathinamiddho. Sā pana nittanditā kāyālasiyavigamane pākaṭā hotīti
tika-s0103t:328_7: taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “kāyikavīriyenāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Saṅgamma gaṇavihāro sahavāso
tika-s0103t:328_8: saṅgaṇikā, sā pana kilesehipi evaṃ hotīti tato visesetuṃ “gaṇasaṅgaṇika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:328_10: ekavihārī, na kevalaṃ ekībhāvavasena. Kilesasaṅgaṇikanti kilesasahitacittataṃ. Yathā
tika-s0103t:328_11: tathāti vipassanāvasena, paṭisaṅkhānavasena vā. Samathavasena ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:329_0: Kalyāṇapaṭibhānoti sundarapaṭibhāno, sā panassa paṭibhānasampadā vacanacāturiyasahitāva
tika-s0103t:329_1: icchitāti āha “vākkaraṇa…pe… sampanno cā”ti. “Paṭibhāna”nti hi ñāṇampi vuccati ñāṇassa
tika-s0103t:329_2: upaṭṭhitavacanampi. Tattha atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttaṃ paṭibhānamassāti yuttapaṭibhāno.
tika-s0103t:329_3: Pucchitānantarameva sīghaṃ byākātuṃ asamatthatāya no muttapaṭibhānaṃ assāti no muttapaṭibhāno.
tika-s0103t:329_4: Idha pana vikiṇṇavāco muttapaṭibhāno adhippetoti adhippāyena “sīlasamācārasmiñhi
tika-s0103t:329_5: ṭhitabhikkhu muttapaṭibhāno na hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Gamanasamatthāyāti assutaṃ dhammaṃ
tika-s0103t:329_6: gametuṃ samatthāya. Dhāraṇasamatthāyāti sātisayaṃ sativīriyasahitatāya yathāsutaṃ
tika-s0103t:329_7: yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthāya. Munanato anuminanato mutīti anumāna
tika-s0103t:329_8: paññāya nāmaṃ. Tīhi padehīti “gatimā dhitimā mutimā”ti tīhi padehi. Heṭṭhāti heṭṭhā
tika-s0103t:329_9: “āraddhavīriyo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne. Idhāti “dhitimā”ti vuttaṭṭhāne. Vīriyampi heṭṭhā guṇabhūtaṃ
tika-s0103t:329_10: gahitanti vuttovāyamattho. Heṭṭhāti “jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto, jhāyī”ti ettha vipassanāpaññā
tika-s0103t:329_11: kathitā. Idhāti “dhitimā mutimā”ti ettha buddhavacanagaṇhanapaññā kathitā karaṇapubbāparakosallapaññādīpanato.
tika-s0103t:329_12: Kilesakāmopi vatthukāmo viya yathāpavatto assādīyatīti vuttaṃ “vatthukāmakilesakāmesu agiddho”ti.
tika-s0103t:331: 154. Attano upāyamanasikārenāti attani sambhūtena pathamanasikārena bhāvanāmanasikārena. Paṭipajjamānoti visuddhiṃ paṭipajjamāno.
tika-s0103t:333_0: 156. Pariyādiyamānoti paricchijja gaṇhantoti attho. Suddhakkhandheyeva anussarati
tika-s0103t:333_1: nāmagottaṃ pariyādiyituṃ asakkonto. Vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “eko hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:333_2: Sakkoti pariyādiyituṃ. Asakkontassa vasena gahitaṃ, “amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo”tiādi vuttanti
tika-s0103t:333_3: attho. Asakkontassāti ca ārohane asakkontassa, orohane pana ñāṇassa thirabhūtattā.
tika-s0103t:333_4: Tenāha “suddhakkhandheyeva anussaranto”tiādi. Etanti pubbāparavirodhaṃ. Na sallakkhesi
tika-s0103t:333_5: diṭṭhābhinivesena kuṇṭhañāṇattā. Tenāha “diṭṭhigatikattā”ti. Ṭhānanti ekasmiṃ pakkhe
tika-s0103t:333_6: avaṭṭhānaṃ. Niyamoti vādaniyamo paṭiniyatavādatā. Tenāha “imaṃ gahetvā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:334_1: gaṇanāya. Acchiddakavasenāti avicchindakagaṇanāvasena gaṇanā kamagaṇanaṃ muñcitvā
tika-s0103t:334_2: “imasmiṃ rukkhe ettakāni paṇṇānī”ti vā “imasmiṃ jalāsaye ettakāni udakāḷhakānī”ti
tika-s0103t:334_3: vā evaṃ gaṇetabbassa ekajjhampi piṇḍetvā gaṇanā. Kamagaṇanā hi antarantarā vicchijja
tika-s0103t:334_4: pavattiyā pacchindikā. Sā panesā gaṇanā savanantaraṃ anapekkhitvā manasāva gaṇetabbato
tika-s0103t:334_5: “manogaṇanā”tipi vuccatīti āha “manogaṇanāyā”ti. Piṇḍagaṇanameva dasseti, na vibhāgagaṇanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:334_6: Saṅkhātuṃ na sakkā aññehi asaṅkhyeyyābhāvato. Paññāpāramiyā pūritabhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0103t:334_7: itarāsaṃ pūraṇena vinā tassā pūraṇaṃ natthīti “dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pūritattā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:334_8: Tenāha “sabbaññutaññāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā”ti. Ettakanti dassethāti dīpeti thero.
tika-s0103t:334_9: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anussaratī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tassa anussaraṇamattaṃ
tika-s0103t:334_10: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na āyuno vassādigaṇanāya paricchindanaṃ tassa avisayabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:335_0: 158. Tumhākaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ yeva anuttarā anaññasādhāraṇattā. Idāni tassā desanāya
tika-s0103t:335_1: majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa viya vibhāgābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “atītabuddhāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:335_2: Imināpi kāraṇenāti anuttarabhāvena, aññehi buddhehi ekasadisabhāvena ca.
tika-s0103t:336_0: 159. Āsavānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvūpagamanena sāsavā. Upecca ādhīyantīti upādhī, dosāropanāni,
tika-s0103t:336_1: saha upādhīhīti saupādhikā. Anariyiddhiyañhi attano cittadosena ekacce upārambhaṃ
tika-s0103t:336_2: dadanti, svāyamattho kevaṭṭasuttena dīpetabbo. No “ariyā”ti vuccati sāsavabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:336_3: Niddosehi khīṇāsavehi pavattetabbato niddosā dosehi saha appavattanato. Tato eva
tika-s0103t:337_0: Appaṭikkūlasaññīti iṭṭhasaññī iṭṭhākārena pavattacitto. Paṭikkūleti amanuññe aniṭṭhe.
tika-s0103t:337_1: Dhātusaññanti “dhātuyo”ti saññaṃ. Upasaṃharatīti upaneti pavatteti. Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusminti
tika-s0103t:337_2: aniṭṭhe sattasaññite ārammaṇe. Mettāya vā pharatīti mettaṃ hitesitaṃ upasaṃharanto
tika-s0103t:337_3: sabbatthakameva taṃ tattha pharati. Dhātuto vā upasaṃharatīti dhammasabhāvacintanena
tika-s0103t:337_4: dhātuso, paccavekkhaṇāya dhātumanasikāraṃ vā tattha pavatteti. Appaṭikkūle satte
tika-s0103t:337_6: asucikoṭṭhāsamevā”ti asubhasaññaṃ pharati asubhamanasikāraṃ pavatteti. Chaḷaṅgupekkhāyāti
tika-s0103t:338_0: Taṃ desananti taṃ dvīsu iddhividhāsu desanappakāraṃ desanāvidhiṃ. Asesaṃ sakalanti
tika-s0103t:338_1: asesaṃ niravasesaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānāti. Asesaṃ abhijānato tato
tika-s0103t:338_2: uttari abhiññeyyaṃ natthi. Itoti bhagavato abhiññātato. Añño paramatthavasena dhammo
tika-s0103t:338_3: vā paññattivasena puggalo vā ayaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavā na jānātīti idaṃ natthi na upalabbhati
tika-s0103t:338_4: sabbasseva sammadeva tumhehi abhiññātattā. Dvīsu iddhividhāsu abhijānane, desanāyañca
tika-s0103t:338_5: bhagavato uttaritaro natthi. Imināpīti pi-saddo na kevalaṃ vuttatthasamuccayattho,
tika-s0103t:338_6: atha kho avuttatthasamuccayatthopi daṭṭhabbo. Yaṃ taṃ bhantetiādināpi hi bhagavato
tika-s0103t:340_0: 160. Pubbe “etadānuttariyaṃ bhante”tiādinā yathāvuttabuddhaguṇā dassitā, tato añño
tika-s0103t:340_1: evāyaṃ pakāro “yaṃ taṃ bhante”tiādinā āraddhoti āha “aparenāpi ākārenā”ti. Buddhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:340_2: sammāsambodhiyā saddahanato visesato saddhā kulaputtā nāma bodhisattā, mahābodhisattāti
tika-s0103t:340_3: adhippāyo. Te hi mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya mahābodhiyaṃ sattā āsattā laggā niyatabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0103t:340_4: kenaci asaṃhāriyabhāvato. Yato nesaṃ na kathañci tattha saddhāya aññathattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0103t:340_5: eteneva tesaṃ kammaphalaṃ saddhāyapi aññathattābhāvo dīpito daṭṭhabbo. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-s0103t:340_6: atisayavacanicchāvasena, “anuppattaṃ taṃ bhagavatā”ti saddantarasannidhānena ca visiṭṭhavisayaṃ
tika-s0103t:340_7: “saddhena kulaputtenā”ti idaṃ padaṃ, tasmā. Lokuttaradhammasamadhigamamūlakattā sabbabuddhaguṇasamadhigamassa
tika-s0103t:340_9: avayavapadāni. Ādi-saddena parakkamapadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, na dhorayhapadaṃ. Na hi taṃ
tika-s0103t:340_10: vīriyavevacanaṃ, atha kho vīriyavantavācakaṃ. Dhurāya niyuttoti hi dhorayho. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:340_13: Paresaṃ asayhasahanā hi lokanāthā. Taṃ sabbaṃ acinteyyāparimeyyabhedaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:340_14: guṇajātaṃ. Pāramitā, buddhaguṇā, veneyyasattāti yasmā idaṃ tayaṃ sabbesampi buddhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:341_0: Kāmasukhallikānuyoganti kāmasukhe allīnā hutvā anuyuñjanaṃ. Ko jānāti paralokaṃ “atthī”ti,
tika-s0103t:341_1: ettha “ko ekavisayoyaṃ indriyagocaro”ti evaṃdiṭṭhi hutvāti adhippāyo. Sukhoti iṭṭho
tika-s0103t:341_2: sukhāvaho. Paribbājikāyāti tāpasaparibbājikāya taruṇiyā. Mudukāyāti sukhumālāya.
tika-s0103t:341_3: Lomasāyāti taruṇamudulomavatiyā. Moḷibandhāhīti moḷiṃ katvā bandhakesāhi. Paricārentīti
tika-s0103t:341_4: attano pāricārikaṃ karonti, indriyāni vā tattha parito cārenti. Lāmakanti paṭikiliṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0103t:341_5: Gāmavāsīnaṃ bālānaṃ dhammaṃ. Puthujjanānamidanti pothujjanikaṃ. Yathā pana taṃ “puthujjanānamida”nti
tika-s0103t:341_6: vattabbataṃ labhati, taṃ dassetuṃ “puthujjanehi sevitabba”nti āha. Anariyehi sevitabbanti
tika-s0103t:341_7: vā anariyaṃ. Yasmā pana niddosattho ariyattho, tasmā “anariyanti na niddosa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:341_9: attano kilamathassa khedanassa anuyuñjanaṃ. Dukkhaṃ etassa atthīti dukkhaṃ. Dukkhamanaṃ etassāti dukkhamaṃ.
tika-s0103t:342_0: Ābhicetasikānanti abhiceto vuccati abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ cittaṃ, adhicittaṃ vā, tasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:342_1: abhicetasi jātānīti ābhicetasikāni, abhicetosannissitāni vā. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānanti
tika-s0103t:342_2: diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihārānaṃ, diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha sukhavihārabhūtānanti
tika-s0103t:342_3: attho, rūpāvacarajhānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0103t:342_6: ca. Saha maggena vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ kathitaṃ “cattārome cunda sukhallikānuyogā
tika-s0103t:342_9: kathitānīti attho. Nikāmalābhīti nikāmena lābhī attano icchāvasena lābhī. Icchiticchitakkhaṇe
tika-s0103t:342_10: samāpajjituṃ samatthoti attho. Tenāha “yathākāmalābhī”ti. Adukkhalābhīti sukheneva
tika-s0103t:342_11: paccanīkadhammānaṃ samucchinnattā samāpajjituṃ samattho. Akasiralābhīti akasirānaṃ
tika-s0103t:342_12: vipulānaṃ lābhī, yathāparicchedeneva vuṭṭhātuṃ samattho. Ekacco hi lābhīyeva hoti,
tika-s0103t:342_13: na pana sakkoti icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ. Ekacco tathā samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0103t:342_14: pāribandhake pana kicchena vikkhambheti. Ekacco tathā ca samāpajjati, pāribandhake
tika-s0103t:342_15: ca akiccheneva vikkhambheti, na sakkoti nāḷikayantaṃ viya yathāparicchede vuṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0103t:342_16: Bhagavā pana sabbaso samucchinnapāribandhakattā vasibhāvassa sammadeva samadhigatattā
tika-s0103t:344_0: 161. Dasasahassilokadhātuyāti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā
tika-s0103t:344_1: ṭhitāya dasasahassilokadhātuyā. Jātikhettabhāvena hi taṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “ekissā
tika-s0103t:344_2: lokadhātuyā”ti vuttaṃ, tattakāya eva jātikhettabhāvo dhammatāvasena veditabbo. “Pariggahavasenā”ti
tika-s0103t:344_3: keci. Sabbesampi buddhānaṃ tattakaṃ eva jātikhettaṃ. “Tannivāsīnaṃyeva ca devānaṃ
tika-s0103t:344_5: jātikhettaṃ. Saraseneva āṇāpavattanaṭṭhānaṃ āṇākhettaṃ. Buddhañāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ
tika-s0103t:344_6: ṭhānaṃ visayakhettaṃ. Okkamanādīnaṃ channameva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi
tika-s0103t:344_7: tassa pakampanalabbhanato. Āṇākhettaṃ nāma, yaṃ ekaccaṃ saṃvaṭṭati, vivaṭṭati ca.
tika-s0103t:344_8: Āṇā vattati tannivāsidevatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena, tañca kho kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:344_9: ānubhāveneva, na adhippāyavasena. “Yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vacanato tato parampi āṇā pavatteyyeva.
tika-s0103t:345_0: Nuppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjatī”ti imissā lokadhātuyā
tika-s0103t:345_1: ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā, imasmiṃyeva sutte “kiṃ panāvuso, sāriputta, atthetarahi
tika-s0103t:345_2: añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiya”nti evaṃ puṭṭho “ahaṃ bhante
tika-s0103t:345_3: noti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā
tika-s0103t:345_4: lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā
tika-s0103t:345_5: ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:346_0: Ekatoti saha, ekasmiṃ kāleti attho. So pana kālo kathaṃ paricchinnoti? Carimabhave
tika-s0103t:346_1: paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dhātuparinibbānanti dassento “tattha bodhipallaṅke”tiādimāha.
tika-s0103t:346_2: Nisinnakālato paṭṭhāyāti paṭilomakkamena vadati. Khettapariggaho katova hoti “idaṃ
tika-s0103t:346_3: buddhānaṃ jātikhetta”nti. Kena pana pariggaho kato? Uppajjamānena bodhisattena. Parinibbānato
tika-s0103t:346_4: paṭṭhāyāti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānato paṭṭhāya. Etthantareti carimabhave
tika-s0103t:346_5: bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ, dhātuparinibbānanti imehi dvīhi paricchinne etasmiṃ antare.
tika-s0103t:348_0: “Na nivāritā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tīṇi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipattiantaradhānena
tika-s0103t:348_1: sāsanassa osakkitattā aparassa uppatti laddhāvasarā hoti. Paṭipadāti paṭivedhāvahā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā.
tika-s0103t:349_0: “Pariyatti pamāṇa”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ bodhisattaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:349_1: vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ hīnaṃ nidassanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Niyyānikadhammassa hi ṭhitiṃ
tika-s0103t:350_0: Mātikāya antarahitāyāti “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādi nayappavattāya sikkhāpadapāḷimātikāya
tika-s0103t:350_1: antarahitāya. Nidānuddesasaṅkhāte pātimokkhe, pabbajjāupasampadākammesu ca sāsanaṃ
tika-s0103t:350_2: tiṭṭhati. Yathā vā pātimokkhe dharante eva pabbajjā upasampadā ca, evaṃ sati eva
tika-s0103t:350_3: tadubhaye pātimokkhaṃ tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato. Tasmā tayidaṃ tayaṃ sāsanassa
tika-s0103t:350_4: ṭhitihetūti āha “pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti. Yasmā
tika-s0103t:350_5: vā upasampadādhīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ anupasampannassa anicchitattā, upasampadā ca pabbajjādhīnā,
tika-s0103t:350_6: tasmā pātimokkhe, taṃ siddhiyā siddhāsu pabbajjupasampadāsu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0103t:350_7: Osakkitaṃ nāmāti pacchimakapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0103t:350_8: nāma hoti, pacchimakapaṭivedhato paraṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ, pacchimakasīlabhedato paraṃ
tika-s0103t:352_0: Etena kāmaṃ “sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pariyatti pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, pariyatti pana paṭipattihetukāti
tika-s0103t:352_1: paṭipattiyā asati sā appatiṭṭhā hoti paṭivedho viya, tasmā paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:352_2: sāsanosakkanassa visesakāraṇanti dassetvā tayidaṃ sāsanosakkanaṃ dhātuparinibbānosānanti
tika-s0103t:352_3: dassetuṃ “tīṇi parinibbānānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhātūnaṃ sannipātanādi buddhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānenevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:353_0: Tāti rasmiyo. Kāruññanti paridevanakāruññaṃ. Jambudīpe, dīpantaresu, devanāgabrahmalokesu
tika-s0103t:353_1: ca vippakiritvā ṭhitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāne ekajjhaṃ sannipātanaṃ,
tika-s0103t:353_2: rasmivissajjanaṃ, tattha tejodhātuyā uṭṭhānaṃ, ekajālibhāvo cāti sabbametaṃ satthu
tika-s0103t:354_0: Anacchariyattāti dvīsupi uppajjamānesu acchariyattābhāvadosatoti attho. Buddhā nāma
tika-s0103t:354_1: majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā evāti āha “desanāya
tika-s0103t:354_2: ca visesābhāvato”ti, etena ca anacchariyattameva sādheti. “Vivādabhāvato”ti etena
tika-s0103t:354_3: vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:355: Tatthāti milindapañhe. Ekuddesoti eko ekavidho abhinno uddeso. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:356_0: Ekaṃ eva buddhaṃ dhāretīti ekabuddhadhāraṇī, etena evaṃsabhāvā ete buddhaguṇā, yena
tika-s0103t:356_1: dutiyaṃ buddhaguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti. Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi
tika-s0103t:356_2: dhammānaṃ sabhāvaviseso na sakkā nivāretunti. “Na dhāreyyā”ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:356_3: pariyāyehi pakāsento “caleyyā”tiādimāha. Tattha caleyyāti paripphandeyya. Kampeyyāti
tika-s0103t:356_4: pavedheyya. Nameyyāti ekapassena natā bhaveyya. Oṇameyyāti osīdeyya. Vinameyyāti
tika-s0103t:356_5: vividhā ito cito ca nameyya. Vikireyyāti vātena bhusamuṭṭhi viya vippakireyya. Vidhameyyāti
tika-s0103t:356_6: vinasseyya. Viddhaṃseyyāti sabbaso viddhastā bhaveyya. Tathābhūtā ca na katthaci
tika-s0103t:357_0: Idāni tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā mahārājā”tiādimāha. Tattha samupādikāti samaṃ
tika-s0103t:357_1: uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā, udakassa upari samaṃgāminīti attho. Vaṇṇenāti
tika-s0103t:357_2: saṇṭhānena. Pamāṇenāti ārohena. Kisathūlenāti kisathūlabhāvena, pariṇāhenāti attho.
tika-s0103t:358_0: Chādentanti rocentaṃ ruciṃ uppādentaṃ. Tandīkatoti tena bhojanena tandībhūto. Anoṇamitadaṇḍajātoti
tika-s0103t:358_1: yāvadatthabhojanena oṇamituṃ asamatthatāya anoṇamitadaṇḍo viya jāto. Sakiṃ bhuttovāti
tika-s0103t:358_2: ekaṃ vaḍḍhitakaṃ bhuttamattova mareyyāti. Atidhammabhārenāti dhammena nāma pathavī
tika-s0103t:358_3: tiṭṭheyya, sakiṃ teneva calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati. Puna thero ratanaṃ
tika-s0103t:358_4: nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ, abhimatañca lokena; taṃ attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa
tika-s0103t:358_5: kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhamevaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento,
tika-s0103t:358_6: abhimato ca viññūnaṃ gambhīrappameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavicalanassa
tika-s0103t:358_7: kāraṇaṃ hotīti dassento “idha mahārāja dve sakaṭā”tiādimāha, eteneva tathāgatassa
tika-s0103t:358_9: ekasmā, ekassa vā sakaṭassa ratanaṃ tasmā sakaṭato gahetvāti attho.
tika-s0103t:361_0: Sabhāvapakatikāti sabhāvabhūtā akittimā pakatikā. Kāraṇamahantattāti kāraṇānaṃ mahantatāya,
tika-s0103t:361_1: mahantehi buddhakaradhammehi pāramisaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti
tika-s0103t:361_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Pathaviādīni mahantāni vatthūni, mahantā ca sakkabhāvādayo attano attano
tika-s0103t:361_3: visaye ekekāva, evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva. Ko ca tassa
tika-s0103t:361_4: visayo? Buddhabhūmi, yāvatakaṃ vā ñeyyamevaṃ “ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko
tika-s0103t:361_5: eva hotī”ti vadanto “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti vuttalokadhātuto aññesupi cakkavāḷesu
tika-s0103t:362_0: “Sammukhā meta”ntiādinā pavattitaṃ attano byākaraṇaṃ aviparītatthatāya satthari pasāduppādanena
tika-s0103t:362_2: paṭipada”nti. Vādassa anupatanaṃ anuppavatti vādānupātoti āha “vādoyevā”ti.
tika-s0103t:364_0: 162. Udāyīti nāmaṃ, mahāsarīratāya pana thero mahāudāyīti paññāyittha, yassa vasena
tika-s0103t:364_1: vinaye nisīdanassa dasā anuññātā. Pañcavaṇṇāti khuddikādibhedato pañcappakārā. Pītisamuṭṭhānehi
tika-s0103t:364_2: paṇītarūpehi atibyāpitadeho “nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭasarīro”ti vutto, tato evassā
tika-s0103t:364_3: pariyāyato pharaṇalakkhaṇampi vuttaṃ. Appa-saddo “appakasirenevā”tiādīsu viya idha
tika-s0103t:365_0: Na na katheti kathetiyeva. Cīvarādihetunti cīvaruppādādihetubhūtaṃ payuttakathaṃ
tika-s0103t:365_1: na katheti. Veneyyavasenāti vinetabbapuggalavasena. Katheti “evamayaṃ vinayaṃ upagacchatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:366: 163. Abhikkhaṇanti abhiṇhaṃ. Niggāthakattā, pucchanavissajjanavasena pavattitattā ca “veyyākaraṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyaṃ evāti.
tika-s0103t:372_0: 164. Lakkhassa saravedhaṃ avirajjhitvāna vijjhanavidhiṃ jānantīti vedhaññā. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:373_0: Sampati kālaṃ katoti acirakālaṃ kato. Dvedhikajātāti jātadvedhikā sañjātabhedā. Dvejjhajātāti
tika-s0103t:373_1: duvidhabhāvappattā. Bhaṇḍanti paribhāsanti etenāti bhaṇḍanaṃ, viruddhacittaṃ. Tanti
tika-s0103t:373_2: bhaṇḍanaṃ. “Idaṃ nahānādi na kattabba”nti paññattavattaṃ paṇṇatti. Dhammavinayanti
tika-s0103t:373_3: pāvacanaṃ siddhantaṃ. Vijjhantā mukhasattīhi. Sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ
tika-s0103t:373_5: Adhiciṇṇanti āciṇṇaṃ. Viparāvattanti virodhadassanavasena parāvattitaṃ, parāvattaṃ
tika-s0103t:373_6: dūsitanti attho. Tenāha “cirakālavasena paguṇaṃ, taṃ mama vādaṃ āgamma nivatta”nti.
tika-s0103t:373_7: Pariyesamāno vicara tattha gantvā sikkhāti attho. Sace sakkosi, idāniyeva mayā veṭhitaṃ
tika-s0103t:373_8: dosaṃ nibbeṭhehi. Maraṇamevāti aññamaññaghātanavasena maraṇameva. Nāṭaputtassa imeti
tika-s0103t:373_9: nāṭaputtiyā, te pana tassa sissāti āha “antevāsikesū”ti. Purimapaṭipattito paṭinivattanaṃ
tika-s0103t:373_10: paṭivānaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo etesanti paṭivānarūpā. Tenāha “nivattanasabhāvā”ti.
tika-s0103t:373_11: Kathanaṃ atthassa ācikkhanaṃ. Pavedanaṃ hetudāharaṇāni āharitvā bodhanaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:373_12: “duppavediteti duviññāpite”ti. Na upasamāya saṃvattatīti anupasamasaṃvattanaṃ, tadeva
tika-s0103t:373_13: anupasamasaṃvattanikaṃ, tasmiṃ. Samussitaṃ hutvā patiṭṭhāhetubhāvato thūpaṃ, patiṭṭhāti
tika-s0103t:373_14: āha “bhinnathūpeti bhinnapatiṭṭhe”ti, thūpoti vā dhammassa niyyānabhāvo veditabbo
tika-s0103t:373_15: aññe dhamme abhibhuyya samussitaṭṭhena, so nigaṇṭhassa samaye. Kehici abhinnasammatopi
tika-s0103t:373_16: bhinno vinaṭṭho eva sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti so bhinnathūpo, so eva niyyānabhāvo
tika-s0103t:373_17: vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, tamettha natthīti appaṭisaraṇo, tasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:374: Ācariyappamāṇanti ācariyamuṭṭhi hutvā pamāṇabhūtaṃ. Nānānīhārenāti nānākārena.
tika-s0103t:376_0: “Yenassa upajjhāyo”ti vatvā yathāssa āyasmato cundassa dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko upajjhāyo
tika-s0103t:376_1: ahosi, taṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “buddhakāle kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha buddhakāleti
tika-s0103t:376_2: bhūtakathanametaṃ, na visesanaṃ. Satthu parinibbānato puretarameva hi dhammasenāpati parinibbuto.
tika-s0103t:379_0: Kathāya mūlanti bhagavato santikā labhitabbadhammakathāya kāraṇaṃ. Samuṭṭhāpetīti
tika-s0103t:379_1: uṭṭhāpeti, dāliddiyapaṅkato uddharatīti adhippāyo. Sandhamanti sammadeva dhamanto.
tika-s0103t:379_2: Ekekasmiṃ pahāreyeva tayo tayo vāre katvā divā navavāre rattiṃ navavāre. Upaṭṭhānameva
tika-s0103t:379_3: gacchati buddhupaṭṭhānavasena, pañhāpucchanādivasena pana antarantarāpi gacchateva,
tika-s0103t:379_4: gacchanto ca divasassa…pe… gacchati. Ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa uddharaṇabhāvato pañhova
tika-s0103t:379_5: pañhuddhāro, taṃ gahetvāva gacchati attano mahāpaññatāya, satthu ca dhammadesanāyaṃ akilāsubhāvato.
tika-s0103t:381_0: 166. Ārocitepi tasmiṃ atthe. Sāmiko hoti, tassa sāmikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sova tassā
tika-s0103t:381_1: ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ jānātī”ti āha. Evanti vacanasampaṭicchanaṃ. Cundattherena hi
tika-s0103t:381_2: ānītaṃ kathāpābhataṃ bhagavā sampaṭicchanto “eva”nti āha. “Eva”nti durakkhāte dhammavinaye
tika-s0103t:382_0: Yasmā …pe… pākaṭaṃ hoti byatirekamukhena ca neyyassa atthassa vibhūtabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:382_1: Atha vā yasmā…pe… pākaṭaṃ hoti dosesu ādīnavadassanena tappaṭipakkhesu guṇesu ānisaṃsassa
tika-s0103t:382_2: vibhūtabhāvāpattito. Vokkammāti apasakketvā. Āmeḍitalopena cāyaṃ niddeso, vokkamma
tika-s0103t:382_3: vokkammāti vuttaṃ hoti, tena tassa vokkamanassa antarantarāti ayamattho labbhatīti
tika-s0103t:382_4: āha “na nirantara”ntiādi. Dhammānudhammapaṭipattiādayoti tena satthārā vuttamuttidhammassa
tika-s0103t:382_5: anudhammaṃ appaṭipajjanādayo. Ādi-saddena pāḷiyaṃ āgatā asāmīcipaṭipadādayo ca saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0103t:382_6: Manussattampīti pi-saddena “vicāraṇapaññāya asambhavo, dosesu anabhinivesitā, asandiṭṭhiparāmāsitā”ti
tika-s0103t:382_7: evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. “Tathā eva”nti padehi yathākkamaṃ pakārassa kāmaṃ tirokkhatā,
