tika-s0103t:797_2: Yaṃ pāḷiyaṃ saṅgahavāre “nava indriyāni hontī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbābhogasiddhaṃ pavattiākāravisesaṃ
tika-s0103t:797_3: dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ, atthato pana maggasammādiṭṭhi eva sāti āha “sotāpattimaggañāṇassetaṃ
tika-s0103t:797_4: adhivacana”nti. Aññindriyanti ājānanakaindriyaṃ, paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā
tika-s0103t:797_5: tesaṃyeva tena maggena ñātānaṃ catusaccadhammānaṃ jānanakaindriyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:797_6: Tenāha “aññābhūtaṃ ājānanabhūtaṃ indriya”nti. Ājānātīti añño, aññassa bhūtaṃ, ājānanavasena
tika-s0103t:797_7: vā bhūtanti aññabhūtaṃ. Aññātāvīsūti jānitabbaṃ catuariyasaccaṃ ājānitvā ṭhitesu.
tika-s0103t:798_0: Maṃsacakkhu cakkhupasādoti maṃsacakkhu nāma catasso dhātuyo, vaṇṇo, gandho, raso,
tika-s0103t:798_1: ojā, sambhavo, saṇṭhānaṃ, jīvitaṃ, bhāvo, kāyappasādo, cakkhupasādoti evaṃ cuddasasambhāro maṃsapiṇḍo.
tika-s0103t:799_0: Kasiṇālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattha rūpadassanato “dibbacakkhu ālokanissitaṃ ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:799_1: Dibbacakkhupaññāvinimuttā eva lokiyapaññā paññācakkhūti ayamattho avuttasiddho dibbacakkhussa
tika-s0103t:800_0: Adhikaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ sīlanti adhisīlaṃ. Sikkhitabbatoti āsevitabbato. Adhisīlaṃ nāma
tika-s0103t:800_2: maggasamādhissa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Adhipaññā maggapaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Idāni
tika-s0103t:800_3: nesaṃ adhisīlādibhāvaṃ kāraṇena paṭipādetuṃ “anuppannepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0103t:800_4: anuppanneti appavatte. Adhisīlameva nibbānādhigamassa paccayabhāvato. Samāpannāti
tika-s0103t:803_0: Evaṃ atīte, anāgate ca vaṭṭamūlakadukkhasallakkhaṇavasena saṃvegavatthutāya vimuttiākaṅkhāya
tika-s0103t:803_1: paccayabhūtā kammassakatāpaññā adhipaññā”ti vadanti. Lokiyasīlādīnaṃ adhisīlādibhāvo
tika-s0103t:803_2: pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:804_0: Pañcadvārikakāyoti pañcadvāresu kāyo phassādidhammasamūho. Kāyo ca so bhāvitabhāvena
tika-s0103t:804_1: bhāvanā cāti kāyabhāvanā nāma. Yasmā khīṇāsavānaṃ aggamaggādhigamanena sabbasaṃkilesā
tika-s0103t:804_2: pahīnāti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya sabbaso āsevanābhāvato natthi tesaṃ bhāviniyāpi cakkhusotaviññeyyā
tika-s0103t:804_3: dhammā, pageva kāḷakā, tasmā pañcadvārikakāyo subhāvito eva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “khīṇāsavassa
tika-s0103t:804_4: hi…pe… subhāvito hotī”ti. Na aññesaṃ viya dubbalā dubbalabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā.
tika-s0103t:805_0: Vipassanā dassanānuttariyaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ sammadeva dassanato.
tika-s0103t:805_1: Maggo paṭipadānuttariyaṃ taduttaripaṭipadāya abhāvato. Phalaṃ vimuttānuttariyaṃ akuppabhāvato.
tika-s0103t:805_2: Phalaṃ vā dassanānuttariyaṃ divasampi nibbānaṃ paccakkhato disvā pavattanato. Nibbānaṃ
tika-s0103t:805_4: nibbānassa dassanānuttariyatā vuttāti dassento “tato uttarañhi daṭṭhabbaṃ nāma natthī”ti
tika-s0103t:805_5: āha. Natthi ito uttaranti anuttaraṃ, anuttarameva anuttariyanti āha “uttamaṃ jeṭṭhaka”nti.
tika-s0103t:806_0: Sesoti vuttāvaseso pañcakanayena, catukkanayena ca tividho samādhi, iminā eva ca
tika-s0103t:806_1: samādhittayāpadesena suttantesupi pañcakanayo āgato evāti veditabbaṃ. Tattha yaṃ
tika-s0103t:806_2: vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva, tasmā tattha
tika-s0103t:807_0: Āgacchati nāmaṃ etasmāti āgamanaṃ, tato āgamanato. Saguṇatoti sarasato. Ārammaṇatoti
tika-s0103t:807_1: ārammaṇadhammato. Anattato abhinivisitvāti “sabbe saṅkhārā anattā”ti vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0103t:807_2: Anattato disvāti paṭhamaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ “anattā”ti anattalakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā. Anattato
tika-s0103t:807_3: vuṭṭhātīti vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya anattākārato pavattāya maggavuṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0103t:807_4: Asuññatattakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvāti attābhinivesapaccayānaṃ diṭṭhekaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-s0103t:807_5: vikkhambhanato vipassanā suññatā nāma attasuññatāya yāthāvato gahaṇato. Nanu evaṃ
tika-s0103t:807_6: vipassanāya saguṇato suññatā, na āgamanatoti nippariyāyato natthīti? Saccametaṃ nāmalābhe,
tika-s0103t:807_7: na pana nāmadāneti nāyaṃ doso. Atha vā suttantakathā nāma pariyāyakathā, na abhidhammakathā
tika-s0103t:807_8: viya nippariyāyāti bhiyyopi na koci doso.
tika-s0103t:808_0: Yasmā saguṇato, ārammaṇato ca nāmalābhe saṅkaro hoti ekasseva nāmantaralābhasambhavato.
tika-s0103t:808_1: Āgamanato pana nāmalābhe saṅkaro natthi nāmantaralābhābhāvato, asambhavato ca, tasmā
tika-s0103t:808_3: vikkhambhanato. Kāmañcāyaṃ vipassanā niccanimittādiṃ ugghāṭentī pavattati, saṅkhāranimittassa
tika-s0103t:808_4: pana avissajjanato na nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ labhatīti. Pariyāyena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:808_5: Tathā hi nippariyāyadesanattā abhidhamme maggassa animittanāmaṃ uddhaṭaṃ. Sutte ca –
tika-s0103t:811: Animittapariyāyo āgato. Paṇidhikārakakilesābhāvāti sukhapaṇidhiādipaccayānaṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanato.
tika-s0103t:812_0: Rāgādīhi suññattāti samucchedavasena pajahanato rāgādīhi vivittattā. Rāgādayo eva
tika-s0103t:812_1: rāganimittādīni. Purimuppannā hi rāgādayo parato uppajjanakarāgādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0103t:812_2: Rāgādayo eva tathā paṇidhānassa paccayabhāvato rāgapaṇidhiādayo. Nibbānaṃ visaṅkhārabhāveneva
tika-s0103t:812_4: Ettha ca saṅkhārupekkhā sānulomā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, sā suññato vipassantī “suññatā”ti
tika-s0103t:812_5: vuccati, dukkhato passantī taṇhāpaṇidhisosanato “appaṇihitā”ti. Sā maggādhigamāya
tika-s0103t:812_6: āgamanapaṭipadāṭhāne ṭhatvā maggassa “suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihita”nti nāmaṃ deti.
tika-s0103t:812_7: Āgamanato ca nāme laddhe saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ siddhameva hoti, na pana
tika-s0103t:812_8: saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābhe sabbattha āgamanato nāmaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti paripuṇṇanāmasiddhihetuttā,
tika-s0103t:812_9: “saguṇārammaṇehi sabbesampi nāmattayayogo, na āgamanato”ti vavatthānakarattā ca nippariyāyato
tika-s0103t:812_10: āgamanatova nāmalābho padhānaṃ, na itarehi, pariyāyato pana tidhā nāmalābho icchitabboti
tika-s0103t:812_11: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tividhā kathā”tiādinā ayaṃ vicāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:813: Sucibhāvoti kilesāsucivigamena suddhabhāvo asaṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo. Tenāha “tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ vasena veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0103t:814_0: Munino etānīti moneyyāni. Yehi dhammehi ubhayahitamunanato muni nāma hoti, te evaṃ
tika-s0103t:814_1: vuttāti āha “munibhāvakarā moneyyapaṭipadā dhammā”ti. Tattha yasmā kāyena akattabbassa
tika-s0103t:814_2: akaraṇaṃ, kattabbassa ca karaṇaṃ, “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādinā kāyasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0103t:814_3: ārammaṇassa jānanaṃ, kāyassa ca samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato
tika-s0103t:814_4: ca yāthāvato parijānanaṃ, tathā parijānanavasena pavatto vipassanāmaggo, tena ca
tika-s0103t:814_5: kāye chandarāgassa pajahanaṃ, kāyasaṅkhāraṃ nirodhetvā pattabbasamāpatti cāti sabbe
tika-s0103t:814_6: ete kāyamukhena pavattā moneyyapaṭipadā dhammā kāyamoneyyaṃ nāma. Tasmā tamatthaṃ
tika-s0103t:814_7: dassetuṃ “tividhakāyaduccaritassa pahāna”ntiādinā pāḷi āgatā. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:814_8: Tattha copanavācañceva saddavācañca ārabbha pavattā paññā vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Tassa
tika-s0103t:814_9: vācāya samudayādito parijānanaṃ vācāpariññā. Ekāsītividhaṃ lokiyacittaṃ ārabbha pavattañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:814_10: manārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Tassa samudayādito parijānanaṃ manopariññāti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0103t:815_0: Ayanti ito sampattiyoti āyo, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhibuddhīti āha “āyoti vuḍḍhī”ti.
tika-s0103t:815_1: Apenti sampattiyo etenāti apāyo, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ hānīti āha “apāyoti avuḍḍhī”ti.
tika-s0103t:815_2: Tassa tassāti āyassa ca apāyassa ca. Kāraṇaṃ upāyo upeti upagacchati etena āyo, apāyo
tika-s0103t:815_3: cāti. Tattha duvidhā vuḍḍhi anatthahānito, atthuppattito ca, tathā avuḍḍhi atthahānito,
tika-s0103t:815_4: anatthuppattito ca. Tesaṃ pajānanāti tesaṃ āyāpāyasaññitānaṃ yathāvuttappabhedānaṃ
tika-s0103t:815_5: vuḍḍhiavuḍḍhīnaṃ yāthāvato pajānanā. Kosallaṃ kusalatā nipuṇatā. Tadubhayampi pāḷivaseneva
tika-s0103t:816_0: Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ anuppattinirodhesu, kusaladhammānañca
tika-s0103t:816_1: uppattibhiyyobhāvesu paññā, idaṃ āyakosallaṃ nāma vuccati. Idāni apāyakosallampi
tika-s0103t:816_2: pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ “tattha katama”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha idaṃ vuccatīti yā imesaṃ
tika-s0103t:816_4: paññā, idaṃ apāyakosallaṃ nāma vuccatīti. Etthāhaāyakosallaṃ tāva paññā hotu, apāyakosallaṃ
tika-s0103t:816_5: kathaṃ paññā nāma jātāti evaṃ maññati “apāyuppādanasamatthatā apāyakosallaṃ nāmā”ti,
tika-s0103t:816_6: taṃ pana tassa matimattaṃ. Paññavā eva hi “mayhaṃ evaṃ manasi karoto anuppannā kusalā
tika-s0103t:816_7: dhammā nuppajjanti, uppannā nirujjhanti. Anuppannā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti, uppannā
tika-s0103t:816_8: vaḍḍhantī”ti pajānāti, so evaṃ ñatvā anuppanne akusale dhamme na uppādeti, uppanne
tika-s0103t:816_9: pajahati. Anuppanne kusale dhamme uppādeti, uppanne bhāvanāpāripūriṃ pāpeti. Evaṃ
tika-s0103t:816_10: apāyakosallampi paññā evāti. Sabbāpīti āyakosallapakkhikāpi apāyakosallapakkhikāpi.
tika-s0103t:817_0: Tassa tikicchanatthanti accāyikassa kiccassa, bhayassa vā pariharaṇatthaṃ ṭhānuppattiyakāraṇajānanavasenevāti
tika-s0103t:817_1: ṭhāne taṅkhaṇe eva uppatti etassa atthīti ṭhānuppattikaṃ, ṭhānaso uppajjanakakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:818_0: Majjanākāravasena pavattamānāti attano vatthuno madanīyatāya madassa āpajjanākārena
tika-s0103t:818_1: pavattamānā uṇṇatiyo. Nirogoti arogo. Mānakaraṇanti mānassa uppādanaṃ. Yobbane ṭhatvāti
tika-s0103t:818_2: yobbane patiṭṭhāya, yobbanaṃ apassāyāti attho. Sabbesampi jīvitaṃ nāma maraṇapabhaṅguraṃ
tika-s0103t:818_3: dukkhānubandhañca, tadubhayaṃ anoloketvā, pabandhaṭṭhitipaccayā sulabhatañca nissāya
tika-s0103t:819_0: Adhipati vuccati jeṭṭhako, issaroti attho. Tato adhipatito āgataṃ ādhipateyyaṃ. Kiṃ
tika-s0103t:819_1: taṃ? Pāpassa akaraṇaṃ. Tenāha “ettakomhī”tiādi. Tattha sīlādayo lokiyā eva daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0103t:819_2: tasmā vimuttiyāti lokiyavimuttiyā. Jeṭṭhakanti issaraṃ, garunti attho. Ettha ca attānaṃ,
tika-s0103t:819_3: dhammañca adhipatiṃ katvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ hiriyā vasena veditabbaṃ. Lokaṃ adhipatiṃ
tika-s0103t:820_0: Kathāvatthūnīti kathāya pavattiṭṭhānāni. Yasmā tehi vinā kathā nappavattati, tasmā
tika-s0103t:820_1: “kathākāraṇānī”ti vuttaṃ. Addhāna-saddassa attho heṭṭhā vutto eva, so panatthato
tika-s0103t:820_2: dhammappavattimattaṃ. Dhammā cettha khandhā eva, tabbinimuttā ca tesaṃ gati natthīti
tika-s0103t:820_3: āha “atītaṃ dhammaṃ, atītakkhandheti attho”ti. Ayañca addhā nāma disādi viya atthato
tika-s0103t:820_4: dhammappavattiṃ upādāya paññattimattaṃ, na upādā na bhūtadhammoti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t:821_1: vuttaṃ. Pubbenivāsanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhe. Tamanti mohatamaṃ. Vijjhatīti vihanati,
tika-s0103t:821_2: pajahatīti attho. Teneva ca paṭicchādakatamavijjhanena pubbenivāsañca viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ
tika-s0103t:822_0: Upapattidevavisesabhāvāvaho vihāroti katvā dibbo vihāro. Nanu evaṃ aññamaññānampi
tika-s0103t:822_1: dibbavihārabhāvo āpajjatīti? Na tāsaṃ sattesu hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattiyā savisesaṃ
tika-s0103t:822_2: niddosaṭṭhena, seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca brahmavihārasamaññāya niruḷhabhāvato. Suvisuddhito
tika-s0103t:822_3: paṭipakkhasamucchindanavasena araṇīyato pattabbato, ariyabhāvappattiyā vā anantaraṃ
tika-s0103t:822_4: ariyo. Ariyānaṃ ayanti vā ariyo vihāro.
tika-s0103t:827_0: Yo chandoti yo chandiyanavasena chando. Chandikatāti chandabhāvo, chandikaraṇākāro
tika-s0103t:827_1: vā. Kattukamyatāti kattukāmatā. Kusaloti cheko kosallasambhūto. Dhammacchandoti sabhāvacchando.
tika-s0103t:827_2: Ayañhi chando nāma taṇhāchando, diṭṭhichando, vīriyachando, dhammacchandoti bahuvidho.
tika-s0103t:827_3: Idha kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando adhippeto. Chandaṃ janetīti taṃ chandaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0103t:827_4: Taṃ pavattento hi janeti nāma. Vāyāmaṃ karotīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ
tika-s0103t:827_5: ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ pavatteti. Cittaṃ upatthambhetīti teneva sahajātavīriyena
tika-s0103t:827_6: cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni padāni
tika-s0103t:828_0: Chandaṃ nissāyāti “chandavato cetosamādhi hoti, mayhaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ chandaṃ
tika-s0103t:828_1: nissāya chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pavatto samādhi chandasamādhi.
tika-s0103t:828_2: Padhānabhūtāti padhānajātā, padhānabhāvaṃ vā pattā. Saṅkhārāti catukiccasādhakaṃ
tika-s0103t:828_3: sammappadhānavīriyaṃ vadati. Tehi dhammehīti yathāvuttasamādhivīriyehi upetaṃ sampayuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:828_4: Iddhiyā pādanti nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena, ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā
tika-s0103t:828_5: ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena “iddhī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
tika-s0103t:828_6: chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena pādabhūtaṃ. Yasmā purimā iddhi pacchimāya
tika-s0103t:828_7: iddhiyā pādo pādakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tasmā “iddhibhūtaṃ vā pāda”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:828_8: Sesesupīti dutiyaiddhipādādīsu. Kāmañcettha janavasabhasuttepi iddhipādavicāro āgato,
tika-s0103t:828_9: sopi saṅkhepato evāti āha “vitthāro pana…pe… dīpito”ti.
tika-s0103t:829_0: 307. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvoti āha “imasmiṃyeva attabhāve”ti.
tika-s0103t:829_1: Sukhavihāratthāyāti nikkilesatāya nirāmisena sukhena viharaṇatthāya. Phalasamāpattijhānānīti
tika-s0103t:829_2: cattāripi phalasamāpattijhānāni. Aparabhāgeti āsavakkhayādhigamato aparabhāge. Nibbattitajjhānānīti
tika-s0103t:830_0: Sūriyacandapajjotamaṇiādīnanti pajjotaggahaṇena padīpaṃ vadati. Ādi-saddena ukkāvijjulatādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t:830_1: saṅgaho. Ālokoti manasi karotīti sūriyacandālokādiṃ divā, rattiñca upaladdhaṃ yathāladdhavaseneva
tika-s0103t:830_2: manasi karoti citte ṭhapeti. Tathāva naṃ manasi karoti, yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa
tika-s0103t:830_3: viya kasiṇāloko yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ. So āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati, yena tattha
tika-s0103t:830_4: divāsaññaṃ ṭhapeti divā viya vigatathinamiddho hoti. Tenāha “yathā divā tathā ratti”nti.
tika-s0103t:830_5: Yathā rattiṃ āloko diṭṭhoti yathā rattiyā candālokādiāloko diṭṭho upaladdho. Evameva
tika-s0103t:830_6: divā manasi karotīti rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva divā taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapeti.
tika-s0103t:830_7: Apihitenāti thinamiddhapidhānena na pihitena. Anaddhenāti asañchāditena. Saobhāsanti
tika-s0103t:830_8: sañāṇobhāsaṃ. Thinamiddhavinodanaālokopi vā hotu kasiṇālokopi vā parikammālokopi
tika-s0103t:830_9: vā, upakkilesāloko viya sabbāyaṃ āloko ñāṇasamuṭṭhāno vāti. Ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhatthāyāti
tika-s0103t:830_11: ca dassanaṭṭhena idha “ñāṇadassana”nti adhippetaṃ. “Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotī”ti
tika-s0103t:830_12: ettha vuttaāloko thinamiddhavinodanaāloko. Parikammaālokoti dibbacakkhuñāṇāya parikammakaraṇavasena
tika-s0103t:830_13: pavattitaāloko. Tattha purimassa vasena “khīṇāsavassā”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. Tassa
tika-s0103t:830_14: hi thinamiddhaṃ suppahīnaṃ hoti, na aññesaṃ. Dutiyassa vasena “tasmiṃ vā āgatepī”tiādi
tika-s0103t:830_15: vuttaṃ. Tattha tasminti dibbacakkhuñāṇe. Āgatepīti paṭiladdhepi. Anāgatepīti appaṭiladdhepi.
tika-s0103t:830_16: Yasmā tathārūpassa pādakajjhānasseva vasena parikammaālokassa sambhavo, yato taṃ
tika-s0103t:831_0: Sattaṭṭhānikassāti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādinā vuttassa sattaṭṭhānikassa.
tika-s0103t:831_1: Satipi sekkhānaṃ pariññātabhāve ekantato pariññātavatthukā nāma arahanto evāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0103t:831_2: “khīṇāsavassa vatthu viditaṃ hotī”tiādi. Vatthārammaṇaviditatāyāti vatthuno, ārammaṇassa
tika-s0103t:831_3: ca yāthāvato viditabhāvena. Yathā hi sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye vidite
tika-s0103t:831_4: sopi vidito eva ca hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ vedanāya
tika-s0103t:831_5: āsayabhūte vatthumhi, ārammaṇe ca vidite ādikammikassapi vedanā viditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato,
tika-s0103t:831_6: sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā, pageva pariññātavatthukassa khīṇāsavassa.
tika-s0103t:831_7: Tassa hi uppādakkhaṇepi ṭhitikkhaṇepi bhaṅgakkhaṇepi vedanā viditā pākaṭā honti.
tika-s0103t:831_8: Tenāha “evaṃ vedanā uppajjantī”tiādi. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ, yadidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vedanāsaññāvitakkaggahaṇanti
tika-s0103t:831_9: dassento “na kevala”ntiādimāha, tena avasesato sabbadhammānampi uppādādito viditabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0103t:832_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ khaṇato eva, atha kho paccayatopi aniccāditopi na kevalaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃyeva
tika-s0103t:832_1: vasena, atha kho ekaccānaṃ sekkhānampi vasena vedanādīnaṃ viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:832_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha avijjāsamudayāti avijjāya uppādā, atthibhāvāti attho. Nirodhavirodhī
tika-s0103t:832_3: hi uppādo atthibhāvavācakopi hotīti tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ
tika-s0103t:832_4: bhave vedanāya uppādo hotīti attho. Avijjādīhi atītakālikādīhi tesaṃ sahakāraṇabhūtāni
tika-s0103t:832_5: uppādādīnipi gahitānevāti veditabbaṃ. Vedanāya pavattipaccayesu phassassa balavabhāvato
tika-s0103t:832_6: so eva gahito “phassasamudayā”ti. Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena vatthārammaṇādīnipi
tika-s0103t:832_7: gahitāneva hontīti sabbassāpi vedanāya anavasesato paccayato udayadassanaṃ vibhāvitanti
tika-s0103t:832_9: uppādo, uppajjanaṃ uppādoti paccayalakkhaṇaṃ, khaṇalakkhaṇañca ubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0103t:833_0: Aniccato manasi karototi vedanā nāmāyaṃ anaccantikatāya ādiantavatī udayabbayaparicchinnā
tika-s0103t:833_1: khaṇabhaṅgurā tāvakālikā, tasmā “aniccā”ti aniccato manasi karoto. Tassā khayato,
tika-s0103t:833_2: vayato ca upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Dukkhato manasi karototi aniccattā eva
tika-s0103t:833_3: vedanā udayabbayapaṭipīḷitatāya, dukkhamatāya, dukkhavatthutāya ca “dukkhā”ti manasi
tika-s0103t:833_4: karoto bhayato bhāyitabbato tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti. Tathā aniccattā,
tika-s0103t:833_5: dukkhattā eva ca vedanā attarahitā asārā nissārā avasavattinī tucchāti vedanaṃ anattato
tika-s0103t:833_6: manasi karoto suññato rittato asāmikato upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. “Khayato”tiādi
tika-s0103t:833_7: vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṃ. Tasmā vedanaṃ khayato bhayato suññato jānātīti atthavasena
tika-s0103t:833_8: vibhattipariṇāmo veditabbo. Avijjānirodhā vedanānirodhoti aggamaggena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato
tika-s0103t:833_9: vedanāya anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato. Sesaṃ samudayavāre vuttanayānusārena
tika-s0103t:833_10: veditabbaṃ. Idha samādhibhāvanāti sikhāppattā ariyānaṃ vipassanāsamādhibhāvanā. Tassā
tika-s0103t:835_0: 308. Pamāṇaṃ aggahetvāti asubhabhāvanā viya padesaṃ aggahetvā. Ekasmimpi satte pamāṇāggahaṇena
tika-s0103t:835_1: anavasesapharaṇena. Natthi etāsaṃ gahetabbaṃ pamāṇanti hi appamāṇā, appamāṇā eva appamaññā.
tika-s0103t:836_0: Apassayitabbaṭṭhena apassenāni, idha bhikkhu yāni apassāya tisso sikkhā sikkhituṃ
tika-s0103t:836_1: samattho hoti, tesameva adhivacanaṃ. Tāni panetāni paccayānaṃ saṅkhāya sevitā adhivāsanakkhanti,
tika-s0103t:836_3: Tattha sammadeva khāyati upaṭṭhāti paṭibhātīti saṅkhā, ñāṇanti āha “saṅkhāyāti ñāṇenā”ti.
tika-s0103t:836_4: Saṅkhāya sevitā nāma yaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
tika-s0103t:836_5: tassa sevanāti āha “sevitabbayuttakameva sevatī”ti. Adhivāsanādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:836_6: Anto pavisitunti abbhantare attano citte pavattituṃ na deti.
tika-s0103t:838: 309. Vaṃsa-saddo “piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdatī”tiādīsu dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ gopānasīnaṃ sandhānaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadaṇḍake āgato.
tika-s0103t:843_1: yo “veṇū” tipi vuccati. “Abhinnena piṭṭhivaṃsena mato hatthī”tiādīsu hatthiādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t:843_3: paveṇīpālako”tiādīsu guṇānupubbiyaṃ guṇānaṃ pabandhappavattiyaṃ. Idha pana catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0103t:843_4: pabandhe daṭṭhabbo. Tassa pana vaṃsassa kulanvayaṃ, guṇanvayañca nidassanavasena
tika-s0103t:843_5: dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha khattiyavaṃsoti khattiyakulanvayo. Eseva
tika-s0103t:843_6: nayo sesapadesupi. Samaṇavaṃso pana samaṇatanti samaṇapaveṇī. Mūlagandhādīnanti ādi-saddena
tika-s0103t:843_7: yathā sāragandhādīnaṃ saṅgaho, evamettha gorasādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Dutiyena
tika-s0103t:843_8: pana ādi-saddena kāsikavatthasappimaṇḍādīnaṃ. Ariya-saddo amilakkhūsupi manussesu
tika-s0103t:843_9: vattati, yesaṃ pana nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ “ariyaṃ āyatana”nti vuccati. Yathāha “yāvatā,
tika-s0103t:843_10: ānanda, ariyaṃ āyatana”nti lokiyasādhujanesupi “ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā…pe…
tika-s0103t:843_11: tesaṃ ahaṃ aññataro”tiādīsu. Idha pana ye “ārakā kilesehī”tiādinā laddhanibbacanā
tika-s0103t:843_12: paṭividdhaariyasaccā, te eva adhippetāti dassetuṃ “ke pana te ariyā”ti pucchaṃ katvā
tika-s0103t:844_0: Tattha ye mahāpaṇidhānakappato paṭṭhāya yāvāyaṃ kappo, etthantare uppannā sammāsambuddhā,
tika-s0103t:844_1: te tāva sarūpato dassetvā tadaññepi sammāsambuddhe, paccekabuddhe, buddhasāvake ca
tika-s0103t:844_2: saṅgahetvā anavasesato ariye dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yāva sāsanaṃ na
tika-s0103t:844_3: antaradhāyati, tāva satthā dharati eva nāmāti imameva bhagavantaṃ, ye cetarahi buddhasāvakā,
tika-s0103t:844_4: te ca sandhāya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vā kāle te te paccuppannāti ce,
tika-s0103t:844_5: atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ na kattabbaṃ siyā. Idāni yathā bhagavā “dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave,
tika-s0103t:844_6: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:844_7: parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi, yadidaṃ chachakkānī”ti chakkadesanāya aṭṭhahi
tika-s0103t:844_8: padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, evaṃ mahāariyavaṃsadesanāya ariyānaṃ vaṃsānaṃ “cattārome, bhikkhave,
tika-s0103t:844_9: ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṅkīyanti
tika-s0103t:844_10: na saṅkīyissanti appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī”ti yehi navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:844_11: abhāsi, tāni tāva ānetvā thomanāvaseneva vaṇṇento “te kho panete”tiādimāha. Aggāti
tika-s0103t:844_12: jānitabbā sabbavaṃsehi seṭṭhabhāvato, seṭṭhabhāvasādhanato ca. Dīgharattaṃ pavattāti
tika-s0103t:844_13: jānitabbā rattaññūhi, buddhādīhi tehi ca tathā anuṭṭhitattā. Vaṃsāti jānitabbā buddhādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t:844_14: ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. Porāṇāti purātanā. Na adhunuppattikāti na adhunātanā.
tika-s0103t:844_15: Asaṃkiṇṇāti na khittā na chaḍḍitā. Tenāha “anapanītā”ti. Na apanītapubbāti na chaḍḍitapubbā
tika-s0103t:844_16: tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ paripūraṇūpāyabhāvato na paricattapubbā. Tato eva idānipi na
tika-s0103t:844_17: apanīyanti, anāgatepi na apanīyissanti. Ye dhammasabhāvassa vijānaneva viññū samitapāpasamaṇā
tika-s0103t:844_18: ceva bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇā ca, tehi appaṭikuṭṭhā appaṭikkhittā. Ye hi na paṭikkositabbā,
tika-s0103t:844_19: te aninditabbā agarahitabbā. Apariccajitabbatāya appaṭikkhipitabbā hontīti.
tika-s0103t:845_1: vuttaṃ. Jhānavipassanādivasenapi idha bhikkhuno santuṭṭhatā hotīti. Itarītarenāti
tika-s0103t:845_2: itarena itarena. Itara-saddoyaṃ aniyamavacano, dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃkiñci-saddehi
tika-s0103t:845_3: samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ “yena kenacī”ti. Svāyaṃ aniyamavācitāya eva yathā thūlādīnaṃ
tika-s0103t:845_4: aññataravacano, evaṃ yathāladdhādīnampi aññataravacanoti tattha dutiyapakkhasseva
tika-s0103t:845_5: idha icchitabhāvaṃ dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha. Nanu ca yathāladdhādayopi thūlādayo
tika-s0103t:845_6: eva? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi atthi viseso. Yo hi yathāladdhesu thūlādīsu santoso, so
tika-s0103t:845_7: yathālābhasantoso eva, na itaro. Na hi so paccayamattasannissayo icchito, atha kho
tika-s0103t:845_8: attano kāyabalasāruppabhāvasannissayopi. Thūladukādayo ca tayopi cīvare labbhanti.
tika-s0103t:845_9: Majjhimo catupaccayasādhāraṇo, pacchimo pana cīvare, senāsane ca labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:845_10: “Ime tayo santose”ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Ye hi parato gilānapaccayaṃ
tika-s0103t:845_11: piṇḍapāte eva pakkhipitvā cīvare vīsati, piṇḍapāte pannarasa, senāsane pannarasāti
tika-s0103t:845_12: samapaṇṇāsasantosā vuccanti, te sabbepi yathārahaṃ imesu eva tīsu santosesu saṅgahaṃ
tika-s0103t:846_0: Cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti “idaṃ nāma cīvaraṃ kappiya”nti jātito cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ. Cīvarakkhettanti
tika-s0103t:846_2: cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti attho. Cīvarasantosoti cīvare labbhamāno sabbo santoso jānitabbo.
tika-s0103t:846_3: Cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni, yāni tosanto cīvarasantosena sammadeva
tika-s0103t:846_4: santuṭṭho hotīti. Khomakappāsikakoseyyakambalasāṇabhaṅgāni khomādīni. Tattha khomaṃ
tika-s0103t:846_5: nāma khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭacīvaraṃ, tathā sesānipi. Sāṇanti sāṇavākasuttehi
tika-s0103t:846_6: katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅganti pana khomasuttādīni sabbāni ekaccāni vomissetvā katacīvaraṃ.
tika-s0103t:846_7: “Bhaṅgampi vākamayamevā”ti keci. Chāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Yadi evaṃ ito aññā vatthajāti
tika-s0103t:846_8: natthīti? No natthi, sā pana etesaṃ anulomāti dassetuṃ “dukūlādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:846_9: Ādi-saddena paṭṭuṇṇaṃ, somārapaṭṭaṃ, cīnapaṭṭaṃ, iddhijaṃ, devadinnanti etesaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0103t:846_10: Tattha dukūlaṃ sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. Paṭṭuṇṇadese sañjātavatthaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:846_11: “Paṭṭuṇṇaṃ koseyyaviseso”ti hi amarakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese, cīnadese ca jātavatthāni
tika-s0103t:846_12: somāracīnapaṭṭāni. Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-s0103t:846_13: Iddhijaṃ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattaṃ cīvaraṃ, taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti
tika-s0103t:846_14: tesameva anulomañca. Devatāhi dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ devadinnaṃ, taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ
tika-s0103t:846_15: jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva
tika-s0103t:846_16: anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato. Imānīti antogadhāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ, imāni evāti
tika-s0103t:847_0: Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitāni ekadesena dassetuṃ “kusacīra”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0103t:847_1: kusatiṇehi, aññehi vā tādisehi tiṇehi katacīvaraṃ kusacīraṃ. Potakīvākādīhi vākehi
tika-s0103t:847_2: katacīvaraṃ vākacīraṃ. Catukkoṇehi, tikoṇehi vā phalakehi katacīvaraṃ phalakacīraṃ.
tika-s0103t:847_3: Manussānaṃ kesehi katakambalaṃ kesakambalaṃ. Cāmarīvālaassavālādīhi kataṃ vālakambalaṃ.
tika-s0103t:847_4: Makacitantūhi vāyito potthako. Cammanti migacammādi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ. Ulūkapakkhehi
tika-s0103t:847_5: ganthetvā katacīvaraṃ ulūkapakkhaṃ. Bhujatacādimayaṃ rukkhadussaṃ, tirīṭakanti attho.
tika-s0103t:847_6: Sukhumatarāhi latāvākehi vāyitaṃ latādussaṃ. Erakavākehi kataṃ erakadussaṃ. Tathā
tika-s0103t:847_7: kadalidussaṃ. Sukhumehi veḷuvilīvehi kataṃ veḷudussaṃ. Ādi-saddena vakkalādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0103t:848_0: Aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasenāti “sīmāya deti, katikāya detī”tiādinā āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-s0103t:848_2: “aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā”tiādinā mātikā ṭhapitā. Mātikāti hi mātaro cīvaruppattijanikāti.
tika-s0103t:848_3: Sosānikanti susāne patitakaṃ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitakaṃ. Rathiyanti puññatthikehi
tika-s0103t:848_4: vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Saṅkārakūṭakanti saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ.
tika-s0103t:848_5: Sinānanti nhānacoḷaṃ, yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sīsaṃ nhāpetvā “kāḷakaṇṇīcoḷaka”nti chaḍḍetvā
tika-s0103t:848_6: gacchanti. Titthanti titthacoḷakaṃ sinānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. Aggidaḍḍhanti agginā
tika-s0103t:848_7: daḍḍhappadesaṃ. Tañhi manussā chaḍḍenti. Gokhāyitakādīni pākaṭāneva. Tānipi hi manussā chaḍḍenti.
tika-s0103t:849: Dhajaṃ ussāpetvāti nāvaṃ ārohantehi vā yuddhaṃ pavisantehi vā dhajayaṭṭhiṃ ussāpetvā tattha baddhaṃ pārutacīvaraṃ, tehi chaḍḍitanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:850_1: ekamāsamattaṃ. Vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati, na tato paranti adhippāyo. Sabbassāpi hi taṇhāniggahatthāya
tika-s0103t:850_2: sāsane paṭipattīti. Paṃsukūliko addhamāseneva karotīti aparapaṭibaddhattā paṭilābhassa.
tika-s0103t:850_3: Itarassa pana parapaṭibaddhattā māsamattaṃ anuññātaṃ. Iti māsaddha…pe… vitakkasantoso
tika-s0103t:851_0: Mahātheraṃ tattha attano sahāyaṃ icchantopi garugāravena gāmadvāraṃ “bhante gamissāmi”
tika-s0103t:851_1: iccevamāha. Mahātheropissa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “ahaṃ pāvuso gamissāmī”ti āha. “Imassa
tika-s0103t:851_2: bhikkhuno vitakkassa avasaro mā hotū”ti pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi. Uccārapalibuddhoti
tika-s0103t:851_3: uccārena pīḷito. Tadā bhagavato dukkarakiriyānussaraṇamukhena tathāgate uppannapītisomanassavegassa
tika-s0103t:851_4: balavabhāvena kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā tasmiṃyeva…pe… tīṇi phalāni patto.
tika-s0103t:852_1: labhissāmi, manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti evamādicintanāya kā nāma kathā. Kathaṃ pana vattabbanti
tika-s0103t:852_2: āha “kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamana”nti, tena cīvaraṃ paṭicca kiñcipi na cintetabbaṃ evāti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:853: Apesalo appatirūpāyapi pariyesanāya paccayo bhaveyyāti “pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:854: Āhariyamānanti susānādīsu patitakaṃ vatthaṃ “ime bhikkhū paṃsukūlapariyesanaṃ carantī”ti ñatvā kenaci purisena tato ānīyamānaṃ.
tika-s0103t:855_0: Evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpīti evaṃ paṭilābhasantosaṃ akopetvāva laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi.
tika-s0103t:855_1: Attano pahonakamattenevāti yathāladdhānaṃ paṃsukūlavatthānaṃ ekapaṭṭadupaṭṭānaṃ atthāya
tika-s0103t:856: Gāme bhikkhāya āhiṇḍantena sapadānacārinā viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanaṃ nāma cīvaraloluppassa dūrasamussāritattā.
tika-s0103t:860: Akopetvāti santosaṃ akopetvā. Pahonakanīhārenevāti antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kātukāmo, tassa pahonakaniyāmeneva yathāladdhaṃ thūlasukhumādiṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ.
tika-s0103t:861_1: ce galavāṭamaṇḍalaṃ, jāṇumaṇḍala”nti evaṃ timaṇḍalapaṭicchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ;
tika-s0103t:861_2: taṃ pana atthato tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ heṭṭhimantena vuttaparimāṇameva hoti.
tika-s0103t:863: Kusibandhanakāleti maṇḍalāni yojetvā sibbanakāle. Sattavāreti sattasibbanavāre.
tika-s0103t:865_0: Sītapaṭighātādi atthāpattito sijjhatīti mukhyameva cīvaraparibhoge payojanaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0103t:866: Vaṭṭati, na tāvatā santoso kuppati sambhārānaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyānañca alābhato.
tika-s0103t:867: Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇato paribhoge ṭhatvā.
tika-s0103t:868_1: paccayataṃ dassento iti ime dhammā aññamaññassa samuṭṭhāpakā, upatthambhakā cāti
tika-s0103t:869_0: “Santuṭṭho hoti vaṇṇavādī”ti ettha catukkoṭikaṃ sambhavati, tattha catutthoyeva pakkho
tika-s0103t:869_1: satthārā vaṇṇito thomitoti mahātherena tathā desanā katā. Eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa
tika-s0103t:869_2: vaṇṇaṃ na katheti seyyathāpi thero nālako (suttanipāte nālakasutte vitthāro) eko
tika-s0103t:869_3: na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇavādī seyyathāpi upanando sakyaputto. Eko neva
tika-s0103t:869_4: santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. Seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyī eko santuṭṭho
tika-s0103t:869_5: ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇavādī seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo.
tika-s0103t:870_0: Anesananti ayuttaṃ esanaṃ. Tenāha “appatirūpa”nti, sāsane ṭhitānaṃ na patirūpaṃ asāruppaṃ
tika-s0103t:870_1: ayogyaṃ. Kohaññaṃ karontoti cīvaruppādanimittaṃ paresaṃ kuhanaṃ vimhāpanaṃ karonto.
tika-s0103t:870_2: Uttasatīti taṇhāsantāsena uparūpari tasati. Paritasatīti parito tasati. Yathā sabbe
tika-s0103t:870_3: kāyavacīpayogā tadatthā eva jāyanti, evaṃ sabbabhāgehi tasati. Gadhitaṃ vuccati gaddho,
tika-s0103t:870_4: so cettha abhijjhālakkhaṇo adhippeto. Gadhitaṃ etassa natthīti agadhitoti āha “agadhito…pe…
tika-s0103t:870_5: lobhagiddho”ti. Mucchanti taṇhāvasena muyhanaṃ, tassa vā samussayaṃ adhigataṃ. Anāpanno
tika-s0103t:870_6: anupagato. Anotthatoti anajjhotthato. Apariyonaddhoti taṇhāchadanena acchādito. Ādīnavaṃ
tika-s0103t:870_7: passamānoti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikañca dosaṃ passanto. Gadhitaparibhogato nissarati
tika-s0103t:870_8: etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, idamatthikatā, taṃ pajānātīti nissaraṇapañño. Tenāha “yāvadeva…pe… pajānanto”ti.
tika-s0103t:871_0: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti attānaṃ neva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhato dahati. “Aha”ntiādi
tika-s0103t:871_1: ukkaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. Na vambhetīti na hīḷayati nihīnato na dahati. Tasmiṃ cīvarasantoseti
tika-s0103t:871_2: tasmiṃ yathāvutte vīsatividhe cīvarasantose. Kāmañcettha vuttappakārasantosaggahaṇena
tika-s0103t:871_3: cīvarahetu anesanāpajjanādipi gahitameva tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati ca abhāvato,
tika-s0103t:871_4: vaṇṇavāditānattukkaṃsanā paravambhanāni pana gahitāni na hontīti “vaṇṇavāditādīsu
tika-s0103t:871_5: vā”ti vikappo vutto. Ettha ca “dakkho”tiādi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasenassa yathāvuttasantosādi
tika-s0103t:871_6: ijjhati, taṃ dassanaṃ. Tattha “dakkho”ti iminā tesaṃ samuṭṭhāpanapaññaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0103t:872_0: Piṇḍapāto jānitabboti pabhedato piṇḍapāto jānitabbo. Piṇḍapātakkhettanti piṇḍapātassa
tika-s0103t:872_1: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabboti piṇḍapāte santoso pabhedato jānitabbo.
tika-s0103t:872_2: Idha bhesajjampi piṇḍapātagatikameva. Āharitabbato hi sappiādīnampi gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0103t:873_0: Piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ piṇḍapātassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Khettaṃ viya khettaṃ. Uppajjati ettha,
tika-s0103t:873_1: etenāti ca uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅghato vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto uppajjati uddesādivasena
tika-s0103t:873_2: vā. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ. Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā
tika-s0103t:873_3: uddesena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ. Nimantetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ nimantanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:873_4: Salākadānavasena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:873_5: bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ. Uposathe dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uposathikaṃ. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:873_6: bhattaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ. Āgantukānaṃ dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ. Dhuragehe eva
tika-s0103t:873_7: ṭhapetvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ. Kuṭiṃ uddissa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:873_8: Gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ
tika-s0103t:874_0: Vitakketi “kattha nu kho ahaṃ ajja piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti. “Kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti
tika-s0103t:874_1: therena vutte “asukagāme bhante”ti kāmametaṃ paṭivacanadānaṃ, yena pana cittena “cintetvā”ti
tika-s0103t:874_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha “ettakaṃ cintetvā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāyāti vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā
tika-s0103t:874_3: vitakkitakālato paṭṭhāya. “Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hotī”ti idaṃ tiṇṇampi
tika-s0103t:874_4: ariyavaṃsikānaṃ vasena gahetabbaṃ, na ekacārikasseva. Sabbopi hi ariyavaṃsiko ekavārameva
tika-s0103t:874_5: vitakketuṃ labhati, na tato paraṃ. Paribāhiroti ariyavaṃsikabhāvato bahibhūto. Svāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:874_6: vitakkasantoso kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena na kuppati, visujjhati ca. Ito paresupi eseva
tika-s0103t:875: Gahetabbamevāti aṭṭhānappayutto eva-saddo. Yāpanamattameva gahetabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:876_0: Etthāti etasmiṃ piṇḍapātapaṭiggahaṇe. Appanti attano yāpanapamāṇatopi appaṃ. Gahetabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:876_1: dāyakassa cittārādhanatthaṃ. Pamāṇenevāti attano yāpanappamāṇeneva appaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0103t:876_2: “Pamāṇena gahetabba”nti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭiggahaṇasmiñhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Makkhetīti
tika-s0103t:876_3: viddhaṃseti apaneti. Vinipātetīti vināseti aṭṭhānaviniyogena. Sāsananti satthu sāsanaṃ
tika-s0103t:877: Sapadānacārino viya dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantosoti āha “dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabba”nti.
tika-s0103t:879: Āhāragedhato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ. Jighacchāya paṭivinodanatthaṃ kathā, kāyassaṭhitiādipayojanaṃ pana atthāpattito āgataṃ evāti āha “jighacchāya…pe… santoso nāmā”ti.
tika-s0103t:880: Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbaṃ tadahupīti adhippāyo. Itaratthā pana sikkhāpadeneva vāritaṃ. Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitenāti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhitena.
tika-s0103t:881_0: Senāsanenāti sayanena, āsanena ca. Yattha yattha hi mañcādike, vihārādike ca seti,
tika-s0103t:881_1: taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha pīṭhādike āsati, taṃ āsanaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ ekato katvā “senāsana”nti
tika-s0103t:881_2: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “mañco”tiādi. Tattha mañco masārakādi, tathā pīṭhaṃ. Mañcabhisi, pīṭhabhisīti
tika-s0103t:881_3: duvidhā bhisi. Vihāro pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. “Dīghamukhapāsādo”ti keci.
tika-s0103t:881_5: “Āyatacaturassapāsādo”ti keci. Hammiyaṃ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. Guhāti kevalā pabbataguhā.
tika-s0103t:881_6: Leṇaṃ dvārabandhaṃ. Aṭṭo bahalabhittikaṃ gehaṃ, yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0103t:881_7: eva chadanaṃ hoti. “Aṭṭālakākārena kariyatī”tipi vadanti. Māḷo ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇo
tika-s0103t:882_0: Piṇḍapāte vuttanayenevāti “sādako bhikkhu ‘ajja kattha vasissāmī’ti vitakketī”tiādinā
tika-s0103t:882_1: yathārahaṃ piṇḍapāte vuttanayena veditabbā, “tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto
tika-s0103t:882_2: hoti paribāhiro”ti, “senāsanaṃ gavesantenāpi’kuhiṃ labhissāmī’ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
tika-s0103t:883_0: Kasmā panettha paccayasantosaṃ dassentena mahātherena gilānapaccayasantoso na gahitoti?
tika-s0103t:883_1: Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dassento “gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭho”ti
tika-s0103t:883_2: āha, āharitabbatāsāmaññenāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ tattha piṇḍapāte viya vitakkasantosādayopi
tika-s0103t:883_3: pannarasa santosā icchitabbāti? Noti dassento āha “tatthā”tiādi. Nanu cettha dvādaseva
tika-s0103t:883_4: dhutaṅgāni viniyogaṃ gatāni, ekaṃ pana nesajjikaṅgaṃ na katthaci viniyuttanti āha
tika-s0103t:883_5: “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti. Ayañca attho aṭṭhakathāruḷho evāti
tika-s0103t:884_1: tassā desanāya. Yasmā nayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitā hoti ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato
tika-s0103t:884_2: pavattiyamānā desanā yathā taṃ cittuppādakaṇḍe, ayañca bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsakathā
tika-s0103t:884_3: ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato pavattiyamānā evaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “sahassanayappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t:884_4: desanaṃ ārabhī”ti. Paṭipakkhavidhamanato abhimukhabhāvena ramaṇaṃ āramaṇaṃ ārāmoti
tika-s0103t:884_5: āha “abhiratīti attho”ti. Byadhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ vasena bhavati bāhiratthasamāso
tika-s0103t:884_6: yathā “urasilomo, kaṇṭhekāḷoti āha “pahāne ārāmo assāti pahānārāmo”ti. Āramitabbaṭṭhena
tika-s0103t:884_7: vā ārāmo, pahānaṃ ārāmo assāti pahānārāmoti evamettha samāsayojanā veditabbā. “Pajahanto
tika-s0103t:884_8: ramatī”ti etena pahānārāmasaddānaṃ kattusādhanataṃ, kammadhārayasamāsañca dasseti.
tika-s0103t:884_9: “Bhāvento ramatī”ti vuttattā bhāvanārāmoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:885_0: Kāmaṃ “nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmaariyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī”ti vuttaṃ bhāvanānuyogassa anucchavikattā,
tika-s0103t:885_1: nesajjikaṅgavasena pana nesajjikassa bhikkhuno ekaccāhi āpattīhi anāpattibhāvoti
tika-s0103t:885_2: tampi saṅgaṇhanto “terasannaṃ dhutaṅgāna”nti vatvā “vinayaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabba”nti
tika-s0103t:885_3: icchitattā sallekhassa apariccajanavasena paṭipatti nāma vinaye ṭhitassevāti āha
tika-s0103t:885_4: “terasannaṃ…pe… kathitaṃ hotī”ti. Kāmaṃ suttābhidhammapiṭakesupi tattha tattha sīlakathā
tika-s0103t:885_5: āgatā eva, yehi pana guṇehi sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti, tesu kathitesu yathā sīlakathābāhullaṃ
tika-s0103t:885_6: vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, evaṃ bhāvanākathābāhullaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakañca
tika-s0103t:885_7: catutthena ariyavaṃsena kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ “bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ
tika-s0103t:885_8: kathitaṃ hotī”ti. “So nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramatī”ti nekkhammapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha
tika-s0103t:885_9: desanāya pavattattā, sabbesampi vā samathavipassanāmaggadhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃpaṭipakkhato
tika-s0103t:885_10: nikkhamanena nekkhammasaññitānaṃ tattha āgatattā so pāṭho “nekkhammapāḷī”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0103t:885_11: āha “nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo”ti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbepi kusalā dhammā nekkhammanti
tika-s0103t:885_13: āgatanayenāti vā attho. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
tika-s0103t:886_0: Soti jāgariyaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. Nekkhammanti kāmehi nikkhantabhāvato nekkhammasaññitaṃ
tika-s0103t:886_1: paṭhamajjhānūpacāraṃ. “So abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā āgatā paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāti
tika-s0103t:886_2: idhādhippetā, tasmā “abyāpāda”ntiādīsupi evameva attho veditabbo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0103t:886_3: taṃ brahmajālaṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Saupāyāsānañhi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ,
tika-s0103t:886_4: aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ, catunnaṃ ariyamaggānañca vasenettha desanā pavattāti.
tika-s0103t:887_0: “Ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatī”ti ca na idaṃ dasuttarasutte
tika-s0103t:887_1: āgataniyāmena vuttaṃ, tattha pana “eko dhammo bhāvetabbo, eko dhammo pahātabbo”ti
tika-s0103t:887_2: ca desanā āgatā. Evaṃ santepi yasmā atthato bhedo natthi, tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge
tika-s0103t:887_3: nekkhammapāḷiyaṃ āgatanīhāreneva “ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto
tika-s0103t:887_4: ramatī”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesavāresupi. Yasmā cāyaṃ ariyavaṃsadesanā nāma satthu
tika-s0103t:887_5: paññattāva satthārā hi desitaṃ desanaṃ āyasmā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero saṅgāyanavasena
tika-s0103t:887_6: idhānesi, tasmā mahāariyavaṃsasutte satthudesanānīhārena nigamanaṃ dassento “evaṃ
tika-s0103t:887_7: kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī”ti āha. Eseva nayo ito paresu satipaṭṭhānapariyāyaabhidhammaniddesapariyāyesupi.
tika-s0103t:887_8: Kāmañcettha kāyānupassanāvaseneva saṅkhipitvā yojanā katā, ekavīsatiyā pana ṭhānānaṃ
tika-s0103t:887_9: vasena vitthārato yojanā veditabbā. “Aniccato” tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu
tika-s0103t:888_0: 310. Saṃvarādīnaṃ sādhanavasena padahati ettha, etehīti ca padhānāni. Uttamavīriyānīti
tika-s0103t:888_1: seṭṭhavīriyāni visiṭṭhassa atthassa sādhanato. Saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyanti yathā
tika-s0103t:888_2: abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti, evaṃ satiyā upaṭṭhāpane cakkhādīnaṃ pidahane analasassa
tika-s0103t:888_3: uppannavīriyaṃ. Pajahantassāti vinodentassa. Uppannavīriyanti tasseva pajahanassa
tika-s0103t:888_4: sādhanavasena pavattavīriyaṃ. Bhāventassa uppannavīriyanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Samādhinimittanti
tika-s0103t:888_5: samādhi eva. Purimuppannasamādhi hi parato uppajjanakasamādhipavivekassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:889_0: Upadhivivekattāti khandhūpadhiādiupadhīhi vivittattā vinissaṭattā. Taṃ āgammāti taṃ
tika-s0103t:889_1: nibbānaṃ maggena adhigamahetu. Rāgādayo virajjanti ettha, etenāti vā virāgo. Evaṃ
tika-s0103t:889_2: nirodhopi daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā idha bojjhaṅgā missakavasena icchitā, tasmā “ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0103t:889_3: adhigantabbavasena vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha adhigantabbavasenāti taṃninnatāvasena. Vossaggapariṇāminti
tika-s0103t:889_4: vossajjanavasena pariṇāmitaṃ pariccajanavasena ceva pakkhandanavasena ca pariṇamanasīlaṃ.
tika-s0103t:889_5: Tenāha “dve vossaggā”tiādi. Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti
tika-s0103t:889_6: yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati, tenevākārena taṃnimittake, khandhe ca “pajahatī”ti
tika-s0103t:889_7: vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “vipassanā…pe… pariccajatī”ti. Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ
tika-s0103t:889_9: labhati, maggo ca samucchedavasena kilese, khandhe ca pariccajati, tasmā yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0103t:889_11: pariccāgavossaggatthāya ceva pakkhandanavossaggatthāya ca. Pariṇamatīti paripaccati.
tika-s0103t:889_12: Taṃ pariṇamanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca icchitanti
tika-s0103t:890_0: Bhaddakanti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavidhamanena ekantahitattā,
tika-s0103t:890_1: dullabhattā ca bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ. Na hi aññaṃ samādhinimittaṃ evaṃdullabhaṃ, rāgassa
tika-s0103t:890_2: ca ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ atthi. Anurakkhatīti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito
tika-s0103t:890_3: yathā na parihāni hoti, evaṃ paṭipatti, sā pana tappaṭipakkhavidhamanenāti āha “samādhī”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:890_4: Aṭṭhikasaññādikāti aṭṭhikajjhānādikā. Saññāsīsena hi jhānaṃ vadati.
tika-s0103t:891_0: Ekapaṭivedhavasena catusaccadhamme ñāṇanti catūsu ariyasaccesu ekābhisamayavasena
tika-s0103t:891_1: pavattañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. Catusaccantogadhattā catusaccabbhantare nirodhadhamme
tika-s0103t:891_2: nibbāne ñāṇaṃ, tena phalañāṇaṃ vadati. Yasmā maggānantarassa phalassa maggānuguṇā
tika-s0103t:891_3: pavatti, yato taṃsamudayapakkhiyesu dhammesu paṭippassaddhippahānavasena pavattati,
tika-s0103t:891_4: tasmā nirodhasaccepi yo maggassa sacchikiriyābhisamayo, tadanuguṇā pavattīti phalañāṇasseva
tika-s0103t:891_5: dhamme ñāṇatā vuttā, na yassa kassaci nibbānārammaṇassa ñāṇassa. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāhā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:891_6: Ettha ca maggapaññā tāva catusaccadhammassa paṭivijjhanato dhammeñāṇaṃ nāma hotu,
tika-s0103t:891_7: phalapaññā pana kathanti codanā sodhitā hoti nirodhadhammaṃ ārabbha pavattanato.
tika-s0103t:891_8: Duvidhāpi hi paññā aparappaccayatāya attapaccakkhato ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca
tika-s0103t:891_9: ārammaṇato ca pavattattā “dhammeñāṇa”nti veditabbā. Ariyasaccesu hi ayaṃ dhamma-saddo
tika-s0103t:891_10: tesaṃ aviparītasabhāvattā, saṅkhatappavaro vā ariyamaggo, tassa ca phaladhammo. Tattha
tika-s0103t:892_0: Anvayeñāṇanti anugamanañāṇaṃ. Paccakkhato disvāti cattāri saccāni maggañāṇena paccakkhato
tika-s0103t:892_1: paṭivijjhitvā. Yathā idānīti yathā etarahi pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ, evaṃ
tika-s0103t:892_2: atītepi anāgatepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccamevāti ca sarikkhaṭṭhena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:892_3: Esa nayo samudayasacce, maggasacce ca. Ayamevāti avadhāraṇe. Nirodhasacce pana sarikkhaṭṭho
tika-s0103t:892_4: natthi tassa niccattā, ekasabhāvattā ca. Evaṃ tassa ñāṇassa anugatiyaṃ ñāṇanti tassa
tika-s0103t:892_5: dhammeñāṇassa “evaṃ atītepī”tiādinā anugatiyaṃ anugamane anvaye ñāṇaṃ. Idaṃ anvaye
tika-s0103t:892_6: ñāṇanti yojanā. “Tenāhā”tiādinā yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāveti. Soti dhammañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:892_7: patvā ṭhito bhikkhu. Iminā dhammenāti dhammagocarattā gocaravohārena “dhammo”ti vuttenamaggañāṇena,
tika-s0103t:892_8: upayogatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ, iminā dhammena ñātenāti imaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ ñāṇena
tika-s0103t:892_9: jānitvā ṭhitena maggañāṇenāti attho. Diṭṭhenāti dassanena saccadhammaṃ passitvā ṭhitena.
tika-s0103t:892_10: Pattenāti saccānaṃ patvā ṭhitena. Viditenāti saccāni viditvā ṭhitena. Pariyogāḷhenāti
tika-s0103t:892_11: catusaccadhammaṃ pariyogāhetvā ṭhitenāti evaṃ tāvettha abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ attho
tika-s0103t:892_12: vutto. Duvidhampi pana maggaphalañāṇaṃ dhammeñāṇaṃ. Paccavekkhaṇāya ca mūlaṃ, kāraṇañca
tika-s0103t:892_13: nayanayanassāti duvidhenāpi tena dhammenāti na na yujjati. Tathā catusaccadhammassa
tika-s0103t:892_14: ñātattā, maggaphalasaṅkhātassa vā dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā nayanayanaṃ
tika-s0103t:892_15: hotīti tena iminā dhammena ñāṇavisayabhāvena, ñāṇasampayogena vā ñātenāti ca attho
tika-s0103t:892_16: na na yujjatīti. Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti atīte, anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
tika-s0103t:892_17: Idaṃ pana na maggañāṇassa kiccaṃ, paccavekkhaṇañāṇakiccaṃ, satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:892_18: atītānāgate nayanayanasadisaṃ kataṃ maggamūlakattā. Bhāvitamaggassa hi paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0103t:892_19: nāma hoti. Nayidaṃ aññaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ nayanayanaṃ, ñāṇasseva pana pavattivisesoti.
tika-s0103t:893_0: Paresaṃ cetaso parito ayanaṃ paricchindanaṃ pariyo, tasmiṃ pariye. Tenāha “paresaṃ
tika-s0103t:893_1: cittaparicchede”ti. Avasesaṃ sammutimhiñāṇaṃ nāma “ñāṇa”nti sammatattā. Vacanatthato
tika-s0103t:893_2: pana sammutimhi ñāṇanti sammutimhiñāṇaṃ. Dhammeñāṇādīnaṃ viya hi sātisayassa paṭivedhakiccassa
tika-s0103t:893_4: Sammutivasena vā pavattaṃ sammutimhiñāṇaṃ sammutidvārena atthassa gahaṇato. Avasesaṃ
tika-s0103t:893_5: vā itarañāṇattayavisabhāgaṃ ñāṇaṃ tabbisabhāgasāmaññena sammutimhiñāṇamhi paviṭṭhattā
tika-s0103t:894_1: pāpetvā”ti. Vaṭṭato niggacchati etenāti niggamanaṃ, catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Purimāni
tika-s0103t:894_2: dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ pavattipavattihetubhāvato. Itarāni pana dve vivaṭṭaṃ nivattinivattihetubhāvato.
tika-s0103t:894_3: Abhinivesoti vipassanābhiniveso hoti lokiyassa ñāṇassa visabhāgūpagamanato. No vivaṭṭeti
tika-s0103t:894_4: vivaṭṭe abhiniveso no hoti avisayabhāvato. Pariyattīti kammaṭṭhānatanti. Uggahetvāti
tika-s0103t:894_5: vācuggataṃ katvā. Uggahetvāti vā pāḷito, atthato ca yathārahaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchanamanasānupekkhanādivasena
tika-s0103t:894_6: cittena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gaṇhitvā. Kammaṃ karotīti nāmarūpapariggahādikkamena yogakammaṃ karoti.
tika-s0103t:895_0: Yadi purimesu dvīsu eva vipassanābhiniveso, tesu eva uggahādi, kathamidaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:895_1: jātanti āha “dvīsū”tiādi. Kāmaṃ pacchimānipi dve saccāni abhiññeyyāni, pariññeyyatā
tika-s0103t:895_2: pana tattha natthīti na vipassanābyāpāro. Kevalaṃ pana anussavamatte ṭhatvā accantapaṇītabhāvato
tika-s0103t:895_3: iṭṭhaṃ, ātappakanirāmisapītisañjananato kantaṃ, uparūpari abhirucijananena manassa
tika-s0103t:895_4: vaḍḍhanato manāpanti manasikāraṃ pavatteti. Tenāha “nirodhasaccaṃ nāmā”tiādi. Dvīsu
tika-s0103t:895_5: saccesūti dvīsu saccesu visayabhūtesu, tāni ca uddissa asammohapaṭivedhavasena pavattamāno
tika-s0103t:895_6: hi maggo te uddissa pavatto nāma hotīti. Tīṇi dukkhasamudayamaggasaccāni. Kiccavasenāti
tika-s0103t:895_8: asammuyhanakiccavasenapi tattha paṭivedho labbhateva. Dve saccānīti dukkhasamudayasaccāni.
tika-s0103t:895_9: Duddasattāti daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Oḷārikā hi dukkhasamudayā, tiracchānagatānampi
tika-s0103t:895_10: dukkhaṃ, āhārādīsu ca abhilāso pākaṭo. Pīḷanādiāyūhanādivasenapi “idaṃ dukkhaṃ, idaṃ
tika-s0103t:895_11: assa kāraṇa”nti yāthāvato ñāṇena ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tāni gambhīrāni. Dveti nirodhamaggasaccāni.
tika-s0103t:895_12: Tāni saṇhasukhumabhāvato sabhāveneva gambhīratāya yāthāvato ñāṇena durogāhattā “duddasānī”ti.
tika-s0103t:897_0: 311. Soto nāma ariyasoto purimapadalopena, tassa ādito sabbapaṭhamaṃ pajjanaṃ sotāpatti,
tika-s0103t:897_1: paṭhamamaggapaṭilābho. Tassa aṅgāni adhigamūpāyabhūtāni kāraṇāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni.
tika-s0103t:897_3: ca santo purisāti sappurisā. Tattha yesaṃ vasena catusaccasampaṭivedhāvahaṃ saddhammassavanaṃ
tika-s0103t:897_4: labbhati, te eva dassento “buddhādīnaṃ sappurisāna”nti āha. Santo sataṃ vā dhammoti
tika-s0103t:897_5: saddhammo. So hi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe, saṃsāradukkhe ca apatante
tika-s0103t:897_6: dhāretīti evamādi guṇātisayayogavasena santo saṃvijjamāno, pasattho, sundaro vā dhammo,
tika-s0103t:897_7: sataṃ vā ariyānaṃ dhammo, tesaṃ vā tabbhāvasādhako dhammoti saddhammo, “idha bhikkhu
tika-s0103t:897_8: dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī”tiādinā vuttā pariyatti. Sā pana mahāvisayatāya na sabbā sabbassa
tika-s0103t:897_9: visesāvahāti tassa tassa anucchavikameva dassento āha “sappāyassa tepiṭakadhammassa
tika-s0103t:897_10: savana”nti. Yonisomanasikāro heṭṭhā vutto eva. Pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyāti vipassanānuyogassa.
tika-s0103t:898_0: Aveccappasādenāti saccasampaṭivedhavasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ñatvā uppannappasādena,
tika-s0103t:898_1: so pana pasādo devādīsu kenacipi akampiyatāya niccaloti āha “acalappasādenā”ti. Etthāti
tika-s0103t:898_3: lūkhassa ceva paṇītassa ca vatthuno vasena. Sā panāyaṃ āhārassa oḷārikasukhumatā
tika-s0103t:898_4: “kumbhilānaṃ āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato āgatā eva.
tika-s0103t:899_1: etthāti ṭhiti, ārammaṇameva ṭhiti ārammaṇaṭṭhiti. Tenevāha “rūpārammaṇa”ntiādi. Ārammaṇattho
tika-s0103t:899_2: cettha upatthambhanattho veditabbo, na visayalakkhaṇova. Upatthambhanabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0103t:899_3: upetīti rūpūpāyaṃ. Tenāha “rūpaṃ upagataṃ hutvā”tiādi. Rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati
tika-s0103t:899_4: tena vinā appavattanato. Tanti rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya ṭhānappavattanaṃ. Etanti “rūpūpāya”nti
tika-s0103t:899_5: etaṃ vacanaṃ. Rūpakkhandho gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ paccayo etassāti rūpakkhandhagocaraṃ
tika-s0103t:899_6: rūpaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhāvena patiṭṭhā etassāti rūpappatiṭṭhaṃ. Iti tīhi padehi abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:899_7: pati rūpakkhandhassa sahakārīkāraṇabhāvoyevettha vutto. Upasittaṃ viya upasittaṃ,
tika-s0103t:899_8: yathā byañjanehi upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ odanaṃ rucitaṃ, pariṇāmayogyañca, evaṃ nandiyā
tika-s0103t:899_9: upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ abhirucitaṃ hutvā vipākayogyaṃ hotīti. Itaranti
tika-s0103t:899_10: dosasahagatādiakusalaṃ, kusalañca upanissayakoṭiyā upasittaṃ hutvāti yojanā. Evaṃ
tika-s0103t:899_11: pavattamānanti evaṃ rūpūpāyanti desanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ. Vipākadhammatāya vuddhiṃ…pe…
tika-s0103t:899_15: vepullaṃ āpajjatīti yojanā. Ekantato vedanupāyādivasena patti nāma arūpabhave yevāti
tika-s0103t:899_16: āha “imehi panā”tiādi. Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kataṃ vā-saddaggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ
tika-s0103t:899_17: hoti. “Rūpūpāya”ntiādinā yathā abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa upanissayabhūtā rūpādayo gayhanti,
tika-s0103t:899_18: evaṃ tena nibbattetabbāpi te gayhantīti adhippāyena “catukkavasena…pe… na vutta”nti
tika-s0103t:899_19: āha. Vipākopi hi dhammo vipākadhammaviññāṇaṃ upagataṃ nāma hoti tathā nandiyā upasittattā.
tika-s0103t:900_0: Bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavo, gilānapaccayo. Parivuddho bhavo abhavo. Vuddhiattho
tika-s0103t:900_1: hi ayaṃ akāro yathā “saṃvarāsaṃvaro, phalāphalaṃ”ti ca. Telamadhuphāṇitādīnīti ādi-saddena
tika-s0103t:900_2: sappinavanītānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, telādīnaṃ gahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ. Sabbassāpi gilānapaccayassa
tika-s0103t:900_3: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā bhavābhavoti khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:900_4: Evañca sati “imesaṃ panā”tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Bhavūpapattipahānattho hi
tika-s0103t:900_5: visesato catutthaariyavaṃso. Taṇhuppādānanti taṇhuppattīnaṃ, cīvarādihetu uppajjanakataṇhānanti
tika-s0103t:900_6: attho. Padhānakaraṇakāleti bhāvanānuyogakkhaṇe. Sītādīni na khamatīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgakālaṃ
tika-s0103t:900_7: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Khamatīti sahati abhibhavati. Vitakkasamananti nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0103t:901_0: Samādhijhānādibhedo dhammo pajjati paṭipajjīyati etenāti dhammapadaṃ. Anabhijjhāva
tika-s0103t:901_1: dhammapadaṃ anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva alobhapakkhe nayo, itarapakkhe pana
tika-s0103t:901_2: anabhijjhāpadhāno dhammakoṭṭhāso anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ. Akopoti adoso, mettāti attho.
tika-s0103t:901_3: Suppaṭṭhitasatīti kāyādīsu sammadeva upaṭṭhitā sati. Satisīsenāti satipadhānamukhena.
tika-s0103t:901_4: Samādhipadhānattā jhānānaṃ “samāpatti vā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ saviññāṇakaasubhepi jhānabhāvanā
tika-s0103t:901_5: alobhappadhānā hoti kāyassa jigucchanena, paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena ca pavattanato,
tika-s0103t:901_7: naṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmo “dasa asubhavasena vā”ti āha. Hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattanato
tika-s0103t:901_9: Tattha adhigatāni jhānādīnīti yojanā. Gamanādito āhārassa paṭikkūlabhāvasallakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:901_10: saññāya thirabhāveneva hoti tassā thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānattāti āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāpi
tika-s0103t:901_11: tatiyadhammapade eva saṅgahaṃ gatā. Āruppasamādhiabhiññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato kasiṇabhāvanā,
tika-s0103t:901_13: samādhipadhānāti sā catutthadhammapadena saṅgahitā. Catudhātuvavatthānavasena adhigatānipi
tika-s0103t:901_14: ettheva saṅgahetabbāni siyuṃ, paññāpadhānatāya pana na saṅgahitāni.
tika-s0103t:902_0: Dhammasamādānesu paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā etarahi ca dukkhabhāvato, anāgatepi apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhāvahato.
tika-s0103t:902_1: Acelakapaṭipadāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ channaparibbājakānampi ubhayadukkhāvahapaṭipattidassanato.
tika-s0103t:902_2: Dutiyaṃ…pe… brahmacariyacaraṇaṃ etarahi satipi dukkhe āyatiṃ sukhāvahattā. Kāmesu
tika-s0103t:902_3: pātabyatā yathākāmaṃ kāmaparibhogo. Alabhamānassāpīti pi-saddena ko pana vādo labhamānassāti dasseti.
tika-s0103t:903_0: Dussīlyādipāpadhammānaṃ khambhanaṃ paṭibandhanaṃ khandhaṭṭho, so pana sīlādi evāti
tika-s0103t:903_1: āha “guṇaṭṭho khandhaṭṭho”ti. Guṇavisayatāya khandha-saddassa guṇatthatā veditabbā.
tika-s0103t:903_2: Vimuttikkhandhoti paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttā guṇadhammā adhippetā, na avimuttā,
tika-s0103t:903_3: nāpi vimuccamānāti tehi saha desanaṃ āruḷhā sīlakkhandhādayopi tayoti āha “phalasīlaṃ
tika-s0103t:903_4: adhippetaṃ, catūsupi ṭhānesu phalameva vutta”nti ca. Eteneva cettha vimuttikkhandhoti
tika-s0103t:904_0: Upatthambhanaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammānaṃ tattha thirabhāvena pavattanato, eteneva
tika-s0103t:904_1: ahirikaanottappānampi savisaye balaṭṭho siddho veditabbo. Na hi tesaṃ paṭipakkhehi
tika-s0103t:904_2: akampiyaṭṭho ekantiko. Hirottappānañhi akampiyaṭṭho sātisayo kusaladhammānaṃ mahābalabhāvato,
tika-s0103t:904_3: akusalānañca dubbalabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā “abalā naṃ balīyanti, maddante naṃ parissayā”ti
tika-s0103t:905_0: Adhīti upasaggamattaṃ, na “adhicitta”ntiādīsu viya adhikārādiatthaṃ. Karaṇādhikaraṇabhāvasādhanavasena
tika-s0103t:905_1: adhiṭṭhāna-saddassa atthaṃ dassento “tena vā”tiādimāha. Tena adhiṭṭhānena tiṭṭhanti
tika-s0103t:905_2: attano sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ guṇādhikā purisā, te eva tattha adhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti sammāpattiyā,
tika-s0103t:905_3: ṭhānameva adhiṭṭhānameva sammāpaṭipattiyanti yojanā. Paṭhamena adhiṭṭhānena. Aggaphalapaññāti
tika-s0103t:905_4: ukkaṭṭhaniddesoyaṃ. Kilesūpasamoti kilesānaṃ accantavūpasamo. Paṭhamena nayena adhiṭṭhānāni
tika-s0103t:905_5: ekadesatova gahitāni, na nippadesatoti nippadesatova tāni dassetuṃ “paṭhamena cā”tiādi
tika-s0103t:905_6: vuttaṃ. “Ādiṃ katvā”ti etena jhānābhiññāpaññañceva maggapaññañca saṅgaṇhāti. Vacīsaccaṃ
tika-s0103t:905_7: ādiṃ katvāti ādi-saddena viratisaccaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tatiyena ādi-saddena kilesānaṃ
tika-s0103t:905_9: saṅgaṇhāti. “Vikkhambhite kilese”ti etena samāpattīhi kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0103t:905_10: vūpasamaṃ vatvā ādi-saddena heṭṭhimamaggehi kātabbaṃ tesaṃ samucchedavasena vūpasamaṃ
tika-s0103t:905_11: saṅgaṇhāti. Arahattaphalapaññā kathitā ukkaṭṭhaniddesatova, aññathā vacīsaccādīnampi
tika-s0103t:905_12: gahaṇaṃ siyā. Nibbānañca asammosadhammatāya uttamaṭṭhena saccaṃ, sabbasaṃkilesapariccāganimittatāya
tika-s0103t:905_13: cāgo, sabbasaṅkhārūpasamabhāvato upasamoti ca visesato vattabbataṃ arahatīti therassa
tika-s0103t:905_14: adhippāyo. Pakaṭṭhajānanaphalatāya paññā, anavasesato kilesānañcajante ca vūpasante
tika-s0103t:905_15: ca uppannattā cāgo, upasamoti ca visesato aggaphalañāṇaṃ vuccatīti thero āha “sesehi
tika-s0103t:907_0: 312. Kāḷakanti malīnaṃ, cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇanti attho. Taṃ panettha kammapathappattameva
tika-s0103t:907_1: adhippetanti āha “dasaakusalakammapathakamma”nti. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā kaṇhaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:907_2: “kaṇhavipāka”nti. Apāyūpatti, manussesu ca dobhaggiyaṃ kaṇhavipāko. Ayaṃ tassa tamabhāvo
tika-s0103t:907_3: vutto. Nibbattanatoti nibbattāpanato. Paṇḍaranti odātaṃ, cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇanti
tika-s0103t:907_4: attho. Sukkābhijātihetuto vā sukkaṃ. Tenāha “sukkavipāka”nti. Saggūpapatti, manussesu
tika-s0103t:907_5: sobhaggiyañca sukkavipāko. Ayaṃ tassa jotibhāvo vutto. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana “sagge
tika-s0103t:907_6: nibbattanato”ti vuttaṃ, nibbattāpanatoti attho. Missakakammanti kālena kaṇhaṃ, kālena
tika-s0103t:907_7: sukkanti evaṃ missakavasena katakammaṃ. “Sukhadukkhavipāka”nti vatvā tattha sukhadukkhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:907_10: idha sukkapariyāyopi na icchitoti āha “ubhaya…pe… ayamettha attho”ti. Tattha ubhayavipākassāti
tika-s0103t:907_11: yathādhigatassa ubhayavipākassa. Sampattibhavapariyāpanno hi vipāko idha “sukkavipāko”ti
tika-s0103t:908_0: Pubbenivāso sattānaṃ cutūpapāto ca paccakkhakaraṇena sacchikātabbā; itare paṭilābhena
tika-s0103t:908_1: asammohapaṭivedhavasena paccakkhakaraṇena ca sacchikātabbā. Nanu ca paccavekkhaṇāpettha
tika-s0103t:908_2: paccakkhato pavattatīti? Saccaṃ paccakkhato pavattati sarūpadassanato, na pana paccakkhakaraṇavasena
tika-s0103t:909_0: Ohanantīti heṭṭhā katvā hananti gamenti. Tathābhūtā ca adho sīdenti nāmāti āha “osīdāpentī”ti.
tika-s0103t:909_1: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena ogho cāti, kāmesu oghoti vā kāmogho. Bhavogho
tika-s0103t:909_2: nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ “rūpārūpabhavesū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu
tika-s0103t:909_3: rāgo, dutiyo kammabhavesu, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato. Yathā rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo,
tika-s0103t:910: Yojentīti kammaṃ vipākena, bhavādiṃ bhavantarādīhi dukkhe satte yojenti ghaṭṭentīti yogā. Oghā viya veditabbā atthato kāmayogādibhāvato.
tika-s0103t:911_0: Visaṃyojentīti paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ kāmayogādito viyojenti. Saṃkilesakaraṇaṃ yojanaṃ
tika-s0103t:911_1: yogo, ganthikaraṇaṃ (ganthakaraṇaṃ dha. sa. mūlaṭī. 20-25), saṅkhalikacakkalikānaṃ
tika-s0103t:911_2: viya paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ vā ganthanaṃ gantho, ayaṃ etesaṃ viseso. Palibundhatīti
tika-s0103t:911_3: nissarituṃ appadānavasena na muñceti vibandhati. Idamevāti attano yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0103t:912_0: Bhusaṃ, daḷhañca ārammaṇaṃ ādīyati etehīti upādānāni. Yaṃ pana tesaṃ tathāgahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0103t:912_1: tampi atthato ādānamevāti āha “upādānānīti ādānaggahaṇānī”ti. Gahaṇaṭṭhenāti kāmanavasena
tika-s0103t:912_2: daḷhaṃ gahaṇaṭṭhena. Puna gahaṇaṭṭhenāti micchābhinivisanavasena daḷhaṃ gahaṇaṭṭhena.
tika-s0103t:912_3: Imināti iminā sīlavatādinā. Suddhīti saṃsārasuddhi. Etenāti etena diṭṭhigāhena. “Attā”ti
tika-s0103t:912_4: paññāpento vadati ceva abhinivesanavasena upādiyati ca.
tika-s0103t:913_0: Yavanti tāhi sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā viya hontīti yoniyo, tā pana
tika-s0103t:913_1: atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭhā khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattivisesāti āha “yoniyoti
tika-s0103t:913_2: koṭṭhāsā”ti. Sayanasminti pupphasantharādisayanasmiṃ. Tattha vā te sayitā jāyantīti
tika-s0103t:913_3: sayanaggahaṇaṃ. Tayidaṃ manussānaṃ, bhummadevānañca vasena gahetabbaṃ. Pūtimacchādīsu
tika-s0103t:913_4: kimayo nibbattanti. Upapatitā viyāti upapajjavasena patitā viya. Bāhirapaccayanirapekkhatāya
tika-s0103t:913_5: vā upapatane sādhukārino opapātino, te eva idha “opapātikā”ti vuttā. Devamanussesūti
tika-s0103t:913_6: ettha ye deve sandhāya devaggahaṇaṃ, te dassento “bhummadevesū”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:914_0: Attano satisammosena āhārappayogena maraṇato “paṭhamo khiḍḍāpadosikavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:914_1: Attano parassa ca manopadosavasena maraṇato “tatiyo manopadosikavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:914_2: Neva attasañcetanāya maranti, na parasañcetanāya kevalaṃ puññakkhayeneva maraṇato,
tika-s0103t:916: 313. Dānasaṅkhātā dakkhiṇā, na deyyadhammasaṅkhātā. Visujjhanā mahājutikatā, sā pana mahāphalatāya veditabbāti āha “mahapphalā hontī”ti.
tika-s0103t:917: Anariyānanti asādhūnaṃ. Te pana nihīnācārā hontīti āha “lāmakāna”nti. Vohārāti sabbohārā abhilāpā vā, atthato tathāpavattā cetanā. Tenāha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:919: 314. Tesu acelakoti nidassanamattaṃ channaparibbājakānampi attakilamathaṃ anuyuttānaṃ labbhanato.
tika-s0103t:921_0: Tamoti appakāsabhāvena tamobhūto. Tenāha “andhakārabhūto”ti, andhakāraṃ viya bhūto
tika-s0103t:921_1: jāto appakāsabhāvena, andhakārattaṃ vā pattoti attho. Tamamevāti vuttalakkhaṇaṃ tamameva.
tika-s0103t:921_2: Paraṃ parato ayanaṃ gati niṭṭhāti attho. “Nīce…pe… nibbattitvā”ti etena tassa tamabhāvaṃ
tika-s0103t:921_3: dasseti, “tīṇi duccaritāni paripūretī”ti etena tamaparāyanabhāvaṃ appakāsabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0103t:921_4: Tathāvidho hutvāti nīce…pe… nibbattetvā. “Tīṇi sucaritāni paripūretī”ti etena tassa
tika-s0103t:921_5: jotiparāyanabhāvaṃ dasseti pakāsabhāvāpattito. Itaradvaye vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:922_0: Ma-kāro padasandhimattaṃ “aññamañña”ntiādīsu viya. Catūhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi
tika-s0103t:922_1: uṭṭhitavātehi. Parappavādehīti paresaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vādehi. “Akampiyo”ti vatvā
tika-s0103t:922_3: dvīhi kāraṇehi patanubhāvo veditabbo adhiccuppattiyā, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca. Sakadāgāmissa
tika-s0103t:922_4: hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti, kadāci karahaci uppajjanti.
tika-s0103t:922_5: Uppajjamānā ca vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya maddantā abhibhavantā na uppajjanti, dvīhi
tika-s0103t:922_6: pana maggehi pahīnattā mandā mandā tanukākārā uppajjanti. Iti kilesānaṃ patanubhāvena
tika-s0103t:922_7: guṇasobhāya guṇasoraccena sakadāgāmī samaṇapadumo nāma. Rāgadosānaṃ abhāvāti guṇavikāsavibandhānaṃ
tika-s0103t:922_8: sabbaso rāgadosānaṃ abhāvena. Khippameva pupphissatīti aggamaggavikasanena nacirasseva
tika-s0103t:922_9: anavasesaguṇasobhāpāripūriyā pupphissati. Tasmā anāgāmī samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma. “Puṇḍarīka”nti
tika-s0103t:922_10: hi rattakamalaṃ vuccati. Taṃ kira lahuṃ pupphissati. ‘Paduma’nti setakamalaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0103t:922_11: cirena pupphissatī”ti vadanti. Ganthakārakilesānanti cittassa baddhabhāvakarānaṃ
tika-s0103t:922_12: uddhambhāgiyakilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvā samaṇasukhumālo nāma samaṇabhāvena paramasukhumālabhāvappattito.
tika-s0103t:926: 315. Saccesu viya ariyasaccāni khandhesu upādānakkhandhā antogadhāti khandhesu lokiyalokuttaravasena vibhāgaṃ dassetvā itaresu tadabhāvato “upādānakkhandhā lokiyā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0103t:927_0: Gantabbāti upapajjitabbā. Yathā hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā
tika-s0103t:927_1: siddho “taṃsamaṅginā santānalakkhaṇena sattena kato”ti voharīyati, evaṃ upapattibhavalakkhaṇā
tika-s0103t:927_2: gatiyo paramatthato asatipi gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yehi tāni kammāni “katānī”ti
tika-s0103t:927_3: vuccanti, tehi “gantabbā”ti voharīyanti. Yassa uppajjati, taṃ brūhanto eva uppajjatīti
tika-s0103t:927_4: ayo, sukhaṃ. Natthi ettha ayoti nirayo. Tato eva assādetabbamettha natthīti “nirassādo”ti
tika-s0103t:927_5: āha. Avīciādiokāsepi nirayasaddo niruḷhoti āha “sahokāsena khandhā kathitā”ti. Sūriyavimānādi
tika-s0103t:927_6: okāsavisesepi loke deva-saddo niruḷhoti āha “catutthe okāsopī”ti.
tika-s0103t:928_0: Āvāseti visaye bhummaṃ. Peto vā ajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati laggacittatāya, hīnajjhāsayatāya
tika-s0103t:928_1: ca. Tehi tehi kāraṇehi ādīnavaṃ dassetvā yathā aññe na labhanti, evaṃ karoti attano
tika-s0103t:928_2: visamanissitatāya, balavanissitatāya ca. Vaṇṇamacchariyena attano eva vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti,
tika-s0103t:928_3: paresaṃ vaṇṇo “kiṃ vaṇṇo eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadati. Paṭivedhadhammo ariyānaṃyeva
tika-s0103t:928_4: hoti, te ca taṃ na maccharāyanti macchariyassa sabbaso pahīnattāti tassa asambhavo
tika-s0103t:928_5: evāti āha “pariyattidhamme”tiādi. “Ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā aññathā atthaṃ viparivattetvā
tika-s0103t:928_6: nassessatī”ti dhammānuggahena na deti. “Ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ uggahetvā uddhato unnaḷo
tika-s0103t:928_7: avūpasantacitto apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti puggalānuggahena na deti. Na taṃ adānaṃ macchariyaṃ
tika-s0103t:929_0: Cittaṃ nivārentīti jhānādivasena uppajjanakaṃ kusalacittaṃ nisedhenti tathāssa uppajjituṃ
tika-s0103t:929_1: na denti. Nīvaraṇappattoti nīvaraṇāvattho. “Arahattamaggavajjho”ti etena bhavarāgānusayassapi
tika-s0103t:929_2: nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ anujānāti, taṃ vicāretabbaṃ. Kimettha vicāretabbaṃ? “Āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:929_3: paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”nti ādivacanato na yidaṃ “pariyāyena vutta”nti sakkā
tika-s0103t:929_4: vattuṃ, sabbesampi tebhūmakadhammānaṃ kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmabhāvato bhavarāgassapi kāmacchandabhāvassa
tika-s0103t:929_5: icchitattā. Tasmā “kāmacchando nīvaraṇappatto”ti bhavarāgānusayamāha. So hi arahattamaggavajjho.
tika-s0103t:929_6: “Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa akalyatā”ti ādivacanato thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ. Tathā “yā
tika-s0103t:929_7: tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhassā”ti ādivacanato middhaṃ khandhattayagelaññaṃ. Ettha
tika-s0103t:929_8: ca cittagelaññena cittasseva akalyatā, khandhattayagelaññena pana rūpakāyassapi thinamiddhassa
tika-s0103t:929_9: niddāhetuttā. Tathā uddhaccanti uddhaccassa arahattamaggavajjhataṃ upasaṃharati tathā-saddena,
tika-s0103t:929_10: na ubhayataṃ. Na hi tassa tādisī ubhayatā atthi. Yaṃ pana keci vadanti “puthujjanasantānavutti
tika-s0103t:929_11: sekkhasantānavuttī”ti, taṃ idha anupayogi sekkhasantānavuttino eva cettha adhippetattā.
tika-s0103t:930_1: sādhāraṇato paduddhāro idāni vuccamānacatukkānucchavikatāvasena, kassacipi kilesassa
tika-s0103t:930_2: avikkhambhitattā kathañcipi avinipāteyyatāmutto kāmabhavo ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayattā
tika-s0103t:930_3: imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantaraṭṭhena anto nāma. Rūpārūpabhavo tabbipariyāyato bahi nāma.
tika-s0103t:930_4: Tathā hi yassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni, so ajjhattasaṃyojano vutto,
tika-s0103t:930_5: yassa tāni pahīnāni, so bahiddhāsaṃyojano, tasmā anto asamucchinnabandhanatāya, bahi
tika-s0103t:930_6: ca pavattamānabhavaṅgasantānatāya antobaddhā bahisayitā nāma. Nirantarappavattabhavaṅgasantānavasena
tika-s0103t:930_7: hi sayitavohāro. Kāmaṃ nesaṃ bahibandhanampi asamucchinnaṃ, antobandhanassa pana
tika-s0103t:930_8: thūlatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha “tesañhi kāmabhave bandhana”nti. Iminā nayena sesadvayepi
tika-s0103t:930_9: attho veditabbo. Asamucchinnesu ca orambhāgiyasaṃyojaniyesu laddhappaccayesu uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni
tika-s0103t:930_10: agaṇanūpagāni hontīti. Ariyānaṃyeva vasenettha catukkassa uddhaṭattā labbhamānāpi
tika-s0103t:931: Sikkhākoṭṭhāsoti sikkhitabbabhāgo. Pajjati sikkhā etenāti sikkhāpadaṃ, sikkhāya adhigamupāyoti. Āgatāyeva, tasmā tattha āgatanayeneva veditabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0103t:933: 316. Desanāsīsamevāti desanāpadeso eva, tasmā sotāpannādayopi abhabbā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā tathā desanāti āha “puthujjanakhīṇāsavāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0103t:934_0: Ñātibyasane yesaṃ ñātīnaṃ vināso, tesaṃ hitasukhaṃ viddhaṃseti, tasmā byasatīti byasanaṃ.
tika-s0103t:934_1: Bhogabyasanepi eseva nayo. Rogabyasanādīsu pana “yassa rogo”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Neva
tika-s0103t:934_2: akusalāni asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā. Na tilakkhaṇāhatāni abhāvadhammattā. Itaraṃ pana
tika-s0103t:936_0: Vatthusandassanāti yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ tassa āpatti, tassa sarūpato dassanā. Āpattisandassanāti
tika-s0103t:936_1: yaṃ āpattiṃ so āpanno, tassā dassanā. Saṃvāsapaṭikkhepoti uposathapavāraṇādisaṃvāsassa
tika-s0103t:936_2: paṭikkhipanaṃ akaraṇaṃ. Sāmīcipaṭikkhepo abhivādanādisāmīcikiriyāya akaraṇaṃ. Codayamānenāti
tika-s0103t:936_3: codentena. Cuditakassa kāloti cuditakassa puggalassa codetabbakālo. Puggalanti codetabbaṃ
tika-s0103t:936_4: puggalaṃ. Upaparikkhitvāti “ayaṃ cuditakalakkhaṇe tiṭṭhati, na tiṭṭhatī”ti vīmaṃsitvā.
tika-s0103t:936_5: Ayasaṃ āropeti “ime maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhantā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ayasaṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0103t:938_0: 317. Padahatīti padahano; bhāvanaṃ anuyutto yogī, tassa bhāvo bhāvanānuyogo padahanabhāvo.
tika-s0103t:938_1: Padhānaṃ assa atthīti padhāniko, ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā “padhāniyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:938_3: paṇidhānato pabhuti āgatā saddhā āgamanasaddhā eva, ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana “sabbaññubodhisattāna”nti
tika-s0103t:938_4: vuttaṃ. Adhigamato samudāgatattā aggamaggaphalasampayuttāpi adhigamanasaddhā nāma,
tika-s0103t:938_5: yā sotāpannassa aṅgabhāvena vuttā. Acalabhāvenāti paṭipakkhena anabhibhavanīyattā
tika-s0103t:938_6: niccalabhāvena. Okappananti okkantitvā pakkhanditvā adhimuccanaṃ. Pasāduppatti pasādanīye
tika-s0103t:938_7: vatthusmiṃ pasīdanameva. Suppaṭividdhanti suṭṭhu paṭividdhaṃ, yathā tena paṭivedhena
tika-s0103t:938_8: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ hatthagataṃ ahosi, tathā paṭividdhaṃ. Yassa buddhasubuddhatāya saddhā
tika-s0103t:938_9: acalā asampavedhī, tassa dhammasudhammatāya, saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya ca saddhā na
tika-s0103t:938_10: tathāti aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso. Tenāha bhagavā “yo, bhikkhave, buddhe pasanno, dhamme
tika-s0103t:938_11: so pasanno, saṅghe so pasanno”tiādi. Padhānavīriyaṃ ijjhati “addhā imāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0103t:939_0: Appa-saddo abhāvattho “appa-saddassa…pe… kho panā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “arogo”ti. Samavepākiniyāti
tika-s0103t:939_1: yathābhuttaṃ āhāraṃ samākāreneva paccanasīlāya. Daḷhaṃ katvā paccantī hi gahaṇī ghorabhāvena
tika-s0103t:939_2: pittavikārādivasena rogaṃ janeti, sithilaṃ katvā paccantī mandabhāvena vātavikārādivasena.
tika-s0103t:939_3: Tenāha “nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā”ti. Gahaṇītejassa mandatikkhatāvasena sattānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0103t:939_4: sītuṇhasahagatāti āha “atisītagahaṇiko”tiādi. Yāthāvato accayadesanā attano āvikaraṇaṃ
tika-s0103t:939_5: nāmāti āha “yathābhūtaṃ attano aguṇaṃ pakāsetā”ti. Udayatthagāminiyāti saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0103t:939_6: udayaṃ, vayañca paṭivijjhantiyāti ayamettha atthoti āha “udayañcā”tiādi. Parisuddhāyāti
tika-s0103t:939_7: nirupakkilesāya. Nibbijjhituṃ samatthāyāti tadaṅgavasena avasesaṃ pajahituṃ samatthāya.
tika-s0103t:939_8: Tassa tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ imasmiṃ ñāṇe anadhigate pavattārahaṃ,
tika-s0103t:939_9: adhigate na pavattati, taṃ sandhāya vadati. Tathā hesa yogāvacaro “cūḷasotāpanno”ti vuccati.
tika-s0103t:941_1: dasseti. Kilesamalarahitāti nāmakāyaparisuddhiṃ vadanto eva rūpakāyaparisuddhimpi
tika-s0103t:942_0: Āyuno majjhanti avihādīsu yattha yattha uppanno, tattha tattha āyuno majjhaṃ anatikkamitvā.
tika-s0103t:942_1: Antarā vāti tassa antarāva orameva. Majjhaṃ upahaccāti āyuno majjhaṃ aticca. Tenāha
tika-s0103t:942_2: “atikkamitvā”ti. Appayogenāti anussahanena. Akilamantoti akilanto. Sukhenāti akicchena.
tika-s0103t:942_3: Uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhaṃ assa taṇhāsotaṃ, vaṭṭasotañcāti uddhaṃsoto; uddhaṃ vā gantvā
tika-s0103t:942_4: paṭilabhitabbato uddhaṃ assa maggasotanti uddhaṃsoto. Akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
tika-s0103t:942_5: Sodhetvāti tattha tattha uppajjanto te te devaloke sodhento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “cattāro
tika-s0103t:942_6: devaloke sodhetvā”ti. Tattha tattha vā uppajjitvā puna anuppajjanārahabhāveneva tatopi
tika-s0103t:942_7: gacchanto devūpapattibhavasaññite attano khandhaloke bhavarāgamalaṃ visodhetvā vikkhambhetvā.
tika-s0103t:942_8: Ayañhi avihesu kappasahassaṃ vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā atappaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:942_9: tatthāpi dve kappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:942_10: tatthāpi cattārikappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā sudassiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:942_11: tatthāpi aṭṭhakappasahassāni vasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ asakkuṇitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0103t:944_0: 319. Cetokhilā nāma atthato vicikicchā kodho ca, te pana yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti,
tika-s0103t:944_1: tassa kharabhāvo kakkhaḷabhāvo hutvā upatiṭṭhanti, pageva attanā sampayuttacittassāti
tika-s0103t:944_2: āha “cittassa thaddhabhāvo”ti. Yathā lakkhaṇapāripūriyā gahitāya sabbā satthurūpakāyasirī
tika-s0103t:944_3: gahitāva nāma hoti, evaṃ sabbaññutāya sabbā dhammakāyasirī” gahitā eva nāma hotīti
tika-s0103t:944_4: tadubhayavatthukameva kaṅkhaṃ dassento “sarīre kaṅkhamāno”tiādimāha. Ātapati kileseti
tika-s0103t:944_5: ātappaṃ, sammāvāyāmoti āha “ātappāyāti vīriyakaraṇatthāyā”ti. Punappunaṃ yogāyāti
tika-s0103t:944_6: bhāvanaṃ punappunaṃ yuñjanāya. Satatakiriyāyāti bhāvanāya nirantarappayogāya. “Paṭivedhadhamme
tika-s0103t:944_7: kaṅkhamāno”ti ettha kathaṃ lokuttaradhamme kaṅkhā pavattatīti? Na ārammaṇakaraṇavasena,
tika-s0103t:944_8: anussavākāraparivitakkaladdhe parikappitarūpe kaṅkhā pavattatīti dassento āha “vipassanā…pe…
tika-s0103t:944_9: vadanti, taṃ atthi nu kho natthīti kaṅkhatī”ti. Sikkhāti cettha pubbabhāgasikkhā
tika-s0103t:944_11: abhiṇhuppattikatāya ca ‘sabrahmacārīsū’ti kopassa visayo visesetvā vutto, tato aññatthāpi
tika-s0103t:944_12: pana kopo ‘na cetokhilo’ti na sakkā viññātu”nti keci. Yadi evaṃ vicikicchāyapi ayaṃ
tika-s0103t:946_0: 320. Pavattituṃ appadānavasena kusalacittaṃ vinibandhantīti cetasovinibandhā. Taṃ
tika-s0103t:946_1: pana vinibandhantā muṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhantī viya hontīti āha “cittaṃ bandhitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0103t:946_2: Kāmagiddho puggalo vatthukāme viya kilesakāmepi assādeti abhinandatīti vuttaṃ “vatthukāmepi
tika-s0103t:946_3: kilesakāmepī”ti. Attano kāyeti attano karajakāye, attabhāve vā. Bahiddhārūpeti paresaṃ
tika-s0103t:946_4: kāye, anindriyabaddharūpe ca. Udaraṃ avadihati upacinoti paripūretīti udarāvadehakaṃ.
tika-s0103t:946_5: Seyyasukhanti seyyāya sayanavasena uppajjanakasukhaṃ. Saṃparivattakanti saṃparivattetvā.
tika-s0103t:946_6: Paṇidhāyāti taṇhāvasena paṇidahitvā. Iti pañcavidhopi lobhaviseso eva cetovinibandho vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-s0103t:947_0: Lokiyāneva kathitāni rūpindriyānaṃyeva kathitattā. Paṭhamadutiyacatutthāni lokiyāni
tika-s0103t:949_0: 321. Nissarantīti nissaraṇīyāti vattabbe rassaṃ katvā niddeso. Kattari hesa anīya-saddo
tika-s0103t:949_1: yathā “niyyānikā”ti. Tenāha “nissaṭā”ti. Kuto pana nissaṭāti? Yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhato.
tika-s0103t:949_2: Nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātuyoti āha “attasuññasabhāvā”ti. Atthato pana dhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātuvisesā.
tika-s0103t:949_3: Tādisassa bhikkhuno kilesavasena kāmesu manasikāro nāma natthīti āha “vīmaṃsanattha”nti.
tika-s0103t:949_4: “Nekkhammanissitaṃ idāni me cittaṃ, kiṃ nu kho kāmavitakkopi uppajjatī”ti vīmaṃsantassāti
tika-s0103t:949_5: attho. Pakkhandanaṃ nāma anuppaveso, so pana tattha natthīti āha “na pavisatī”ti.
tika-s0103t:949_6: Pasādaṃ nāma abhirucisantiṭṭhānaṃ, vimuccanaṃ adhimuccananti taṃ sabbaṃ pakkhipanto
tika-s0103t:949_7: vadati “pasādaṃ nāpajjatī”tiādi. Evaṃbhūtaṃ panassa cittaṃ tattha kathaṃ tiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0103t:949_8: āha “yathā panā”tiādi. Tanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ. Assāti bhikkhuno. Cittaṃ pakkhandatīti
tika-s0103t:949_9: parikammacittena saddhiṃ jhānacittaṃ ekaṭṭhavasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vadati. Gocare
tika-s0103t:949_10: gatattāti attano ārammaṇe eva pavattattā. Ahānabhāgiyattāti ṭhitibhāgiyattā, visesabhāgiyattā
tika-s0103t:949_11: vā. Suṭṭhu vimuttanti vikkhambhanavimuttiyā sammadeva vimuttaṃ. Cittassa kāyassa
tika-s0103t:949_12: ca hananato vighāto, dukkhaṃ. Paridahanato pariḷāho, kāmadaratho. Na vedayati anuppajjanato.
tika-s0103t:949_13: Nissaranti tatoti nissaraṇaṃ. Ke nissaranti? Kāmā. Evañca katvā kāmānanti kattari
tika-s0103t:949_14: sāmivacanaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati. Yadaggena kāmā tato “nissaṭā”ti vuccanti, tadaggena jhānampi
tika-s0103t:949_15: kāmato “nissaṭa”nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ “kāmehi nissaṭattā”ti. Evaṃ vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0103t:949_16: kāmanissaraṇaṃ vatvā idāni samucchedavasena accantatova nissaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “yo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:950_0: Sesapadesūti sesakoṭṭhāsesu. Ayaṃ pana visesoti visesaṃ vadantena “taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ
tika-s0103t:950_1: katvā”tiādiko avisesoti vatvā dutiyatatiyavāresu sabbaso anāmaṭṭho, catutthavāre
tika-s0103t:950_2: pana ayampi visesoti dassetuṃ “accantanissaraṇe cettha arahattaphalaṃ yojetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0103t:951_0: Yasmā arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā arahatte ṭhitassa cittaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0103t:951_1: rūpehi nissaṭaṃ nāma hoti. Tassa hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ rūpābhimukhaṃ
tika-s0103t:951_2: cittaṃ pesentassa idamakkhātanti samathayānikānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā cattāro vārā kathitā,
tika-s0103t:951_3: idaṃ pana sukkhavipassakassa vasenāti āha “suddhasaṅkhāre”tiādi. Puna sakkāyo natthīti
tika-s0103t:951_4: uppannanti idāni me sakkāyappabandho natthīti vīmaṃsantassa uppannaṃ.
tika-s0103t:953_0: 322. Vimuttiyā vaṭṭadukkhato vimuccanassa āyatanāni kāraṇāni vimuttāyatanānīti āha
tika-s0103t:953_1: “vimuccanakāraṇānī”ti. Pāḷiatthaṃ jānantassāti “idha sīlaṃ āgataṃ, idha samādhi,
tika-s0103t:953_2: idha paññā”tiādinā taṃ taṃ pāḷiatthaṃ yāthāvato jānantassa. Pāḷiṃ jānantassāti tadatthajotanaṃ
tika-s0103t:953_3: pāḷiṃ yāthāvato upadhārentassa. Taruṇapītīti sañjātamattā mudukā pīti jāyati. Kathaṃ
tika-s0103t:953_4: jāyati? Yathādesitadhammaṃ upadhārentassa tadanucchavikameva attano kāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ
tika-s0103t:953_5: pariggaṇhantassa somanassappattassa pamodalakkhaṇaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati. Tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0103t:953_6: balavapītīti purimuppannāya pītiyā vasena laddhāsevanattā ativiya tuṭṭhākārabhūtā
tika-s0103t:953_7: kāyacittadarathapassambhanasamatthāya passaddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā balappattā
tika-s0103t:953_8: pīti jāyati. Yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddho eva hoti, tasmā “nāmakāyo
tika-s0103t:953_9: paṭipassambhati” icceva vuttaṃ. Sukhaṃ paṭilabhatīti vakkhamānassa cittasamādhānassa
tika-s0103t:953_10: paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ cetasikaṃ nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ paṭilabhati vindati. “Samādhiyatī”ti
tika-s0103t:953_11: ettha na yo koci samādhi adhippeto, atha kho anuttarasamādhīti dassento “arahatta
tika-s0103t:953_12: phalasamādhinā samādhiyatī”ti āha. “Ayañhī”tiādi tassā desanāya tādisassa puggalassa
tika-s0103t:953_14: nayituṃ. Samādhiyeva samādhinimittanti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiāruḷho samādhiyeva parato uppajjanakabhāvanāsamādhissa
tika-s0103t:954_0: Vimutti vuccati arahattaṃ sabbaso kilesehi paṭippassaddhivimuttīti katvā. Paripācentīti
tika-s0103t:954_1: sādhenti nipphādenti. Aniccānupassanāñāṇe nissayapaccayabhūte uppannasaññā, tena
tika-s0103t:954_2: ñāṇena sahagatāti attho. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0103t:957_0: 323. Attānaṃ adhi ajjhattā, adhi-saddo samāsavisaye adhikāratthaṃ, pavattiatthañca
tika-s0103t:957_1: gahetvā pavattatīti attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā; ajjhattesu bhavāni
tika-s0103t:957_2: ajjhattikānīti niyakajjhattesupi abbhantarāni cakkhādīni vuccanti, tāni pana yena
tika-s0103t:957_3: ajjhattabhāvena “ajjhattikānī”ti vuccanti, tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “ajjhattikānī”ti
tika-s0103t:957_4: āha. Saddatthato pana ajjhattajjhattāniyeva ajjhattajjhattikāni yathā “venayiko”ti
tika-s0103t:957_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tato ajjhattatoti tato ajjhattajjhattato, yāni ajjhattikāni vuttāni.
tika-s0103t:957_6: Ajjhattikānañhi paṭiyogīni bāhirāni ajjhattadhammānaṃ viya bahiddhādhammā. “Ajjhattikānī”ti
tika-s0103t:957_7: hi saparasantānikāni cakkhādīni vuccanti, tathā rūpādīni “bāhirānī”ti. Ajjhattāni
